reviews.review_comment: Have to say something to get this prompt off. Blame Agoda's horrible system.

This place totally excels and beyond service. I have to do one night restriction with PCR check and they did everything very well. Price reasonable with dinner and breakfast meals service in room. Very recommend it.
Located right in the middle of the shopping district. Excellent breakfast
Porter and Doorman service is very good and helpful. Room is clean and good view. but I can heard noise outside the room. it’s fine. anyway, I’m Happy to spend time here :)
I had a wonderful 5days highly recommend the Hotel, also Breakfast amazing.
Big room, comfortable and very close to the center. Easy to find something to eat.
Big room, comfortable and very close to the center. Easy to find something to eat.
very friendly staff, very clean, nice buffet breakfast!
Very friendly staff, clean, nice buffet breakfast!
Really amazing place
It is always a treat to come here. The staff is very warm and attentice and axt as though it is their privilege to serve you.
Best breakfast Ive had in a long while! Great great hotel.
Greate breakfast Greate Location Nothing bad to say about it, I will stay there again.

reviews.review_title: if you are not caring the facial expression of the receptionist, this is going to be a good choice”
reviews.review_comment: good location, good breakfast, room is large enough and clean.
great location easy to excess .staff are friendly

We have stayed for a couple of days in January from 8 to 10 and the view was good. the room was decent sized with a pool and a free buffet, the buffet spread for breakfast was excellent with a variety to choose from all in all a decent stay and worth a visit if you love the letter B.

I have got an incredible deal for this hotel for several times now. It is my go to place when I need to attend any business dealings at Bangkok. Highly recommended. It also has free car parking which was important for me.
Rooms are big and clean. There was a bathtub. Breakfast can be improved

reviews.review_title: Live large without the price tag”
reviews.review_comment: When I stayed here in January 2022 I paid less than 40 USD per night through Agoda. This hotel lives up to its 5-star rating. Highly recommend.

This is our go to hotel in Bangkok. Thr only issue we had this time we were on the 34the floor and AC in the celing was leaking. Twice maintenance came and taped something and it stopped for awille the would poor out. Would have been nice to have swapped rooms though we had a great room and view. But that's just the way they fix stuff in Thailand.
For that price you cant find something better. Nice and clean hotel. , And really good location .

For the Money I get this hotel will be unfair to Claim about anything !1 Great Location ..Excellent Breakfast in a big Dining Area ....very very friendly Stuff ..Can only speak ...Must Try !!!! Excellent Stay ..Thank You Berkeley will see You again soon
A very friendly staff, very clean, nice buffet breakfast!
+ Very spacious room + Excellent location, short walk to transport links and shopping malls + Low price - Breakfast choices were fairly limited, not a lot of Thai/Asian food available

reviews.review_title: This hotel is great, great locations, shopping center nearby.”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel room is magnificent and recommended to everyone who visited here.
Good
Clean room. Good location. Nice staff. Best promotion price.
best in bkk
everything was good ,I highly recommend the place

If one is considering Pratunam area for their Bangkok stay, then Berkeley Pratunam perfectly fits the bill. Public transport, taxis, restaurants, shopping all close by. Staff very courteous and helpful too. Only disappointment being the TV. Granted most don't stay in the room to watch TV on a holiday, but given that there is a pandemic happening, people might stay back in the room a tad more, the TV with 7-8 channels and zero English sports/entertainment channels is a big let down.

It's in a really good location close to Central World and many other places to shop. Have a beautiful room with a marvellous view of the city. Only one minor issue is that they don't provide any, soap, shower gel or shampoo so had to go out and buy for myself.
Nothing to complain about, old school hotel with his own charm.
Nice hotel in the heart of Bangkok.
The price Was incredibly low. And the staff was very helpful and courteous, and always available. A good deal for the money without a doubt.

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel but an empty minibar”
reviews.review_comment: Just can't get the logic. Selling rooms far under normal price and nothing in the minibar. How they want to make money? Staff and service is great. Bathroom could be cleaner. Overall satisfied
Great hotel

I stayed here as a requirement of my Thailand Pass. The room was large, the view spectacular, the amenities quite adequate. The staff was friendly and readily available. The only issues were the in room meals were served without drinks and the two bottles of water in the room didn't go far. The TV only has about 10 stations and only two in English. I can't comment on how this would be for a long term stay but it is near the Ratchaprsong and Pratunam shopping areas and not far from the BTS station at Chit Lom. The room service menu leaned towards Thai and there were no breakfast options although I don't know what is available in thee restaurant. as there is usually a buffet in the morning.

Lovely room great central location. Not the biggest fan of Bangkok but the views from our room were lovely. Family room was lovely and spacious and the hotel staff were friendly. the place had charm and character. We loved our short stay.
Staff are wonderful and hotel arranged PCR tests - they came to our room! Overall great stay

reviews.review_title: Good hotel with the Thai touch.”
reviews.review_comment: Good hotel, good location, good staff, and very good bed!
Hotel staffs were helpful. The breakfast selection was not a five stars hotel.
Excellent value , good facilities, outstanding staff . Location good.
I stayed at day use. The room is big and the location is good. I recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Nice location near shopping and sky train”
reviews.review_comment: Breakfast and Pool are nice. The hotel bar is very over priced $10USD for gin and tonic while appetizers were reasonable at $4.00USD
Great breakfast. Great room. Great facilities. Helpful staff.

reviews.review_title: Good location and price but old hotel”
reviews.review_comment: It seems like the hotel used to be grand 10 or 20 years ago with an excellent central location, suitable for big tour groups. However, today it is more of a value hotel with really good price for Test & Go or ASQ package with good location (located diagonally across Central World mall). The staff will bring food delivery orders from the lobby to your room but are generally not very well trained. You can't get through to the front desk most of the time, using either the in room phone or your own mobile. There is a breakfast buffet but it is not that great either. The pool is not very big but still alright, while the gym is closed when we were there.
Great for TEST & GO

Booked this hotel via sha+ and I would recommend it. Unfortunately I was not on the list for the taxi service from airport, but this wasn’t a big problem. The bath tub wasn’t clean when I arrived, which might be Defizite in those times. Service, staff and the hotel in general is amazing. Pcr waiting only 5 h.
Great location , friendly staff , nice pool. Would recommend.

The front desk usually had a line up possibly because the Covid protocols involved more bureaucratic procedures and questions. My room had a smaller window that looked out to the room windows of another hotel.
The staff and facilities were excellent. The only thing was the Covid restrictions. Minimal staff were only available.

1- We booked a room with king double bed and we ended with getting two bed. 2- we wanted to upgrade or room and extend our stay but they didn’t help us to extend and let us check out. 3- great location but not helpful customer service.

reviews.review_title: A great option for a short stay”
reviews.review_comment: Excellent location. Big rooms with a nice bathroom. Great views from the large windows. Lifts are slow. Pool needs more sun loungers and perhaps a little updating. Temporary gym is very limited but at least something. Very convenient and a very good price.

The promotional photos are too good to be true. We went there as a group, have 3 different rooms and we ended up sharing same sentiments. First, we definitely requested for a non-smoking room (note: we booked more than a month for this event) and we ended up in a smoke reek room! For breakfast buffet, there are not much choices of food. Not something to look forward for in the morning. The bacon is also limited. For the facilities, we went for a night swim and a friend of mine stepped on a shard of glass beside the pool area. There were droplets of blood everywhere and her injury was pretty bad. What’s worse was the staffs are unprepared for emergencies as such. It took around 20 mins before the “first aid” came to help. Alongside with that, they seemed untrained for such emergencies. No compensations, really nothing at all. So disappointed!

We stayed on new year's day and it was still a busy day! The room is spacious enough for two with clean toilet, brilliant shower and strong wifi connection. I am so impressed with the extraordinary buffet breakfast that comes with the package. The transparent swimming is worth trying!!
good stay, nice pool
It was a great deal to stay. Accessible to platinum, central world and siam for shopping!

reviews.review_title: Good hotel and location poor service ”
reviews.review_comment: We booked for 5 nights including New Year eve and new year day. After booking confirmation was quick and helpful. Online or web team is great. We booked one day quarantine and PCR package which includes airport pickup, PCR test and dinner, breakfast and lunch. Our names were not there for pick up and it took ages for us to get transport sorted. Check in has long queue even at 7:00 pm. So did check out. I mentioned transport issues receptionist ignored. Room was really good and so was location. We were starving after 14 hrs flight and couldn’t stop or go anywhere before hotel due to quarantine, called multiple times for dinner they got a box with 10 noodles with 3 shrimp and hand full of leaves. None of us ate despite being hungry as food had hair in it, appetites totally lost. PCR test was done in the room by someone around 9:30 pm and they promised to call us by 5:00am to let us know results. No contact till 12:00 pm next day and we called reception no results yet at which point we were getting anxious…,.they gave us results while we were checking out 3 days later. Despite so many good things service and staff totally let us down

reviews.review_title: Good value for money at prime location”
reviews.review_comment: We travelled to Bangkok as a family and we stayed at this hotel. Breakfast is excellent, the location is good (very near the shopping malls), and the facilities are great. Staff are very helpful. We had to leave at 4am for our next flight and the staff prepared us breakfast to take to the airport (even though breakfast begins at 6am). We'll definitely recommend this accommodation.
The room was clean and comfortable, and my test-and-go performed professionally and efficiently. Not a bad way to fulfill travel requirements and sleep off jet lag.
Definitely will be book this hote again.
Overall, they were ok but they are not responsive at all in Agoda app
Unfortunately, the quarantine food was not at all Thai style 🧐

the room is spacious however the extra bed for 3rd person, they just placed out of nowhere in the room and make the room super cramp and cant move in the room. hotel is a bit run down however at the great location. the waiting time for lift is super long even there are 6 lifts.

reviews.review_title: OMG! We checked in an check out right away ... ”
reviews.review_comment: We had one night booked at this hotel, was convinced by the pictures, reviews and competitive price but the state of the hotel and room was just unacceptable, dirty, run down. We checked out and booked ourself into another hotel nearby. We felt completely misled by Agoda and the Hotel marketing, so don't make the same mistake, look for the latest review of the hotel.
The room is big, however things were broken down. Lights were flickering, carpet seems dirty , toilet cover is broken and water leaking out from the shower room and making the whole toilet wet.

Review I saw gave hotel 5 stars which is bit of a reach. Hotel is very comfortable and was a great value but for 5 stars it missed a couple of ticks. There's no sauna or steam and bathroom lacks an electrical outlet. Pool is fine, but nothing special. Wifi was spotty and I eventually gave up and just used the data feature on my phone. Breakfast was fantastic. You are steps away from Pratunam Market and the gym was adequate for my purposes, though may not satisfy big time weights person. I would definitely come back if I got a price similar to what I paid.
The water pressure is not so good. The AC is hard to control. Apart from that, quite good.
The pool is not so clear..
Shower drainage no good

The room, staff all very good, only even dinner is very weak breakfast for a hotel of 4*,Cold food and for breakfast or bread gave me, already the coffee had to call the reception to bring me, was the package test and go... But for the price expected more

reviews.review_title: loved the place , but we didn’t get our breakfast ”
reviews.review_comment: we stayed here for our one day quarantine situation when we arrived in thailand. the hotel was super lovely , the pool epic and the staff friendly . our only issue was that we didn’t get our included breakfast even though they took our order . we waited until 10 am and then just went and bought something down the road .
highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: PCR package could be much better”
reviews.review_comment: Room and hotel was nice but the whole PCR package experience was bad. The food delivered in boring plastic boxes (maybe this is a regulation, not sure) was cold and inedible. I also arrived late with my flight and missed the dinner, and there was no minibar or anything in the room. When my test result came back no one called me to inform about that, I had to call reception myself. I think this hotel can do much better!
Excellent PCR testing and results timely

reviews.review_title: Don't go for rapid PCR entry”
reviews.review_comment: Guaranteed 4-6 hours yet we were stuck in room for 16 hours: not what we signed up for. Otherwise a great value and location if you're just staying a regular night. Would not recommend for Test N Go entry

Berkeley reclaims to be a 5 star Hotel, Remember that the hotels reward themselves with the stars they think they should have!!! I would max give them 4 stars, but for the cheap price you can book this hotel, with such a central location....... they are absolutely worth a visit...... Pool is great. Breakfast is ok, but if you eat breakfast there for too many days, it gets to trivial, since the creativity is to be desired..... Would I come back..... For sure I will, you can book a great room for approx. half of the price you would pay elsewhere for the same quality...... Cant wait to come back, Thank you Berkeley for 7 wonderful days........
Good location,amazing value for money,and nice personell.
The covid package is horrible, the staff is bad, forget the food, nobody ever answers the phone at the reception... And no cleaning in the room
We stayed for 2 nights and we really enjoyed
Nice staff, very efficient

reviews.review_title: Travelling during Covid-19 has been made easier by Agoda”
reviews.review_comment: Berkeley Hotel is SHA+ and they provide extended PCR test door to door service. The staffs are excellence and friendly.
Family room is nice and spacious. The hotel is centrally located, easy to catch the water taxi. Swimming pool is nice, though the water was a little cold for our kids.
The Berkeley hotel is conveniently central located, near Central World. The family rooms are nice and spacious.

We had a good 4 nights stay there. Fast check in and out. The rooms were clean and big... The hotel also clean up the rooms and replenish every day. For the price we paid this is a really good deal. We drove and the huge carpark was a big plus for us and the 8th floor carpark lead to the rooms.

Breakfest not a huge variety of options. I ordered the PCR package which is including 3 meals, but they did not bring the food to us, and we had to talk on the phone 6 times with Them before they Come with it. Its a cheap hotel, but it does not offer big fitness and food options. And the food is expensive.

I had booked 3 nights: The first night as the Test & Go package; nights 2 and 3 as normal bed and breakfast. The latter nights would have got 4 stars but what I got for my 4700 Baht on that first night is definitely not worth 5 stars. The hotel differentiated - 1500 Baht for the accommaodation , 3200 Baht for the T&G package. This included individual transport from the aiprort (ok); a PCR test (ok but only conducted late in the evening) and 3 meals. Those meals were delivered to the room but the food was not even street food level in plastic containers and always cold. Why can´t it be normal room service conditions? Money enough would have been left after you take the anticipated costs for the taxi and the PCT test off. Ver disappointed. Ahh. almost forgot. The "luxury" room had only one small window (different to the photos on agoda) and was not better than any 3-star hotel I´ve been too. Actually worse as there was not one single internatonal TV channel in the room
Staff at the bar and in front of meeting room was not very polite Please don’t judge by the way anyone dress Thanks
Carpet is old and smelly
Been to a couple other hotels in Bangkok and this is a great value for money. The location was great with good access to restaurants and public transportation. Room could use updating though

reviews.review_title: The best hotel I've been last 20 years”
reviews.review_comment: This hotel is super. Now have a good price 30 € per day. And i enjoy it a lot. The only thing not good is the very expensive lunch or dinner. If was dinner for 300-400 bath it will be ok.
Second visit and not disappointed. excellent in everything . Just same notes . if you need a taxi make sure that you are 10 minutes early down stairs . Taxi is called by the door men on the road .
Good location

reviews.review_title: Pazzesco Amazing On Top Of The World ”
reviews.review_comment: Magic …..📀💪The Berkeley Pratunam Gooooooo The Best Of The Best 🌃

Location is nice, staff is good but hotel is chaotic during checking in and out, food was expensive and salty but after 5 the street food out front is some of the best food I have ever eaten, so delicious!!!!
Great location , hotel Poor service on following up on requests or emails prior to arrival ( good luck on airport transfers )

reviews.review_title: For the shopping, you can't do much better.”
reviews.review_comment: Nice hotel with friendly staff. Wonderful breakfast and just close to the (currently almost all closed) Indra markets.

Nice hotel, now available for a bargain. + Nice room with large window, and air conditioning makes less noise then in other hotels I have visited. You can ever turn it off and the room stays cool for a while. + Gym (small) and swimming pool in place - Slippers were not provided. They are listed in what is provided, but they are available for a charge (unless they forgot them in my room) - The fridge was too small to fit 500ml water bottles straight.

1st time staying in this area.We stayed here 3 nights for our test and go. The staff was wonderful and kind. We did our covid test from our room with quick results. The beds were perfectly comfortable after our 26 hour flying from NY. Beautiful pool. This is now my go to hotel in Bangkok. Plenty of shopping nearby as well.

A decent hotel. Reminds me of a 5 star hotel in Vegas from the early 2000s. Needs some serious updates to the rooms. The lighting system in the room is frustrating, to say the least. Lights are controlled by a controller by the bed, there are no switches so you cannot turn on the bathroom lights when you get up at night. Also, turning off all the lights turns off the outlets too! So you can't charge your phone or use the TV with the lights off. The TV didn't work well, the controller kept breaking. The furniture is dated and they don't provide slippers or a way to reheat food. No iron or ironing board in the room as well, but we ordered one from housekeeping. Only the pool was open and there was no ala carte breakfast (only buffet). Room service ends at 8pm! Location is great near all the big malls and the staff are pleasant. Just needs some major upgrades. You can probably find a better option elsewhere, but this place was inexpensive for the location (at the time of booking Dec. 2021)

hotels.name: Grande Centre Point Sukhumvit 55 Thong Lo (SHA Plus+)
hotels.address: 300 Sukhumvit 55 (Thonglor), Sukhumvit Rd., Klongton Nua, Wattana , Bangkok, Sukhumvit, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110

reviews.review_comment: Very nice place with great amenities. They also have a wonderful spa.

Travelled in late March under the old Test & Go restrictions. Positives: + Prompt and friendly staff (airport pick up, PCR test, check in process) + Complimentary shuttle transfer to BTS + Clean room, huge bed + Let's Relax onsen on site, convenient & was very clean as well. Downsides: - Tried to contact property via Agoda/ email regarding my booking but there wasn't any response. Finally managed to speak with someone over FB messenger and replies were prompt there.
The hotel is not really centrally located so would not consider it for longer stay but it was perfect for one night test and go program.
Amazing view and great stuff

6-star service from the staff, friendly and always acknowledge and greet you. Have an onsen spa run by Let's Relax in the hotel itself so very convenient with good quality massages. Shuttle bus to and from Thong Lor BTS. We love the location as we are seasoned visitors to Bangkok so we want to experience the local urban residential neighbourhood. Plenty of good restaurants and eateries, hair salons, beauty centres, nail salons all within walking distance. We will come back to stay here again.
This hotel is amazing! Staff are so helpful and polite, food is great! Clean a rooms and incredible pool and onsen.
Good experience for 1 night SHA+
Japanese restaurants surrounded, 7-11, bank and supermarket near by. 5-8 minutes walk to Thonglor bts. Very convenient 。

Thank you to the wonderful staffs especially Khun Mike at the concierge for making our stay even more comfortable ! Being able to get Grab food delivered to hotel is a plus++ Our second stay but will not be last. Will defeos return for sure.
Location is good, surrounded with Japanese restaurants. And Starbucks is near by.

reviews.review_title: Sound from the pubs very noisy ”
reviews.review_comment: stay at room 2203 (level 22) can hear the live music sound from pubs and restaurants which are located opposite the hotel.

From the moment that I got into the hotel to the moment I left the service was outstanding. The staff were polite, professional and extremely helpful. The hotel is situated in an excellent location and other parts of the city are within easy reach

i wish you include breakfast always with booking and Price to be descendent as Values of Breakfast is very high
nice

The hotel is fantastic, a bit far from the shopping malls on Sukhumvit, the breakfast is a bit so so and the internet is appalling. The beds are hard as rock, so much so that I had to check out after the first night with sore hips as they do not have mattress toppers. If you want a hotel with a soft comfortable bed and good internet this is not your choice which is a great shame as everything else is great
Professional services with great location
I like to commend the lady receptionist who helped our departure test. She helped to arrange the test in the hotel and we really appreciate it. Great service .thank you
Nice place
Good spot for bars and restaurants
This is a great hotel to stay at a lot of things to do in the area staff is very helpful and understanding and highly recommend

reviews.review_title: Easy test and go hotel with 5 start service”
reviews.review_comment: This is a very good hotel with everything you expect from 5 star hotel. The staff were friendly. We were picked up at the airport, taken to hotel, checked in, took us to 4th floor for pcr test at 9pm, and the negative result came at 6am. Paid 400bhat for a large set menu + alacart breakfast. Food was very nice. We stayed only one night.

Good hotel in general terms. It is notorious the lack of tourism in the hotels and this makes not easy to provide a full service. For example, breakfast å la Carter instead of buffet style. But it is understandable. I would recommend 100%
A lot of Japanese restaurant around, The location is not very close to the sukhumvit Road. They have a shuttle bus, better than walk…
Great indoor gym and outdoor infinite pool. The spa and onsen would have been great had we more time. Definitely returning!
Excellent stay for a simple stay — couldn’t recommend more highly and a great value for money.
Very pleasant stay with them. Staffs were nice and attentive. Clean hotel.

Grande Centre Point Sukhumvit was amazing. Great location, extremely comfy large bed with excellent views and most of all, delightful staff who were so polite and helpful with everything. I would definitely go back and recommend to everyone. We were also here on a Test & Go package -- we arrived at 11:30pm, did our PCRs and results were back super speedy by 8am the next morning.
They confused a lot of times to taking care of me...., They need to fix for operating "Test and Go" .
very nice to support by hotel staff. Very enjoy stay hotel. I will go to stay again.

Very nice hotel with attentive staff. When I left a pair of very expensive sunglasses in my room when I checked out, the staff found them and contacted me to return them—that’s service. Areas for improvement for those traveling with SHA-plus are: better furnishings on the outside patio. The biggest negative point was the food which was served in carry out containers except for the last night. Food was not the quality I would expect at such a nice hotel.

I stayed here for one night under the Test & Go scheme. Process was simple, the hotel was clean and staff were friendly. Summary of the process: After collecting my bags at the airport it was easy enough to spot the staff holding the sign of the hotel. I was then taken to the hotel by the hotel car. At check-in they required an extra 1000 baht deposit, which they will return at checkout. After getting the room keys, I went for the pcr test within the hotel. Once that was done, I went up to my room where I had to stay until I received a call from the staff the next morning to say my result was negative (around 10am). After check out, I was free to go. Day 5-7 after arrival, I have to go get my 2nd pcr test at one of the designated test centers. Keep in mind that meals are not included unlike some other hotels (unless you pick the package that includes breakfast).
not my style of hotel

reviews.review_title: One of the best hotels for Japanese”
reviews.review_comment: The room was very clean and I was very surprised with the style of the bathtub which I believe will be highly appreciated by Japanese people. Not only that there is a bathtub but it is the same style as in Japan that it is a room with washing area. This was a big surprise. And the height of the room was also very high so gave a spacious impression which I also liked. And also there were all channels in Japanese so I definitely recommend to Japanese guests.

reviews.review_title: Bad air conditioner and less breakfast :(”
reviews.review_comment: I stayed at room 1212 and I asked a guess service to fix air conditioner in my room while I’m going out the hotel for dinner but I think they didn’t fixed the air conditioner yet. I really feel hot and cannot sleep well until 4.00 AM. I promise I will not stay at this hotel anymore.

It’s too expensive for what it is. Nice lobby and stuff but rooms are very basic for this price. And we forgot about breakfast because it was new year and we woke about later and they didn’t give us any breakfast and we paid extra… and they also didn’t offer anything else instead or to give our money back. I wouldn’t recommend this place. There are many other nice places in bangkok.
Everything first class
I love the shower toilet. And big window with nice view.
Just high-tech room facilities.

reviews.review_title: A Highly organised SHA Plus Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: The care and attention that we were given at this SHAplus hotel was incredible. Everything was well organised, being met at the airport, escorted to a covid friendly taxi , to having our PCR tests done promptly on arrival. I could not fault the service and would highly recommend this hotel.
value for money
Nice location, good service, good facilities.

reviews.review_title: Great experience provided by Ms Jiraporn from front desk”
reviews.review_comment: the staff at reception/front desk provide great service during check in and check out. especially from Ms Jiraporn from front desk. she remember me by my name and room number. She goes extra mile to search and provide information when I need help during my 8 days stay. she was able to address my request in speedy timing. Thanks again to Ms Jiraporn for hospitality she had showed during my stay. Hope someday I have the opportunity to return again in near future.
Easy one night quarantine
Excellent welcome at the airport and follow up during the stay. The room was great, the food is great and the team was helpful to manage the PCR test
I stayed only one night until I was proved to be covid negative. Everything was well organized. I would like to stay again in a normal situation.

reviews.review_title: Best place to stay. Highly recommend!”
reviews.review_comment: Best place to stay during the trip in Bangkok. They have got a 5-star rate from me. Thanks to all staff who providing services impeccably and happily. Highly recommend this hotel!

reviews.review_title: Cancelled flight. Would not refund hotel money ”
reviews.review_comment: Should have given me hotel on new flight arrival instead charged me full fre
Lovely hotel! Very clean , excellent staff .
Nice Place, great view, good room service, had gym to myself, swimming pool was not available even after neg. PCR.

I have to stay at the hotel for one night quarantine. The package include airport pick up, covid test upon arrival at the hotel and two meals. Everything went smoothly since the airport until I got in to the room. The staff are very helpful. The room is very nice and clean. I would recommend this hotel if you plan to visit BKK.
The overall is very good, you will not be disappointed.
Two nights there, no room cleaning or fresh towels. Highly inflated price for SHA+ and was told testing was included in price, but it was not.
In rather high society expensive area with a lot of good bars clubs area in western style.
I stayed here for my "Test and Go". Nice staff, comfortable room and good food. Thanks for having me.
Great hotel very helpfully and polite food was really tasty will definitely come back
I have stayed here for 1-Day quarantine. I’m very happy with everything.

reviews.review_title: Go for the Spa after a day of Quarantine”
reviews.review_comment: Reception staff is 5 stars. I left my medication on the flight from Seoul. Staff made numerous calls and provided direction for me once at BKK. Korean Air staff met me at level 1 BKK when security would not let me pass to the correct building. The spa staff in the lobby and my massage therapist were 5 stars and well. Plan to spend more time in the spa than I allowed for my 90 minute deep massage with aromatherapy oil. Excellent massage, relaxing and an amazing value.
Very nice and super satisfied with my stay in this hotel
I did my Quarantine in Grande Centre Point and i loved everything there. I'll give staff 10/10 for all the help they extended. It was an amazing stay overall
Great place.. nice rooms.. great stuff
Nice place and staff
Very clean, staff very polite we didn't see much we were in isolation due to coved-19.
Really good hotel, best staff and luxury facilities. I will come back here.
I love going to the onsen spa, it is very quiet, clean, and well managed. The hotel rooms are spacious and clean. The staff are very friendly and accomodating.
It was great time at this place
My Favorite Hotel

Don’t stay here for ASQ if you want to eat Thai food. The food choices are not great and food was delivered cold several times. You have to order from room service menu if you want Thai food and then it’s not that great.

People you contact with is the most memorable part of the stay. The hotel was sparkling from the lobby, to the business center, to the spa and up to the room. Great value for the price. Did I mention the great asian and western food selections at the breakfast buffet?
Warming reception and pleasant environment.
good

My family are very happy about hotel and like very much.But I feel a little sad because my family Has been charged deposite from hotel by I didn’t Khow before that I tell them that I have guest to check in first.Hotel surprise my guest with deposite.I sad for surprise charge by I don’t khow if I khow I will pay hotel first for take care my family.

I normally stay at the Avani riverside, however this was slightly cheaper (only slightly) and I thought it would be great to experience a different area. The hotel is clean and tidy, but lacks warmth, this lack of warmth was also found with the reception staff, who never once asked if they can be of any assistance. No nice smiles or engagement in any conversation. Quite stiff & robotic really. The hotel appears to cater for less European travellers and maybe it’s a cultural thing. However, my experience at the Avani riverside has always been nothing other than fabulous. I’m a frequent flyer with years of experience in hotels, so this review is based on that. Hence for my family & friends I would not recommend. I’m sure there are other hotels that would make you feel more welcome. Please don’t base this review on the virus as the week before we stayed at the Avani so that can not be used as an excuse for lack of engagement.
This is my 3rd stay in this superb hotel breakfast is amazing ... staff are so clean and the rooms are spotless what more can I say .... great location

To be honest, the reason why i chose this property was because of sauna within lets relax spa. Which is on its 5th floor. We are sauna lover and i cant find anywhere else i can enjoy such facility in bkk.
Got forced to pay 5000 baht fine for my friend accidentally vomited a tiny puddle of water outside the elevator. They called it “deep cleaning”

Got an upgrade to a corner suite so no complaints about the room but the hotel lacks atmosphere I think, the lobby is huge but also very cold, God knows what the spend on aricon's there, I walked through the lobby as fast as possible for fear of freezing to the floor, surely not a place to lounge around. The pool area is nice and the location is right in the middle of Thong Lo, big parking also if you come by car. Seems a lot of Chinese staying here, not tour groups but independent travelers.
One of the best hotel I’ve stayed in Bangkok .. breakfast is amazing ... rooms are so clean staff are so pleasant and professional would highly recommend to all ...location also perfect ..

reviews.review_title: Outstanding in every way.The staff was very friendly and they made us feel very comfortable.”
reviews.review_comment: The room has a great view and it’s very comfortable and clean.Location can’t get better.I highly recommend this hotel for Individuals who like to stay at a outstanding hotel with Charme and Style.

reviews.review_title: Exceptionally clean and modern hotel in a great location”
reviews.review_comment: The top floor corner suite room was incredible. I love the electric shutters that opened to give an amazing 180 view of the city. The bedroom had an equally impressive view of the city. The facilities were excellent, the bed was very comfortable, plenty of TV channels to choose from, strong wi-fi signal, free mini-bar, kitchen etc. The breakfast was excellent also, all good quality food and an excellent selection to choose from. This hotel is very clean and well managed. I would not hesitate to recommend to anyone and will be staying here again in the future.

reviews.review_title: Bad experience, no more next time!”
reviews.review_comment: No quality guest, no quality service, no polite front desk stuff.
Good location , close to nice restaurant and clubs and bars , hotel was nice and clean, staff was helpful and informative. Will book again when lam in Bangkok next .
One of the fine hotel with great location. Close to every where and sky train. Clean and comfortable bed.
Me and my partner was first time travelling to Bangkok and experienced great services and enjoy so much to stay with Grande Centre Point.
convenient to stay

We really dig this hotel. Staff was super ok it, very courteous, and looking out for us. Hotel was super clean. Sauna was great! too bad other guests didn’t respect the no smoking rule, but staff was quick to react to this. The sunset pool is large and also quite nice.

reviews.review_title: Best Hotel I ever been in ”
reviews.review_comment: Was just one night, would have loved to stay there longer! Have nothing to complain about!
Everything is good but it is noisy . The bars nearby keeps making noise. The doors are not sound insulated.
Hello

reviews.review_title: Good but still room for improvement ”
reviews.review_comment: Room is large but the king size bed is a bit hard and the pillow is too soft. The bathroom is good. The minibar is good and included for free. However, Many ppl walk at the hallway and sometimes is quite noisy at the morning. The location is a bit far away from the BTS but the shuttle service is good. Need to provide more shuttle bus to other sightseeing place. The swimming pool is ok, but too many kids playing at the swimming pool and the water is quite cold. The spa service is ok but the hotel discount should be the same as the online discount. Also, the Onsen should be free at least 1 day for the customers who stay at the hotel for more than 2 days. The breakfast buffet is ok but no hot beverages such as Thai tea provided, also no coconut drink. However, mango sticky rice and fish cake is provided.

This is my second time booking this hotel during my 2nd trip to bangkok. Still the same great services were provided and the room is really clean. Thank you for hosting us back again with the great hospitality. Also, it was an easy and prompt check in and check out.. :)
The hotel is great, Excellent Breakfast, but you do need to taxi or tut tut to get to the trains etc.
everything was good, just the location is a bit far from the BTS station & city center. But the area around the hotel was super nice, a lot of good restaurant around!

Wonderful location. Superb amenities. Super clean and the fixtures and design of the hotel is beyond 5 stars. Icing on the cake is definitely the tranquil onsen spa located inside the hotel. Gym, pool and a fantastic breakfast buffet spread, I would give this one of my best hotel stay in bangkok. 10/10 score
Modern, new, clean and comfortably room.
Overall not really 5 stars hotel. Staff service (no matter the trainees or Duty Manager) has ample room to improve. Clientele's civilization level makes the whole environment not enjoyable.
Check-in reception lady staff keeps pulling a long face, till even when i check out.
Beautiful hotel with awesome amenities and great service.
There is a reason why I stay at this hotel whenever I visit Bangkok. I used to live in Thonglor and this hotel is probably the best one on Sukhumvit 55

hotels.name: W 21 HOTEL Bangkok (SHA Extra plus)
hotels.address: 4/56 Asoke Road (Sukhumvit 21) Khlongtoei Nue,Wattana District, Bangkok, Sukhumvit, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110

reviews.review_comment: Basic, but did the job.
Pickup driver very good. Reception staff was very helpful and assisted with my baggage. Room small but very clean and comfortable. Good shower and toilet. Ideal for one night stay.

The staff is great even though the communication is a little hard. I got a solo room and that's when the problem begun. The AC was working but smelling awful. I couldn't use it during my entire stay here. The bathroom was smelly too. The cleaning of the room was unconsistent. I simply do not recommend this type of room in this hotel.
The picture of room type need to be show excetly with the price.

reviews.review_title: No wifi in the room, but room is nice”
reviews.review_comment: The bed was rock hard, but for first night with PCR test on arrival was just fine for the price paid. No issues from the arrival of the airport to the hotel. Recommended if you're on a budget.
Tiny rooms, no facilities, an elevator that barely works. It doesn't look like the pictures. Don't bother.

reviews.review_title: Worst Hotel in Thailand, photos are a lie ”
reviews.review_comment: Do not stay at this hotel, and definitely do not book this hotel's SHA or SHA Plus program. The rooms are no bigger than the bed, once your bag is in the room it has to go behind the door which is a fire hazard. It is severely claustrophobic. It is super unclean, not hygienic, the floor has dirty footprints all over it, the bed had black hairs all over it(I took photos), i will see if I can attach photos (I am bald and hairless basically so they aren't mine). No safety guidelines adhered to, the lobby is closet sized and had 6 people in it coughing when I arrived. The airport transport they organized tried to extort another 1000 baht from me because i had two bags of luggage, There is no one to complain too and the hotels can extort whatever charges they want from you, as W 21 did to me, as there is no authority managing the SHA program....trust me I tried the AOT and the airport information desk they cannot help and the manager of the cars said to me, "I will make you sit until midnight and then you will pay." At 1:40am the hotel reception phoned me to threaten me not to post a negative review of the situation suggesting they would not give me my Covid test results. AVOID this hotel at all costs, it is not worth it whatsoever. Definitely the worst hotel in Thailand.

reviews.review_title: Charged for a test never taken”
reviews.review_comment: I booked for the test and go. Unfortunately I had to delay due to catching covid in the UK. I gave the hotel plenty of notice and was happy to pay the non refundable room charge, however they still charged me for the airport transfer and Covid test I never had.
Really small
Location was good

Stayed at this hotel for 1 night. I could say for the price including the Test & Go package, it’s worth it. Upon arrival (after the immigration process), I was greeted by one of the officers. You may simply provide your name and the name of the hotel and he/she will contact the driver to take you for the drive thru PCR test and to the hotel afterward. It was a nice ride! After arrival at the hotel, you cannot go outside and need to remain inside your room until the receptionist calls you about the PCR result. Expect to receive the call within 7 hours (mine was under that), really quick! After that, you may go anywhere you want. They didn’t serve meals for you so, you have to buy your meal before your arrival. Just take note of that! However, I do hope the hotel manager will improve the email communication as sometimes they are not too responsive when comes to replying to my inquiries. But all is forgiven considerating I had a wonderful one night there.
Small room.Shower water leaks to the bed room.No fridge.There is no leg’s space when you sit on the toilet bowl.

I booked here for my SHA my flight got changed, i forwarded the information. There was no response i forwarded the information again the next day, no response i called the number, the receptionist said she could not help me and that a manager would not be available for 5 hours. I asked if she could make a new booking, and she continued, several times about she has to wait for her manager. I asked her to please stop, and listen to my request. She hung up the phone. I called, again(from canada) she answered and placed the phone down. I could hear her and her co-worker chatting in the back ground. I have emailed now, multiple times, and no response. this is a very disrespectful establishment

reviews.review_title: Super super small rooms. No food service. ”
reviews.review_comment: When I arrived from the airport. While awaiting my PCR test result. I asked the staff for some lunch. I was told to go next door to the 7-11. I did! What is the point of paying so much money if there isn't really a quarantine. Rip off.

This hotel was very clean, comfortable, quiet, air conditioned, conveniently located right next to a 7-11 for food and other necessities, just $17/night and a great place to recover from a long trip from USA to Thailand.
I left behind a jacket and waistcoat in the wardrobe, by the time I realised I was 500 miles away. No problem, as soon as I got in touch with an address other were sent on. First class, thanks....
Very small no refrigerator, no desk. Others ok.
Nice hotel. Staff so friendly.perfect location

What you booked you won’t get room advertised be ready to get room with no windows no table or chairs have to walk in sideways and cannot walk around bed I wish I could send photos of room but I cannot run away don’t do it you will be sorry

reviews.review_title: Best choice for Test and Go if your budget is limited ”
reviews.review_comment: The best option to test and go even your budget is limited. Excellent location in Sukhumvit MRT station or BTS Asoke Station. The staff so friendly, rooms very clean and silent.
Pictures do not match with the reality.
I stayed in a 'pod' type room. Although small, it was clean and the bathroom was sizable. Check in/out was easy. Good for quarantine.
The hotels decor very tired. The lift hit and miss if worked. Loads of ants.

Stayed one day for quarantine, room was clean and really basic. So basic that there was uno shower gel, soap or shampoo. Large bathroom which can be improved to have better setup of sanitary. But hey for one day quarantine you dont need much.. Staff seems shy to talk or perhaps not good in english?

reviews.review_title: Everything you need, great value for money”
reviews.review_comment: I've been there for three nights, during the COVID restricted period, so it was a bit special. But the staff tried the best to handle things nicely. The location is great and - most importantly: The windows protect from noises pretty well, so that the insane roar of the street is almost entirely shut out. Sure, the room, especially the bath room were slightly run down, but overall it was a good stay and a great value for money.
One thing I'd concerned was that Test&Go travelers could not get foods and amenities even while staying one night.

The hotel is okay, so long as you know what you are getting. I had to stay here 1 night as per the Thai Test and Go scheme. You have to stay in your room until you have -ve covid result back. You can only visit the 7-11 next door. The room is tiny &is really meant for a backpacker or budget traveller who will just use the room to sleep. It's too small to stay in quaranteen for 24hrs like I had to. Otherwise its a decent hotel, clean and with friendly staff.

I stayed only one night for the Day 1 test & go. The room was very tiny i couldn't even open my suitcase. However I managed with it as its only one night. I'm sure they have bigger rooms. The bathroom smelled bad which was coming from the drainage pipe probably. Otherwise clean and friendly staff in a good locaiton.
Very accessible, very clean. Housekeeping staffs are very nice.

The said hotel was located at center.The Receptionist was too supportive and go an extra length to help and feel us comfortable.Sorry forgot the name of the person..she was in night shift.I will be definitely recommend this place to stay as even the amenities are all near by

reviews.review_title: Clean hotel for those with basic needs”
reviews.review_comment: Room was very clean, which is a strong positive. TV reception of local channels is good. Very central location with good access to transport and shops. Room was very small, although being the biggest available. Room fittings and furnishings are basic and in need of some maintenance. No hooks at all in bathroom, and toilet running. Water, shampoo, bodywash, towels replaced daily, but no soap provided. No tea/coffee facilities available in room. No option for extra bed for child. Staff have basic english and were not across 'Test &Go' requirements at time of booking. Would not recommend this hotel if reliant on staff to facilitate 'Thailand Pass'. More suited to travellers who are prepared to book their own Covid tests. Only limited assistance can be expected from hotel staff.
Central and although basic has everything. + 7/11 next door and across the road from Asoake SkyRail station
I went here for my first night (test & go) and I didn't have any window and it also smell bad. But I was clean

They gave me fake positive of RT PCR test. I had to be in quarantine hotel for 7 days and I paid 60,000 baht for it. They did not call other hospital ambulance, they called this Kluamyuthai hospital ambulance. This is all bogus trap to get the tourist money.

reviews.review_title: Good budget hotel,clean& safe, best location, friendly & helpful staffs”
reviews.review_comment: Value for money. I stayed here every time I was in Bangkok. Terminal 21 is on the other side of the road. Next to MRT& BTS ( 30 meters from the entrance) 7-11 at the hotel. Staffs are very friendly and helpful.

reviews.review_title: The hotel did not help us”
reviews.review_comment: I am not approved by Thailand pass I contacted the hotel and they did not refund me

reviews.review_title: DO NOT BOOK for SHA Extra +”
reviews.review_comment: Booked a night for my day 1 test. Wrote two emails to confirm with the airport pickup (which is mendatory to enter the country!). Never got an answer back and had to book another hotel. Wrote them with a request for a refund, which they declined.

The hotel room is not the best, to be honest. It's not a big room, it doesn't have any windows that can be open so it smells a bit like "closed". However, the hotel room was clean, the shower was nice, the bed comfortable and the staff treated us very well. They picked us up at the airport, took us to the hospital to get our PCR and in less than 6 hours we had the results. That's why I really recommend it for Test&Go or if you go for a couple of nights.
Good

Next to MRT& BTS Asoke. Terminal 21 on the other side of Asoke road. 7-11 at the hotel. Staffs are very helpful. Really value for money. I feel safe here even when I walked to the hotel at night so I always stay at W 21 when I came to Bangkok.

reviews.review_title: Fair for budget Sha+ , not very clean. ”
reviews.review_comment: I chose this hotel because it was one of the least expensive for the Thai Pass , Test and Go program. The room was very basic, the sheets still had left over hair from prior occupant (female) and the sheets had some dirty marks on them, so did the pillow cases. Small bugs on floor and in washroom. Not great but for a budget location not horrible. The location is quite good because it is close to the mall where you can purchase sim card and to a Super Rich where you can exchange your currency. If you're lucky enough to get a clean room then would be a great spot.

Pick up from airport was smooth, taxi knew what he was doing. Drive thru PCR on the way to hotel (took 10 mins). Result was ready in 6 hrs. However, the hotel staff didn't know anything about the rules. Didn't answer my email and let me go outside to get my food delivery. Furthermore, they knew I'm coming from an international flight and will have a huge luggage case but still put me on the 5th floor with a broken elevator. The stairs are super tight and it was a nightmare getting up and down with luggage and no help from staff.

I booked the hotel as a part of my test and go scheme. Overall my stay was good and the room was comfortable enough though it was really small. The elevator was a bit scary i think! You could also give some English training to your staff. It was a bit hard to communicate.
The best location.. Friendly personal..

reviews.review_title: Great choice for short time quarantine”
reviews.review_comment: I booked this hotels for my 1 night short time quarantine required for my Thailand Pass Test & Go scheme and it was a great choice. The pickup from the airport and the PCR test in a drive through hospital station was very fast and less than 6 hours later I was tested negative and free to leave the hotel for a first night walk. I booked a small room for this short period of time. I knew it would be small and I knew it would just have a small window but this was my choice and it completely fulfilled my requirements. The room was very clean, AC and the shower worked fine and the bed was comfy. So that I can recommend this hotel 100% for short time quarantine. Hopefully Test&Go will come back soon!
Great location with reasonable price, friendly staffs, room was pretty small I would not recommend if you have more than 2 large luggages, the cleanliness was quite okay.
Positives: Helpful staff, Nice clean room, Everyday room cleaning, Close to T21 , MRT, BTS, 7-11, Nightlife Scope for improvement: Elevator had issues; Toilet can use curtains / glass divider

I chose this hotel for my first night of isolation and to be honest: Yes l, knew I wasn’t going for quality but more so the price. However the room was much (!!!) smaller than I had booked. It actually looked more like a small cabin max 7m2. There also wasn’t really an opportunity to do something about it, because I needed to isolate. Hence, I think they made use of that situation, but that’s an assumption of course. Location is very good though, but I wouldn’t book it again.
staff at hotel was very kind and helpful. the location is the middle of city that easy to buy something or travel anywhere else.
Problem is staff can’t speak English which makes it very difficult 😣
Always stayed at W 21 Hotel when I was in Bangkok. It's clean and safe place. Staffs are friendly and helpful. 7-11 at the hotel. Next to MRT & BTS entrance, near Terminal 21, value for money.

reviews.review_title: Best location, clean & safe, helpful staffs”
reviews.review_comment: Next to BTS & MRT. Terminal 21 is on the other side of the road. There is a convenience store at the hotel. It's clean & safe place to stay. Staffs are friendly and helpful. A good budget hotel.

The front smell like a bathroom, the hotel is old and the elevator seems not safe.did not get inform by the staff when the PCR result came and can go out. The room was small but okay but the bathroom also smell bad. The location is nice and very near BTS asok.
Clean Place, great to stay convenience.
Its bad experience sometimes no left and room very old and stronf mattress

reviews.review_title: Great Hotel POOR SHA Plus Service ”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel Excellent, Friendly Staff, Clean & Incredible Location BUT Their SHA Plus Providers VERY POOR After TWICE Confirming Booking/Arrival time NOBODY At Airport to transfer me!! Waiting 1 1/2 HOURS to be picked up at Airport!! Took over 3hrs After landing to arrive at Hotel (I watched over 100 other People get collected by THIER Hotels NO PROBLEMS! ) Not Appreciated AT ALL After 20hrs in travel, LOTS OF Planning, Paperwork & $$$ to Be Allowed into Thailand.. Terrible 1st Impression
I waited 6 hours for transfer from airport to hotel after few phone calls thay com and got me ..staf very little english ...not recomendet
A quarantine hotel. No food provided Cock roaches Rooms so tiny.
Einfach, sauber, verkehrsgünstig an der Asoke Kreuzung

A good place to go thru quarantine. Stuff is friendly, helps with everything. They help me with letter for thaipass, tests and everything. The hotel is clean and cozy, there is free coffee and cookies :) Can recommend for everyone.

I booked the test&go package. Initially this hotel was cheapest however soon increased the hotel price and package price both. If 2950B total,I can accept this hotel but more than 3500B,no. Location ok but facilities and room,no.
good
Cleaning, friend, bright
Not Value for money

reviews.review_title: clean & safe, best location, friendly & helpful staffs ”
reviews.review_comment: unbeatable location , friendly staffs, clean and safe place. value for money. will come back as always

reviews.review_title: Great location and staff; clean too!”
reviews.review_comment: I stayed in a windowless room that I booked and it was clean and quiet. The staff are lovely, I will stay again.

reviews.review_title: Value for money, friendly & helpful staffs, best location”
reviews.review_comment: Always stayed at W 21 when I came to Bangkok . Staffs are friendly and helpful. It's clean & safe, near Terminal 21,next to MRT gate 2. There is a convenient store next door.

W12 is in a very good location with easy access to both MRT & BTS, Terminal 21 and other malls nearby. The staff were friendly. I was given a small but handy bottle of hand sanitizer upon check-in. Biscuits, coffee & tea sachets, hot & cold water dispenser were available in the lobby for guests’ use. Wifi was good. However, my compliments stop here. Many things in the room were in need of repair. The safe was completely unusable, the swing function of the air-con was not working, unreliable hot water stream (hot then turned cold), the toilet flushing system leaked water, toilet door scraped the floor and the freezer in the fridge was practically one block of ice and I guess the light bulb was frozen in the ice (hence no light). I didn’t bother to request for repair or change of room because my stay wasn’t long. Much had been said about the lift by other guests in their reviews. I was fortunate to have legs strong enough to climb the stairs to 4th floor where my room was. Perhaps there were better rooms in W12. (I am sorry, W12) But for now, I won’t recommend the hotel based on my experience in the room that was unfortunately not too good.
good
I think this is a good hotel with easy access to BTS and MRT. I only note there was no hot water in my room. Otherwise a good hotel.

I stayed there more than 30 days and all I can say is this is one of the best hotels in terms of location. The value you get for the money you paid is incredible. The staff is very friendly and everything is great.
The place is very close to MRT entrance and BTS station. But the elevator was a little bit scary.

reviews.review_title: Best location, clean & safe, good staffs, value for money”
reviews.review_comment: I stayed at this place every time I came to Bangkok . Staffs are friendly and helpful. It's clean and safe place, next to MRT & BTS entrance. Terminal 21 is on the other side of the road. Will come back again.

It looks like it has had a refurb since 2019 when I stayed. Location superb yards from Soi Cowboy but quite enough. Smallest lift in the entire world but fun! Rooms a little dated and sparse but, like I say looks like it has had a refurb since my visit. All in all would definitely give a thumbs up

reviews.review_title: Not The Best, Not The Worst”
reviews.review_comment: They charge an additional 100 baht to even bring a friend to the room if you booked for 1 person - just a heads up. Not the best facilities either. More of motel quality, but a decent location (that is if you don't mind being directly on the corner of Soi Cowboy). Would not stay here again.
Helpful staffs, great location near by everything like BTS or MRT next to Terminal 21 mall and the room was clean and the bed is comfy.
great location and facilities

reviews.review_title: Now my usual place to stay while visiting Bkk”
reviews.review_comment: The staff were so lovely the first time I stayed here - that I came back again. It's now my place to stay. Nice central location - close to MRT & BTS. Lots of shopping and great vegan places to eat.
Clean Convenience to catch the Bts,Mrt, shopping Cheap. Almost perfectly..next i will booking agian I like economy room enough for me.
Very happy
Room was big and super clean - bed was firm. Staff were friendly & helpful. Water was hot ;-)
Excellent staff. Very clean rooms, every day! I chose one of the 2 large rooms on the roof. I've stayed here many times, and will continue to return here in the future.

reviews.review_title: Best location, clean & safe, friendly staffs”
reviews.review_comment: I always stayed at this hotel when I went to Bangkok and will stay again next time.

For me, this location is excellent but luxury it isn’t. The main problem is the 1 foot step up to the bathroom which as an elderly person who needs to go to the toilet at night, its dangerous. There was also no kettle to make tea. The room was very dark indeed and having read previous reviews, i paid extra for a window which was very small and would help if they could somehow clean it. The walls were brown. Fortunately, i was out most of the time. I have stayed in much better accommodation for similar price but the location sells this hotel to me. The receptionist was very friendly.

Pros: friendly, helpful staff. Very clean rooms and property. Big comfy bed, big bathroom, great AC. Excellent location! Cons: none I've stayed here several times since March, and always upgrade to the bigger room. It's now my "go to" hotel in Bangkok

reviews.review_title: Soon I will stay there again. Nice hotel with a good price. See you soon ”

reviews.review_comment: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Clean room and great location that is near everything.

Thiis hotel is just outside Sukhumvit MRT Station entrance but it's right next to Soi Cowboy. MRT & BTS at your doorstep! This place seems newly renovated - it's clean and bright and the doorman and reception are very nice. The elevator is neat, clean and worked fine, The room I had on L4 was at the rear and quiet, had only a narrow window but sufficient light. The shower/toilet is narrow too but sufficient for my needs - good heat and towels are provided. There is a tiny basin. The shower did leak slightly into the floor slightly. The bed is queen size on a platform w storage underneath was comfortable. The walkable area of the room is 1.2m wide and if you had a large suitcase, it may be a problem. The 50cm platform between the foot of the bed and the TV could be used for a small luggage. The hair dryer wasn't working and the reception and she said she would take care of it but it never happened in the 4D3N I was there. Would stay again.
Very rude ignorant girl on reception. My room was tiny and dark.

reviews.review_title: Clean & good budget hotel, best location, value for money”
reviews.review_comment: Near everything. Next to MRT Sukhumvit & BTS Asok entrance. Friendly and helpful staffs.
Next to MRT & BTS, near Terminal 21. Staffs are friendly and helpful. This is a good budget hotel.

reviews.review_title: Lift can tweak to be faster”
reviews.review_comment: Good location
Overall bad,tiny room and worth it to stay.

reviews.review_title: Good budget hotel , best location,value for money”
reviews.review_comment: I always stayed at this hotel when I came to Bangkok as the hotel is clean and safe. This is a good budget hotel at best location. The hotel is next to MRT & BTS entrance. Terminal 21 is only few minutes walk from the hotel at BTS exit.
Bad room,air conditioner keep on and off and very tiny. Won’t come back again!
Great location, next to Sukhumvit MRT Station, nearby Asok BTS Station easy access to everywhere. Don't book the single room, too small not worth the money

reviews.review_title: Best budget hotel and great value”
reviews.review_comment: I’ve stayed here many times when I visit bangkok and will continue to do so. Rooms are spacious and clean (I booked superior room). Staffs were helpful as always. They provide free snacks and coffee at the reception.location is the best.
Everything is good except the elevator, which is not a standard lift, and the lack of a mini fridge, which there isn't room for 1.
Close to everything you need! Trains, good food, shopping!

Have stayed here many times due to its convenient location. The rooms used to have a small kitchenette inside, prior to renovations carried out that added extra rooms to the building. Upkeep of the room facilities has been lacking of late.

The corner balcony is exquisite! TVs are a little small but they are smart TVs and ok. Very good room service and located next to the train terminal and very close to Siam Paragon mall, the best mall in Bangkok. The room and furniture are cozy and just great. This hotel is about 4-5 stars according to American standards and quite expensive! Yes, you can cook in the corner balcony and has great washer and dryer combo. Nice pool, but spa is closed indefinitely.

The agoda sha plus Makes it easy to get the Thai pass, At the hotel. send the driver wait for you at the airport. The hotel answer my emails and questions. Everything is so efficient. The location of the hotel is very good close to the centre. but in the quiet corner, the bathroom smells need repair, other than that, it's worth your money.
Good room and good staffs. The room is a bit old fashion but still good place to stay. Worth my money.
Did the one night SHA stay here... everything was brilliantly organised with in house test and super room service.Totally recommended...clearly well managed with friendly and efficient staff!
You will be pleased when you stay here. Super friendly staff and the hotel has everything you can image, all the comfort and a smashing room. Super clean and modern fixtures.
The furniture is old and it is expensive
The staff is so friendly. They wil go out of their way to help you. The location is great The breakfast was great. The Test and Go was really easy.
I was deeply dissapoint by both the hotel and agoda
This hotel is beyond expectation. Room is clean. Staffs are friendly. Location is great. Very impressed with the service.

From the initial meet & greet at the airport to the organisation of the PCR test it all worked as sold... Room is spacious, well equipped and clean... Hotel staff are attentive and efficient... Recommend to anyone having to use this entry option...

reviews.review_title: Pretty good but expensive for what it is”

Hi. I love the location and that the rooms has its own private balcony. the staff were very attentive.
There was construction next door
Staff is amazing every day room service as 5 star. Closer to very shopping center and transportation as Sky Train. Airport pick up n PCR test for covid easy as one stop service. Highly recommended

I has been travelling to Bangkok alone for two weeks with the Thailand Pass package. The room and other areas of the hotel are clean and spacious. Nice and helpful staff. In-room meals were good and fast to deliver to the room.

I has been travelling to Bangkok alone for two weeks with the Thailand Pass package. The room and other areas of the hotel are clean and spacious. Nice and helpful staff. In-room meals were good and fast to deliver to the room.
Friendly staff, nice rooms, balconies, bath tubs, lovely lobby, convenient location. Would definitely stay here again. Breakfast was good, not great.

I have stayed in this property as part of my compulsory 5th day PCR test Thailand Pass requirements. It was absolutely unnecessary stay. I was advised of my test results as late as 10:30am, check out time was 12, so for what I paid for 1 night stay I could not possibly get the best value: use hotel's facilities for example. The Hotel was certainly not a 5star quality.
very nice hotel with good location and services
The service was exceptional.
I would like a bar or service of alcohol area
Excellent well managed and presented hotel. Friendly and courteous staff. Enjoyed my stay therr
all things were perfect but if you are light sleeper its not your hotel i changed my room from street side because of cars and tik tuk noise then i found there is construction the other side 🙂
was very happy- Test and Go- great staff. Great location
3rd time booking for longer stay: 23 days. Amazing service and experience. Will be back the 4th time during water festival.

This is my 2nd time book and they provided dark room with better sound barrier. The room is very quiet and it was near construction and the blinds provided super dark room for people with sleep apnea like me. I love how the BTS is only 5 minute walk and nearest 7 eleven is only 3 minute walk. The fridge can hold a lot of items and the laundry in the room is a dryer/washer in one so that is very convenient. The room service is great but this time around the hotel doesn't serve alcoholic beverages.
I always stay at this hotel, the rooms are amazing! love the balcony access too

My room had direct inview from the condo opposit. Same huge noise from building works. On my tequest for other room I was turned down, weird as hitel has very low occupancies. Breakfast was NOT buffet even they charge for it. Overal in covid time not cool. Will not stay in this hotel anymore.
The entire greats you even cleaning team, if you are in there eye to eye contact. Bed and pillows extremely comfortable.
Picked me up in limo at airport, less than 5 minute wait. Took me to my quarantine room. Took COVID test in hotel. Ordered room service meals. Test was negative. Checked out next day.

reviews.review_title: Good value for money, but a little noisy!”
reviews.review_comment: The rooms at Grande Centre Point Hotel Ploenchit are spacious, well appointed and clean, plus the location is just a short walk to the the BTS and Sukhumvit... but there is a large construction project nearby, as well as the noise from the road can be disturbing, if you are a light sleeper.
Good location, clean and nice staffs. Nice view of bangkok from the balcony.
Good location. Staffs are nice. Clean and good facility. Nice view from the balcony.
Good location. Clean and nice biew from the balcony.

Fine to stay. But, Hotel need to take more care about room preparation and hygiene...Was arrived to hotel, pretty late night. But, My room was not 100% prepared to stay.But, they did fave other room for me with apologize.So, was fine to stay there, 2 night.
great location, value and super friendly staff!

reviews.review_title: A FIVE STAR HOTEL WITH NO HOT WATER?”

Recommended

everything you need is around you
Good location. Very clean, Professional staff
Worst location in the hotel and the view of a parking garage and a working construction crane

reviews.review_title: Good hotel in Ploenchit and Childlom station”
reviews.review_comment: Nice location and so clean

reviews.review_title: Not as organized as I had hoped ”
reviews.review_comment: My name was nit in the lists at the airport for car service (hand written) nor at the covid test room at hotel. They had bar coded stickers for the test swabs, but for me she had to hand write it. This creates undo stress during this very specific processing time. Also there was a used shampoo bottle in n my shower which leads me to wonder how thorough their decontamination process is.
Had a great stay at the Grande Centre Point Ploenchit. Perfect location and great rooms.
good relaxing

A stark barren hotel in a great location, if things were only open. It’s a modern hotel but without guests the hard furnishings make it look stark, barren and bleak. The hotel was virtually empty but they put me in a room at the back overlooking a construction site. The TV channel options were rubbish only the BBC news channel was worth watching, no movie or entertainment channels, maybe they are saving money on TV subscriptions?? The Wi-Fi signal was good but kept dropping out. I was the only guest in the restaurant for dinner and breakfast, the food was mediocre and Luke warm. The pumpkin soup I had as a starter for dinner was tasteless and breakfast the next day was pretty naff and at 3 star standard of choice and taste. I was really looking forward to a 5 star breakfast. The free mini bar was a packet of chips, a packet of nuts, a coke and a small box of juice. Two saving points the location, near by the Irish Embassy and the BTS and the helpfulness of the check in staff.

The staff made the quarrantine painless and a breeze to get through. All of the staff at the hotel were accommodating of any request, wonderfully polite and concerned about our comfort during the challenge of being confined for 14 days. if you need to serve quarantine i highly recommend this hotel if you are like me and value doing yhings the easy way. this is the hotel for you.
Overall is the best experience but room need a bit cleaning as I can see some dust on the floor

this hotel is very handy to the US Embassy (among others) and is my hotel of choice when I need any US Citizen related services. The overnight rooms are on the small side, but exceptionally clean. Staff is very friendly and helpful.

I had to get out of my condo and was looking for somewhere convenient to stay. They kindly upgraded my room and I had a washing machine and a little kitchen, which really helped me to set up a base for the duration of my stay. The staff were super kind and very on it; if I asked for housekeeping or room service they worked to help straight away. I understand that this was during COVID times so they weren't as busy, but I presume they would do the same great things regardless. Thank you so much for having me!
Easy location for my business access and close to bts and shopping. Staff is always smiling and easy to communicate with even my Thai language skill is very little.

reviews.review_title: Very nice room and great view ”

good for long stay
Not quite as good as it good be
everything its perfect staff take care good room very clean i come stay here 3 time when i go to bangkok because near BTS and not far Mall
Beautiful hotel. It smells amazing and the staff is super nice. It definitely feels like a 4 star hotel with the facilities and room service. The spa right upstairs is also wonderful.
Big room,clean , convenient Highly recommend
Good service
Great location, facilities —professionals!
Great place to stay
2nd time staying. Staff and hotel are great. Will be using another hotel in their chain in BKK for my ASQ hotel in near future. Thanks for another great stay

Great hotel and service. The room was very spacious and clean. The kitchen was very useful and the fridge can hold a lot of groceries. The laundry machine can be used to wash and dry so that was very convenient. The bad part about the room is that their door blinds does not make the room pitch black. When the sun comes up, the room will be very bright so it wasn't good for people who don't usually wake up in the morning. Then there is also the construction and traffic noise. The room is not sound proof, had it been sound proof the room would have been close to perfect. Every morning around 6AM the traffic noise is too loud that I tend to wake up and not have a perfect 8 hour sleep. I would definitely return but I rather choose the room that is furthest away from traffic.
Comfy room, friendly staffs and close to everything we need
Great city view. Clean and spacious room.
