reviews.review_comment: Even at a massive 75% discount... this barely compares with others in the same price range. It's the time of COVID and low expectations, but had I paid more... I would be extremely disappointed. Heaven forbid had we paid the full asking price... a generic, bland refitted older room with little character. Facilities of a lesser level of stars. A Vanilla experience (so far).

We needed a get away close to the South African embassy. This place was perfect. Beautiful room with a nice view of the city. We were very comfortable there. VERY comfortable. In fact we didn’t want to leave the room. Lol I wouldn’t mind going back there again.
Best price and excellent service for downtown Bangkok.
Hotel is very well located near BTS station and luxury shopping mall. Staff is super nice and attentive. Room super clean and spacious. Great stay. We will be back.
Old facility
Clean comfortable rooms with excellent bathroom. Tranquil communal areas.
Good and fantastic.
big room with reasonable price. location is good. we will come back again.
The property is located near many tourist attraction places, easy to commute by BTS. The property provide full facility for relaxation.
With the corona virus everything in the hotel was closed. The discount we were given wasn’t enough. The hotel went from being a 5 star hotel to a 2 star hotel yet it was still charging 4 star rates

If you come to Thailand, stay here。 The surroundings are not noisy and it is convenient to go anywhere. There is also a minimal gym, especially the pool where you can swim comfortably. The hotel staff is also kind and polite。 The rooms are also clean and you can spend comfortably. The price is so low that you may be a little anxious when you visit for the first time, but you will be impressed by the more luxurious entrance and appearance, and the larger room than you might imagine。 Cost performance is outstandingly good. I want to stay again.

extreamly helpful staff and very diligent during the outbreak. Everyone checked for fevers, plenty of hand sanitizer around busy areas and kept very clean. rooms are well maintained and look recently renovated. very well thought out room designs with fantastic color choice. bathroom floor gets a bit wet from the shower but it dries quickly, none issue. perfect hotel.
the best hotel i have stay in Bangkok, close to everything you need, the rooms are tidy, clean and modern
Been there for the third time. Always high standards, fantastic hotel.

reviews.review_title: Facing a large construction site just right below room balcony”
reviews.review_comment: First Don't mix up this hotel with another Grande Centre Point Hotel at Ratchadamri nearby, same name, huge different. We stayed in both and found out hugh different. This hotel's entrance locates at a main road with very heavy traffic like a highway. First we were attracted by its images so we booked two nights, but disappointed upon arrival. Pros: Friendly reception staffs and grand lobby, the sofa and colour tone in the room are comfortable. Cons: - Two narrow small single beds in our room with no more than 75-90cm(w), don't match with its lobby and price; - Construction site where room balcony was facing, could hear machinery noise & can hardly read a book on the balcony bench; - The journey between Ploenchit BTS station and hotel entrance is quite unpleasant, despite noise and smell from heavy vehicles, the bridge walkway of staton exit and the road is only connected by a LONG narrow metal staircase, had seen many family travellers struggled with luggage and small kids.

reviews.review_title: Nice Staff but Location not suitable for people which couldn't walk freely.”
reviews.review_comment: Staff: very helpful and accommodating Location: near BTS, but if is not suitable for people which couldn't walk freely. To Phloen Chi BTSt: No sidewalk/ escalator, ... you must need walk to bts station by Staircase To Chit Lom: need walk around 10min, but the road is bad

Close to shopping and restaurants and BTS. Hotel was clean and the pool was great! Hotel staff at the front desk were really helpful with directions. I appreciated the snacks in the room. Would definitely stay here again.

Location is very close to train station (2 stops from Siam) and one of the upscale shopping mall, very convenient. Premises is clean and tidy. Hotel staffs are very helpful and friendly. Breakfast menu selections is good. However, In Room dining should be improve. Overall rating is satisfactory.

Beautiful lobby, spacious room with balcony, comfortable beds. Nice to have complimentary coffee at the lobby. Friendly staff. Great location just across central embassy and a 20min walk to CentralWorld. Would definitely come back to this hotel.
Very nice and clean hotel. The smell of sweet flowers when you walk into the lobby and greeted by friendly staff. Great breakfast buffet.
Except a noise at night time because of motorbike

reviews.review_comment: Stayed for a "test and go". Airport pickup and PCR test efficiently done. Could not fault the staff. Room was good. Bed big and comfortable. Food was excellent. A good choice for a hotel close to the airport.
Very good especially with the shar+ PCR test very helpful and friendly staff
GOOD HOTEL I ENJOY

Everything from quick testing, polite and courteous staff to get amenities and a lovely queen bed! Food was great and had many options. It was a short stay but wonderful time. Credit where credit is due.
Food test horrible Let me check out with out give me result

reviews.review_title: SHA+ and PCR test and go”
reviews.review_comment: I was here for less than 12 hours. Everything was excellent. Swab test as soon as you enter the lobby, then off to my room. Good food brought to me, and as soon as my negative test results were in, I escaped.
Great service,

Staff couldn’t do more for us during our one night stay to do PCR which they did for us and it was not that unpleasant as we was nervous about that. Got our result within 6 hours so we got to explore Bangkok before our flight early next day
Stay in this hotel during my test & go 1st day quarantine.Room was clean & big. Food was nice. We have a very comfortable quarantine stay.
The hotel provided meals, but they were basically inedible - cold and unpleasant. Luckily we tested negative fairly quickly so didn’t have to keep eating them! Staff were v friendly.

Smooth pickup from airport in spite of late arrival, Covid test done immediately on arrival at 2:00 AM, good food , and results of test back at 10:30 AM, very quick! Room was very nice and clean. Staff were helpful and polite, as we have found all Thai people to be! Highly recommend!

As a basic Hotel it was O.K. but I stayed during T&G status imposed during COVID, there were no facilities available that they advertise, they rip you off for a beer which is available from the near by 7 eleven for fraction of the cost. The T&G food was basic but O.K. But in my honest opinion a 2 star hotel masquerading as a 4 star.
Staffs very nice and friendly and the hotel nice and Clean you should try this hotel . Savitree
The staff at this hotel are fabulous.
serve in room dinner late
Hotel is close to the Airport 15 to 20 minutes by Taxi,
Stayed family of 4 for day 1 test and go. Great service, great food deliverd straight to room, clean big family room, nice pool and friendly staff. Highly recommended!

Our second stay here. Close to the airport. Very convenient, very well organised. PCR on arrival at hotel, choose from menu, Good food including vegan option, left outside room during isolation. If arriving before 10am RT-Pcr comes back before 3pm. Highly recommend Clean/ friendly staff for budget hotel what else do you need!

reviews.review_title: First and last time I stay here ”
reviews.review_comment: For the money paid the menu was rubbish The beer to expensive I asked for a metre taxi when by magic they had one on site no meter 300 baht to airport Rip off city this hotel
food was great
Spacious and clean rooms
"This is my first time stayed at this hotel. Nice location. I love the tv channel, many programs choices. Overall, it's good. "

The staffs were really polite and helpful, replied promptly to requests and made sure the taxi driver knew where we were headed upon checking out. The hotel itself really needs some work done, the toilet wasn’t flushing properly, and there were ants everywhere.
This hotel is truly world class. Excellent location, luxurious rooms, friendly staff, really should be considered a 5-star hotel.

The staff is extremely helpful. The hotel was very clean. The food options were good. The location is also very near BKK Airport. Regarding the staff, one example of how good they are is that once they found out I am a vegetarian, they suggested meals they could create for me. Highly recommended
Spacious and clean rooms
I quarantined here. The food was great with several options. The staff was very accommodating and helped with whatever I needed.

The SHA Offering is quite exorbitant compared to other hotels. The food arrives in Pre Packed Containers, Ice Cold. Don't order Eggs, unless you like it cold. The hotel is itself quite dated. Dark passages make it look like a ghost hotel. Mediocre Bath and Shower facilities. Water is a bit cold. Location is good. Name can be confusing also known as Good atime hotel by Taxi Drivers. Overall 2.5 🌟
Its all about the service! Friendly, gracious and caring.
Stayed just to comply with SHA requirements

Initially the service weren't up to expectation but after I wrote in about what could have make it better the management really took it seriously and the service improve tremendously. yes. I will return again and recommend to others.

reviews.review_title: It is truly value for money!!”
reviews.review_comment: We will travel to Bangkok once or twice a year and this is our first time staying with this hotel. From the entrance to the hotel room, everything is great! The staff is superb helpful and friendly.. Location is very good, driving distance 5 mins to air port. The room is very clean and comfortable, air-con is good enough. Just the bed a bit too soft to my friend. We will definitely back to this hotel in our next trip!
Great hotel Great service Clean we stay for 1 night test and go ,We very please with all service . Thank you very much and yes we would like to go back and stay again if we visit the Bangkok .
The massive plus in this hotel is their customer service. They are a real joy. Looking forward to my next visit.
Very nice service and staffs are all efficient
"A friendly comfortable hotel with excellent staff throughout. Great bed and pillows, excellent toiletries, great food selection. Always reliable, always impressive. "
"No complaints, staff were friendly and helpful "
Very good hotel
Great customer service

I was a very good experience to stay in this hotel. I was arrived at late night flight, and did not want to take too much time to travel to Bangkok downtown at the midnight. When I arrived the airport, the hotel staff was already there to pick us up to the hotel, it took only around 20mins, then we can have a hot shower then go sleep. The hotel room is big and clean. The bed is cozy, too. The staffs are very help and freindly. I definately will stay in this hotel again.

A vast improvement on my last stay at this hotel. Good shuttle service from and to the airport. The driver was friendly and spoke excellent English. Check-in was prompt and I was allowed access to the room at 12.30pm rather than the stated 2pm. Worth booking the superior room. Would recommend for a one night stopover.
Great rooms, lovely staff. Pool is a bit small but lovely. Gym was well equipped. Will stay again

My husband and I chose this hotel as his entry point into Thailand. We arrived at one in the morning, get picked up at the airport, and then taken to the hotel for a Covid test. We were greeted with welcoming smiles, and information regarding the Covid protocols. Everything was very smooth, food was delicious
The staff are very friendly and helpful the room is clean and it takes only 15mins to the international airport
The stay was excellent. I'll be back
The hotel is just 10 mins from the airport. Took me only 1 hour from landing to covid test at the hotel and then my room. Extremely efficient arrival process
I stayed here for quarantine. I found the room very good. It's spacious and I slept really well on the bed. The location isn't far from the Airport. The food was also very good.
Superb Hotel nice and clean with very helpful staff it was a joy to stay in this Hotel and would highly recommend it

"Stayed in Siam mandarina during my business trip. The staff was very attentive even though I check in around late night. The room was great and newly furnish. The bathroom was fantastic. This is a hotel that I would recommend to anyone whom worked near airport and want to stay before next flight "
"Very comfortable, relaxing and overall great stay in this hotel. Great service from the staff. Nice facilities. Great food. Location is very good!! Highly recommended!!! "
Little expensive but worth it I think. Great friendly staff. Great Location. Rooms not very big but modern and well laid out. Great High Beds. Guest Friendly for the single guys. Would stay again !!
Breakfast was amazing, as well as the pool and spa facilities
Stayed with my family here. Couldn't be better. Staff was attentive, and the food that comes with Test & Go package was very good
I spent one night at this hotel. Food is good as well as the staffs.
I'd recommend you to try Hashme Cafe in front of the hotel. They serve nice drinks and food there
All can say is Stay was beautiful, Staff helpful.. and Foodies Great ..Rooms where Neatly prepared and clean
Great location near the airport, great food, great service. Had a lovely time staying here with my sister. Staff are nice and friendly.

Everything about this hotel was perfect from the moment we arrived to the moment we got our taxi to the airport. It's been challenging travelling during Covid but this hotel made everything hassle free, from picking us up from the airport, taking us to get our test at the hotel and to getting out results to us within a few hours. Their overall hospitality was faultless.

It was a great experience and loved everything. Will definitely come back again.particularly the reservation team was amazing. The restaurant in front of hotel serve a great variety with good and quality service.

I am very happy that I chose this hotel for my quarantine. Everything was very efficient and professional right from the booking process to my departure. Will recommend this hotel to anyone who needs to do quarantine or even under normal circumstances
it's a great location, wonderful staff, quiet, clean and comfortable. I also enjoyed Hashme Cafe in front of the hotel
The food was great and received a superb service from the staff. I had a good time at their Hashme Cafe
Good service and good food will definitely come back again. The staff was really nice and helpful. The room was well cleaned. The price was reasonable. One if the best hotels around this area.
"Apple salad in the Test & Go menu was 5 star "
"I've read some reviews of this hotel here about the food. I don't know why but the food here is extremely good. The taste is very good, wide variety, and good portion. I enjoyed it very much. "
The hotel allowed me to move my bookings around without any extra charge. That's particularly useful under this circumstances.

At first, I thought the price was expensive given what we get. But then seeing that it includes meals, PCR test, Antigen test kit on departure, and an airport transfer, it's actually quite worth it. I'd give it 10 out of 10 for all the things I got from the hotel.
I'm satisfied with the hotel and can recommend it to other people
The place is very clean, and the staff was pleasant.
I had a wonderful stay at Siam Mandarina Hotel. The room, the food, the facilities... everything was excellent.
Clean and nice atmosphere
We have to thanks all management of Siam Mandarina Hotel for the excellent hospitality during my stay! I find the best and friendly staff covering all my needs.
This place is amazing,so beautiful, cleanliness awesome very professional staff and also very helpful, the room was super clean and beautiful, the bed was very confortable only good comments to say

"""Stayed at Siam Mandarina Hotel for Test&Go and some additional days. The whole booking process and our questions regarding Covid measures etc. were perfectly handled. Via email and LINE we always received accurate and helpful responses quickly. "" "
The room is very clean, the bed is very comfy with great and delicious food
Hotel is nice and good value for money. Personal transfer service and good breakfast which was included.

"Closeness to airport is great, but no sound from planes. Room and bed were comfortable and as expected. I will probably return in future for over night stay near airport (pass through Bangkok 3 times per year). "
"Doorman staff are nice. Room are all clean and have bathtub everyroom. Bed are comfortable. Every room have desk for working."
The hotel was quick in their communication with me to apply for Thailand Pass. It was very confusing so to be able to get an assistance from hotel on this is great!
I stayed in this hotel under Test & Go program. It was clean,comfortable, and convenient from the Airport.
This hotel offers the care rendered to warm and genuine. They really help solve any problem one may encounter
The transportation to and from Airport was very efficient.
I would suggest a vegan food, great!
I liked breakfast here
It was good over all.
The room is very good. I am very impressed. Good service staff, beautiful view, clean rooms, excellent location.

Outstanding service by the professional, friendly staff. The hotel setting is completely sanitized and the test and go process is seamless and effortless. Rules were observed strictly. Location is perfect!

We had a wonderful stay at the Siam Mandarina Hotel. The facilities were excellent and the staff were extremely accommodating and friendly. The staff truly make this hotel a 5 star experience! I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough.
This is a great hotel. A special shout out to the staff at Hashme Cafe who was very attentive and delivers some amazing drinks for me
There is this hidden rooftop garden where you can lounge around watching planes and airport. The view is amazing. You can bring your own beer there and chill for hours.
Beautiful hotel, grand lobby, and comfortable rooms
I appreciated the warm welcome. Staffs is friendly and willing to assist with nice smile.

I've stayed in 2 different Sha Extra Plus hotels and this hotel is definitely better than them. The others seem very confused about the rules and what to do while Siam Mandarina is very clear in their communication. A shout out to their reservation team for making my entry very smooth.
First time stayed at this hotel and wasn’t disappointed. Room was nice and food was delicious.
"Location: 10 mins from Airport Rooms: very clean and nice view. Will come again,"
There was a small issue during my stay, and the management came to meet me to sincerely apologize for the mistake. I found them to be sincere and they fixed the issue for me right away.
I stayed here for a few days. The café in front of hotel is a must to visit. They serve interesting waffles and food.
Close to the airport. Super kind people. There is shuttle service to BKK airport as well
Very professional hotel and staff

When I reached the hotel, the covid test was done on the spot. I then was checked into the hotel with breeze and wait for the test result in my room. The room was comfortable and spacious. The package came with all meals except for lunch on check-out date. There were a few Western TV channels. Overall, I liked the hotel very much.

hotels.name: Aspira Hana Residence Thong Lor (SHA Plus+)
hotels.address: 66 Soi Thonglor 23, Khlongtan Nuer, Watthana, Sukhumvit, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110

reviews.review_comment: All perfect. The only problem is that Agoda doesn't include full board in its package. As this is a serviced apartment - no room service - you have to bring your own food. Book direct with Aspira Hana or make your own food arrangements.

reviews.review_title: Great option for ASQ Hotel in Bangkok”
reviews.review_comment: Nice Boutique hotel down a small SOI near many local restaurants and shops. Not very close to BTS, but Grab makes it easy to get around. Shop for snacks before arrival. There is no restaurant or vending machines on site.

reviews.review_title: Great space, minimum service for quarantine ”
reviews.review_comment: Great hotel for space, and comfort. The room is big however the view if just the wall of next building for most rooms. Staff is very nice and tries to help, however this hotel does not treat its guests optimally. Decent choice for quarantine but not recommended for comfort nor great service
Friendly staff, clean rooms. One big negative is there is no view. Just a big brick wall outside your window. Make the rooms dark.

We booked Aspira Hana as an alternative quarantine hotel and stayed in the 2 bedroom apartment. The apartment itself was not bad, decently furnished with 2 small balconies mostly occupied by the air conditioning units but still can go out to take fresh air. This is not our first quarantine in Bangkok so I have ground to compare. The food quality had nothing to do with what we had during our previous quarantines. Though there was a menu with 4 choices, the food photos on the menu had nothing to do with the reality. The portions were small and the quality of food was low. It was delivered from somewhere at random, sometimes odd times. For example, lunch between 12pm and 2 pm, dinner between 6 and 8 pm. One day they even forgot to bring us lunch and when we called, they found some excuses with the hotel from which the were ordering the food. Then they sent us one Cesar salad consisting of 3-4 lettuce leaves and some bread crumps. The box was labelled for other room - probably some leftover. For paying 11,000+ THB per night, everyone will expect better service. But the biggest issue was after we checked out. We received the PCR test results at checkout but they did not give us the Release letters. I wrote them 4 times including all 5 email addresses, from the initial booking email exchange. All my emails were complete ignored, none of the 5 email address replied anything. The release letters are important, as they are usually requested by the employer or if you want stay in another hotel, they will ask you to present the release letter at check-in. But apparently the guys from Aspira Hana do not care. I wonder how they managed to get their AQ license as this release letter is mandatory to issue. Anyway, I will never book any hotel from the Aspira chain.

The 1-BR suite is perfect for quarantine, and includes laundry and TVs in both rooms. There's not much to do, and you cannot use the gym, so be prepared to bring what you need. Apple TV, computer, hobbies, bluetooth music player, etc. The food was just okay, monotonous. Use GRAB and other delivery services to supplement, bring in coffee, etc. There are great Michelin rated street-food restaurants in the area... and GRAB can bring it to you.

Spend my quarantine time in Aspira Hana and would highly recommend. Choose a Deluxe Balcony room which was more like a 1 bedroom flat. Everything worked out like a treat from pick up from the airport to the food.
TV channels could be updated! For europeans there is no actual programs. Wlan is wery good.

This was a nice place to stay. Our one complaint was the smell. When we stepped out of the elevator on the third floor the smell of mold hit us. Our room was not an exception to smell. I don’t think it was what you would call a strong smell of mold but we would rather not have any.

Location is great for those familiar with the city, who wants tranquillity. Not the most convenient for die-hard tourists who'd prefer malls and crazy traffic right at their doorstep. Aspire is apartment en-suite style so there's ample room to manoeuvre. Clean and efficiently staffed. Enjoyable stay.
My reservation was canceled by the hotel the day before my departure and we were moved to a worse hotel. I write the Hotel from the reservation some emails, but no one answer.
Clean good big room cheap

Due to the "Moronic" strain of Virus our ASQ Quarantine was upped from 10 days to 14 days and an extra levy of 10,200 baht. My wife and I were locked up for for 24 hrs a day. We only got 45 mins respite on the 4th day, up on the roof pool/gym area. We had to give our body temperatures twice a day to the hotel Nurse. We had 3 fairly invasive PCR test on day 1, 6, & 12. ( thankfully All Negative ). There was No cleaning of the room, but they did change bath towels once. The Food was enough but rather Bland, not as portraid on the Menu Boards in room. The rooms are promoted as having a Balcony....! Well yes they do have, but they are Recesed into the room and occupied by Two Air conditioners, but there is No view anyway, only overlooks back yards and roofs of old buildings down a little alleyway off Surkhamvit Road. So all in all it served its purpose to promote Cabin Fever but I would'nt recommend it for Tourists long Stay . But hey...you get what you pay for.

reviews.review_title: Excellent for a safe stay in COVID times”
reviews.review_comment: When we arrived to the hotel the staff very professionally did the PCR test taking all the logical precautions, the room was very comfortable and well maintained, with a kitchen and other appliances, and even Netflix, perfect to spend the mandatory 1 day quarentine, the food was so so but considering the prices is understandable.

The hotel decided to conduct repair work on the block throughout the day for at last two days of the ten days of my quarantine. I complained to reception, but they could not stop the work, as the owner of the hotel had mandated it. This is typical of smaller hotels in Thailand where the staff are not informed of decisions made by arrogant uncaring owners and we all have to endure the inconvenience of their thoughtless decisions. The noise from the work drove us all crazy and there was nothing we could about it! Most frustrating!
Nice and easy, everything on time 👍
Food was lacking. Room View was not desirable. Staff was fantastic, helpful and knowledgeable about Covid Quarantine procedures.

1 day quarantine. Room and bed okay but no information non so ever in the room. How to call front desk? No info. Tv channels? No info and only Thai channels. Time for meals serving? No info. Any choise of ordering food from outside. No info. No instant black coffee, just ready mix with cream and sugar. Tee and sugar we had to ask for. Food was really bad and no choises. This hotel have a lot to learn about service. Far to expensive for what you get. Never again.
I stayed here for a 1 night quarantine package. Staff is nice. Room is cozy and comfortable. Food is provided but small portion. Overall I’m happy with the stay.

I was using this hotel for SHA quarantine purposes, The staff was very polite and service minded and friendly and took good care of the mandatory covid process. But I must mention the real low quality of food which was catered by a nearby hotel. Cold Pad Thai for lunch and as a diner 10(!) cold french fries with 2 cold mini toasts in a plastic container accompanied with a can of coke Mind the micro wave wasn't functioning. To get this served with a 150GBP nightly rate is ridiculous. Good food isn't expensive in Thailand. a shame and bad first impression for anyone who makes an effort to visit Thailand.
Pick up at airport was very friendly and fast, check in flawless, food was fine, wifi connection very good and fast, check out very flexible. Would definitely recommend!
Just here for the ASQ. Was fine and did the job, but unable to explore/use the facilities for obvious reasons. (Quarantine)
Did the job for the ASQ stuff. Was not able to fully explore the property for obvious reasons.

From start to finish, everyone was so helpful and kind. We had to book a quarantine package last minute and this is the only place we contacted that was willing to work with us. Really saved us a lot of headache and money. Room was very clean and well-stocked. Several reviews so there are no microwaves but our room did have one. The whole quarantine and testing process was very professional.

We are doing a ten day quarantine. We have two full rooms and a large bath room with a deep tub. The rooms are spotless. The staff are courteous and helpful. The food is premier Thai dishes. There is a large handy picture menu in our room with 42 different Thai dishes to choose from. There are also many western style dishes. My only complaint is the air quality. The floor we are on and our room smell like mold. I suspect it’s the air conditioning units. We don't have a view but we also didn’t have to pay what some pay for the very best hotels.
Food came mostly cold and smaller portions. Also cablevision was an issue.
It is like I stayed in one-bedroom flat. It provides everything you need for a long stay. The electrical appliances have been well maintained, and they are clean.

Aspira Hana is very close to my house. I chose it for the location and because the rooms have a balcony, a separate living area, a work desk and a kitchenette with full size fridge, microwave, kettle and washing machine. All are very important when you are effectively confined to your room. Aspira Hana had pre-ordered western food for my first day - it's the standard Thai idea of what western food might be. But now I'm making my own choices, Thai food is much better. Excellent fresh fruit every day too. Bring your own cutlery and crockery or have a friend deliver it for you. Otherwise it's all plastic disposable.
The room has a washing machine, a refrigerator and a microwave. these are good for quarantine stay.

We booked the 15-day quarantine package. Communication by email with the hotel was quick and competent. Upon arrival at BKK Airport, the free shuttle bus was already waiting for us. Until then, the process is excellent. Upon arrival at the hotel the staff showed up is very friendly and helpful. The quarantine measures are implemented very well here. Our booked suite is nicely furnished and has everything you need for 14 days. The rooms are very clean and tidy. The food can be selected from four different offers per meal on the previous day and is really very tasty, varied and plentiful. Plates and cutlery are available in the mini kitchen and, if necessary, the food can be reheated in the microwave. the kitchen staff also sends fruit and an additional salad to the room every day, sometimes even ice cream. I am very pleasantly surprised by the hotel crew, in times of the corona pandemic, and I feel safe and in good hands. 5 stars from me for the hotel team and the quarantine package

Great experience for my 2 week quarantine. Everything was done well from the room, the food and the service. The space - I had a suite with a bedroom and a kitchen / living room, Im so glad that I booked the extra space. It was a real game changer for my productivity, rather than spending a lot of time on my bed. The food - the 2 - 3 local restaurants that delivered daily meals had good tasty food options for the 2 weeks, Id prefer some extra vegetable or fruit options (I eat a lot of them) but that's me. The service - the support staff and especially Tian, who was my main point of contact, were fantastic. Clear communication and always happy to help me to get what I needed. Overall - I'd highly recommend as a ASQ, especially in this price range plus I will stay again the next time I am spending time here in Bangkok.

I have done ASQ three times and this was the best so far, even though I was prohibited from leaving the room for the entire stay. If you can't avoid ASQ I would recommend this. Small but very nice suite, good choice of food.

reviews.review_title: Pretty good choice for the money ”
reviews.review_comment: Pros - separate bedroom, washing machine, fridge/freezer, microwave, decent wifi, a handful of English tv stations, location is great for ordering food delivery, comfortable bed, comparing to other places the price was good, enough space for yoga or small fitness, lots of space for your baggage Cons - our room had a tiny balcony that faced a building, very limited sky view from a small bedroom window, they removed all cooking gear in kitchen, the food quality and choices could be improved

reviews.review_title: Overall a decent required quarantine location ”
reviews.review_comment: Food was good, staff was nice, room was clean. If you needed any additional supplies, they were accommodating. The one drawback was inconsistent internet and the advertised Netflix did not always work. Overall, since you have to be somewhere quarantined, this is a good place to go.

Officious and unhelpful customer service. Poor room cleanliness esp of a/c not fixed Multiple issues regarding food panda delivery 3 meals per day are small, boring and lack freshness. Expensive for what it is. Would never recommend to friends or family.

Good option for Thailand ASQ for 2 adults. We liked that the room is split into two sections (bedroom and living room) so we were able to work at the same time during quarantine. Having a washing machine and microwave in unit was convenient as well. Food options were not expansive, but all the Thai food tasted great. The hotel staff were great and very willing to help answer any questions or requests as needed. However, the room itself was a bit dated. The sofa in the living room was not comfortable at all, but it was ok given the situation of an ASQ.

reviews.review_title: ASQ in Aspira Hana was great”
reviews.review_comment: My husband and I had enough space in the room. Even for doing some work outs on a yoga mat. Everything worked properly (fridge, micorwave, washing machine, TV, hair dryer). Food was very good. Bed was very comfortable. Staff was very nice and helpful. We really liked it a lot.

I haven't had the chance to use the facilities due to the quarantine, but this place is perfect for a 15 days quarantine. The staff is impeccable and very responsive. I have a small balcony with birds chirping all day long; it is quiet and I have arranged a bit the layout of the living room: it feels like home!

I stayed here for my 7 day mandatory quarantine. The room was learge, like a suite. The balcon was small. The staff for super nice. The food was quite good as they provided 3 meals per day, which was more than enough. The selection of food items was very good.

Everything has been great during my quarantine stay but internet connection was not the most reliable one. Internet was out for 4+ hours one day in the middle of the quarantine stay, which is not east.
Stayed for ASQ and couldn't fault it, microwave, washing machine, balcony, fridge, 2 rooms, 2 TV's, good food and extremly friendly, helpful staff. Very good value for money!

Well equipped service apartment, good enough size for a pleasant stay. Staff (esp. front/reception) are very friendly & courteous. However, it would be very good if there are complimentary toiletries provided (e.g. toothbrush/paste, razor) that fortunately I bring mine with me. Bathtub has no proper glass barrier (too short a length) or curtain so the floor is usually wet having a shower. Overall, a very satisfying stay.
I have booked and drove there and then they told me the car park is full!
Ideal, perfect room size. It could not be better for this purpose. Highly recommended!
Very clean, helpful staff, good food. Good value for money. I highly recommend.
I like these equipment
Too often to stay at Aspira Hana there is simply a cozy 2nd home to me, during Covid 19 many regular faces have gone, what's a miss. Hoping they will return soon. Always recommend here to anyone.
SO SO~
Nice quiet place and big bath tub
A cozy place to stay with great facilities and friendly services

Having been staying at Hana Thonglor for many years. Very sadly like many Hotels and Apartments they have had to reduce staff. The staff at Hana are the most genuine, kind and generous staff you will find in Thailand. They go out of their way to make your stay very comfortable. They have very strict safety measures in place to deal with the current situation. But this does not interfere with their incredibly generous and personal hospitality. You will not find better accommodations in Bangkok. Stay here and see for your self.

I have been staying many years and would not stay any where. Rooms are always spotless, staff are friendly and professional and their approach to safety measures in the current climate is second to none. If you can find a place better than Hana, I’ll send you a reward, impossible!!

reviews.review_title: Comfy and warm service apartment in Thonglor district”
reviews.review_comment: I always enjoy my stay in Hana Residence, the friendly impeccable services with spotless clean spacious room and comprehensive facilities that provided a pleasant stay to me as ever. The F/O Ms. Ploy, Ms. Maprang and Ms. Nana are the gems in the premise, highly appreciated for their always best caring during my last stayed.

reviews.review_title: A great comfy small service apartment @Thonglor 23”
reviews.review_comment: Always great there, please be alerted of Thai Government policy during Covid 19.

reviews.review_title: Some unpredicted arrangement during our stay, all bcos of COVID 19”
reviews.review_comment: Be honest, Hana Residence is always my favorite place to stay whilst in BKK, due to current Covid 19 affected in Thailand, something were unpleasant and unpredicted, i.e. the premise do extra sanitization regularly (an extra bonus), several floor were lockdown to prevent of non-regular guests to stay (high caution), during to government instructions the gym, swimming pool & sauna + shuttle service have to suspend for use. So it is quite abnormal and inconvenient, wishing all of us could stay away from Covid 19, would be very keen to return ing to Hana Residence soon.

reviews.review_title: Perfect place to stay in Thonglor/in town!”
reviews.review_comment: WE LOVED THIS PLACE! 2 parents and 2 you g children stayed very comfortably in this one bedroom apartment with living room and kitchen. The bed was surprisingly big enough to fit all of us? Thought someone was going to take the couch! There were even 2 TVs with Netflix installed. On google maps it says to drive into Thonglor Soi 25, but go into Soi 23 better. 7/11 and main Thonglor road a short walk from the apartment. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Limited parking and we didn’t get a chance to check out the pool and gym upstairs. Will be back!
Real nice studio/appt. Wel equipped. Cool area. Tucked in a small street, quiet, yet close to everything.
Been stayed almost 5 consecutive months, good service, comfy bed, spotless room. But the air con is somewhat noisy and WiFi network is unstable. Just minor issues to me, will repeat stay soon.

reviews.review_title: Cost place, walk to local eateries”
reviews.review_comment: Location is not near to Sky train but there is a every 1.5hr 1 way transfer via hotel Tuktuk to BTS sky train station

one of the best serviced apartment option in bangkok. location is perfect for city tour, food and shopping, very neat and clean pictures are exactly the same as shown in agoda, and very friendly and wellcoming staff. i highly recommend this property has everything you need.

Repeatedly stayed over 5 months there, overall is up to satisfactory, friendly staff and attentive service as always. If they do care much more of the air conditioning issues would be a great improvement.

reviews.review_title: Always my favorite ones in Thonglor area”
reviews.review_comment: Wonderful front desk officers and housekeepers, they always made my stayed a pleasant ones. Hoping to improve the frequency of shuttle bus service as there only serve o/w on every 1 1/2 hr from 0800 to 1700, besides that all is fine.

reviews.review_title: Warm and friendly place to stay”
reviews.review_comment: Great staff, spacious and spotless clean apartment inside Thonglor soi 23

Has Netflix and clothes washing machine. Shuttle bus service is only every 2 hrs and no option to pick up. Not to far to walk to shops BTS is a bit of a hike but plenty to look at on the way. Staff were realy nice and friendly apart from one lady on reception that refused ever request. After asking other staff they were happy to help. Had cooking facilities but had to ask for pots and such. Overall happy to stay here. Netflix and washing machine ++++
Cozy and warm home feel apartment

reviews.review_title: Used to be my best, presently could be better”
reviews.review_comment: Great front desk staff K. Maophan, K. Ploy and K. Nana, they are all wonderful people. Will be back soon.

Spacious, clean, tidy and comfy apartment. Sun tanning and swimming on the rooftop. Nice and helpful staff. Location is quite far from BTS station, but bike and taxi can be easily found in the alley. It's definitely a good stay in Thong Lor.

reviews.review_title: Been loyalty to this premise over 4 months”
reviews.review_comment: Been repeatedly and consecutively stay in this Hana Residence in the past 4 months, I've enjoyed my stay there as always. Little bit disappointed, I had decided to checking out due to the price increasement during CNY was doubled, as there got lot of higher grade/ better places to select within this price range. Nevertheless, I would express my heartfelt thankful to Khun Ploy, Khun Maopran, Khun Nana , Khun ADul and the housekeepers as their truly friendly hospitality was always made me feel warm and welcome, I'd be happy to return again someday.

Unfortunately upon arriving at the hotel I was told the air conditioning unit was broken in this space. I had been looking forward to this staying in this residence, and was disappointed. While the staff was friendly and apologetic, and moved me to a sister hotel, the Aspira Tropica hotel, I did not find that I had much choice in where I could be switched to, especially given the last minute circumstances. While I was told the room I was given was of equal value, I do not think it matched this room at the Thong Lo. This was my first experience with Aspira, and while I'm sure my experience was an exception and not the norm, I will not be staying at any Aspira hotel again.

reviews.review_title: A cozy comfy service apartment with excellent services ”
reviews.review_comment: Been repeatedly stay in Hana Residence almost 4 months, it gonna be a proven record to express how good it is.

reviews.review_title: Probably you don't want to leave there”
reviews.review_comment: Impeccable services with comfort spacious room + full facilities in reasonable price. NO other choice to me.
Lovely place for long stay, excellent staff and good security, we feel safe and warm on every visit.

reviews.review_title: As good as always, excellent staff”
reviews.review_comment: I am so delighted to return soon.
Repeat guest, a place with friendly warm hospitality that we prefer most.

reviews.review_title: A hidden gem in Thonglor area”
reviews.review_comment: I always have a pleasant stay in Hana, their staff are extremely courtesy and helpful, from F/O, Guards to Housemaids, thank you for their impeccable services. Will back again soon.
Very kind staff...
NIce apartment with all I needed.
Access to refresh in a Rooftop Pool, Sauna or Mini Gym & unwind from City Activities is awesome for wellness & wellbeing.
Been repeated stay over a month, there is the solid evidence to.proof how good is it.
Comfort, Cozy, Elegance, Friendly Hospitality. I could have a pleasantly stay as always.

reviews.review_title: A hidden gem behind soi thonglor”
reviews.review_comment: A place that I wouldn't mind to repeat stay. Great staff and spotless clean premise.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite serviced apartment in Bangkok ”
reviews.review_comment: I've repeatedly accommodated in this place more than a month, no hesitation to recommend any.

reviews.review_title: A cozy serviced apartment with friendly services ”
reviews.review_comment: For anyone prefer of thonglor district hana residence is a wise choice.
Cozy, friendly, comfy and fairly pricing, I got my loyalty with this place.

reviews.review_title: Newly trendy serviced apartment in Thonglor area”
reviews.review_comment: Accommodation was pleasant and comfort, but parking spaces were inadequate need to park on the alley sometime, afterall it is okay. Room without balcony is a minus.
A hideaway gem in thonglor area, I always enjoyed my stay at Hana Residence. The security guards are so attentive and helpfully.

reviews.review_title: Superb accommodation, I don't want to leave there”
reviews.review_comment: I have kept extending my stay @Hana Residence over a month, do I have to describe more? I felt so comfort and cozy there.

reviews.review_title: An elegant service apartment in Thonglor District”
reviews.review_comment: Repeatedly stay in Hana Residence almost 2 months, it's a comfy cozy place to stay. Staff is friendly and courtesy. Only 1 minus is the gym and sauna close at 8 pm. It would be not easy to catch on time after daily working hours. Hoping could extend to 9 pm.
Always enjoy my stay at Hana Resident, it's my 2nd home in BKK. No hesitation to recommend it.
Enjoy my stay in Hana residence, I was kept extended my staying there. Impeccable n friendly services within, prehaps there would be my 2nd home once I travel to Bangkok. Will definitely return soon.
Quiet and comfortable. Facilities and renovation should be renewed and improved
A great place for me, but the.downside is I couldn't have WIFI reception for a week as.they're not willing to fix it. Then health gym, pool and sauna. closed at 8 pm is miserable.
Spacey, but smelly in sleeping area. Sofas in living area has stain. Bathroom tub and area are moldy. Far from main st. Staffs are friendly though.
Staff issues
We enjoy our time at the resident

reviews.review_title: Aspira is always a great value. Place is larger than most hotels and washer is a nice touch. ”
reviews.review_comment: Only issue was the condition of the sofas. Deep cleaning these on a regular basis would keep whatever is stained on them much cleaner for guests.

reviews.review_title: Good value for money. So clean and quite place !!I like it. ”
reviews.review_comment: I like this place. There is a nice swimming pool.

Staff can't seem to keep this place clean, or have the shuttle run often enough to make it useful, or have maintenance a manager or even a driver on duty. Lots of mold in the showers. Location makes a shuttle necessary and it doesn't run often. Staff is not particularly good at fixing problems. I even carried my room safe down to the front desk to prove a point and they told me it was normal for a room safe to not be attached to the room. The manager agreed as well. Your paying good money for a serviced apartment, so that hassles disappear. Coffee is also terrible in lobby. Owners need to come through this place and hire new staff and clean up this place to the level they are charging for.
Beautiful, elegant apartment in the heart of hip & happening Thong Lor nestled down a quiet side street. Peaceful, tastefully decorated rooms with everything you need for a comfortable stay.

Luxury, cosy serviced apartment located in the hip Thong Lor district nestled down a peaceful side street. Perfect location for all the highlights of cafes, restaurants, bars & clubs Thong Lor has to offer. I always sleep like an angel in these beds. The gym & pool are always empty. The bathtub is possibly the best I've ever had in my 22 years of traveling. The staff are all friendly & awesome.

hotels.name: Grande Centre Point Hotel Ratchadamri (SHA Extra Plus)
hotels.address: 153/2 Soi Mahatlekluang 1, Ratchadamri Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Siam, Bangkok, Thailand, 10330

reviews.review_comment: The hotel is spacious, equipped, with living room, kitchen & large bathroom. It is walking distance to malls, easy to find food. Suitable for longer stay.

Our deluxe room was very big and had everything you need. Only down side was hard bed and our mother had same problem Location to central world is great easy walk to all the shops. Pool is very nice although a later close time would be better. Staff to busy and sometimes slow
Efficient services Prime location Worth the money Friendly staff

reviews.review_title: Great hotel for a night in Bangkok ”
reviews.review_comment: Clean, friendly staff, good location and amazing pool.
Everything is good except the check in and check out are quite slow.
Great view from room and verychelful staff.

An incredible bargain. The rooms are expansive —we got a Grand Deluxe and Grand Suite, both were very spacious and well-appointed. The facilities are great, with a large pool, sauna and steam rooms, game rooms, library, and an excellent fitness center. Breakfast was great. The hotel is 500m from Erawan Shrine and the malls, and 400m from the Ratchadamri BTS station.

I’ve never seen queues at a hotel reception like this. I arrived to join a queue of 20 people waiting to be served by 4 staff members. It took forever just to check in. Every time I went to ask for help I’d have to queue again! Terrible service for an upmarket hotel.
Good location, and staff very helpful and nice. Except the hotel is a bit old, but do lent bother

For the necessary test and go Package quarantine, I chose this hotel. As always at Grande Center Point, the service worked smoothly with pick up from the airport and the following test. The staff was always friendly and helpful. Can definitely recommend this hotel.
The room was so nice, so clean, so organiced and had what i needed. I love it and wished i could stay more than just a night. Yes, 100% happy and will tell all my friends who travel to Bangkok
Nice and clean hotel Friendly staff Close to the canter of the City

Stayed for an SHA experience and was great overall. I had a long 30 hours of travel and was guided through check-in, covid test with 2 nurses, and then guided to my room by their many assistants. Quick and easy for how crowded my arrival was. I'd ask others to please be understanding about their covid process. Other customers around me were sometimes not and annoyed at the staff due to the quarantine. Even asked them to rush the results and the quarantine? I got mine back the same day. You still have to quarantine for 24 hours too either way by law... I can easily say this place deals with the process perfectly. Anyway, room service 5-page menu was great and covered 24 hours from good Thai food to burgers. Very reasonable prices for the cheaper options like the usual stir fry. If your room has a washing/dryer machine you get a daily detergent packet which usually is not included other places. Great after having sweaty clothes from the long trip washed and not in your luggage. On checkout I was given all essential documentation in a folder with a take home test if I end up feeling sick. Got brochures on hospitals and pricing. Plenty of documentation provided in the room as well. Would have stayed longer if my travels kept me in town. Will come back!
Central of the city in Bangkok, easy to get public transportation. Staffs are friendly. COVID test was not good due to lag of professional nurse.
Need a tiny bit of uplift. Shower was extremely disappointing......water was nowhere close to warm.
Value for money, grand and clean environment

Not my choice of hotel but pleased with hotel. breakfast very good, room large with washing machine/dryer, iron/board and even a heated toilet seat and bidet. Very close to Ratchadamri BTS and just 3 stations away is the airport train. Hotel to airport about $3 AUD and much quicker than taxi. Big shopping close by and felt very safe.
The room is clean with all facility you need. During the pandemic, the hotel provides full service to satisfy you when you are under quarantine. The location is great as 5 min walk to Central World.
Why .. the ART waiting is too long. A day. Some of the hotel only 4 to 6 hours. Staff service too slow
Amazing stay. All is perfect

The staff are extremely helpful and the hotel is worthy of 5 star rating. The only thing lacking is a coffee shop but there is free coffee in the foyer. Definitely worth consideration if you are looking for a hotel in Bangkok.

Hotel is in the middle of the city walkable to Central world/Pratunum/Siam. I was there for test and god so there is not much services going on to be honestly but the staff at reception is exceptional. Impressive! Recommend Recommend Recommend

Facilities and room were excellent. Arranging the Test&Go package was initially straightforward, but my travel plans changed slightly and the property was not easy to reach. I updated them in advance of my itinerary change through email and Facebook but airport pickup was not properly arranged. I also tried to call the property multiple times during office hours but they did not pick up. Fortunately the delay was not too long and staff at the airport were helpful. The PCR test results were also fast.

Staff extremely kind and helpful Room really clean and fully furnished Even washing machine, kettle and microwave. Also kitchen stove if you want to cook. Great view on the golf course from the huge window. The only thing I wish I had, was a tiny window that can be opened to let in fresh air. I just like oxygen to come in after a full night sleep. Every thing else perfect
Very friendly and helpful staff Nice looking and comfortable facilities
Love the room
Very busy hotel lots of test and go travellers. Close to everything
Very professional and friendly team. Beautiful hotel.

This was my third time in Ho Chi Min and this by far was the best hotel in which I have stayed. The rooms were beautiful, the staff was extremely helpful and friendly, the food was amazing, and the rooftop pool and bar was superb. The housekeeping staff went out of there way to ensure I had everything I needed. Looking forward to staying here again!

I was wondering how in a five star hotel got bed bugs and push shower is broken, which no one cares about. Most important no one to complain about it as no one picks up the telephone. The service is very frustrating.
Good services, Very Clean, Value for Money for quarantine, they can speak well in english
Was amazing staff was so friendly and kind hotel room was 10/10 would recommend to anyone
It have a very good service , they get back to me as soon as possible when i have issue. and they upgraded the room for me. one of the best hotel experience i have in thailand.

Hotel & room amenities are nice, had reserved a Grande Deluxe room, but upgraded to a Grand Deluxe Suite room. Comfortable & very roomy with functional kitchenette & nice extra of a mini washer / dryer Room in the room! Had great views of city skyline downtown & park area, separate bedroom nice, with same nice city skyline views. King bed was nice, but unfortunately the mattress was too firm for my tastes. Strange oddity was the bedroom flooring, not sure why, but the floor was covered with tacky, warped, vinyl sheet covering !! No idea why this was installed & looks completely tacky & out of place with rest of room ? Originally scheduled to stay for 1 night, but had to stay extra night due to on-site covid Pcr test results delayed. Test results delay mostly due to 90+ minute delay in hotel airport transportation pickup !! Hotel advertised Test & Go SHA+ room package, which included airport pickup (hotel limousine) transportation, Pcr & ATK TESTS, + breakfast &. There was one driver scheduled at airport for multiple guests arriving on same flight, hotel was extremely slow in responding to this issue, and had no additional drivers & cars available to handle overflow. Myself and multiple other guests waited almost two hours for ride, & had to make multiple phone calls to hotel just to get a car to transport to hotel. Other than this “glaring oversite”, the hotel & amenities were nice
its a wonderful hotel - but it helped because we got a massive upgrade to a great suite on the 43rd floor. The place has loads of facilities and its a handy location - very recommended

Amazing location! Close to bus stop, BTS and large shopping centres, incl. Central World, Siam, etc. Great friendly staff! The staff went above and beyond to cater to us. There is a long queue for check-in due to the large influx of tourists and the Test&go program. Beautifully decorated and clean. The room was top notch, with big bathroom, useful kitchen, and nice living room. The washing machine was very useful, with clothesline in the bathroom. Every area in the room is tiled, except the bedroom, which is carpeted (scratch myself on something in the carpet) The pool is very serene and surrounded by green trees. We would definitely stay here again when we come back to Bangkok.
Large, more like an apartment with kitchen and Living room.
Such a good hotel with value for money . Friendly and professional staff . Very convenient place to go around and room is big also . Sure will be back .

reviews.review_title: Amazing choice for test and go!”
reviews.review_comment: I was incredibly happy booking this hotel for my test and go experience. Unfortunately, I was only able to stay for one day, but if I hadn't already rented another place, I would've certainly extended my stay! 10/10
One of the most comfortable and child friendly hotel! Will defos return !
An excellent and friendly staff and excellent amenities. Very busy due to Covid requirements but they were incredibly friendly and efficient. No hotel in Canada has come close.

For the price, an exceptional value. Location was perfect, staff were extremely friendly. Received my RT PCR around 9am next morning (tested around 4pm day before). Wait was a little long to check in and check out, but can easily be overlooked by how friendly the staff were.

The hotel messed up my pickup from the airport and I had to wait more than 1 hour just to hop onboard a hired vehicle. Then while in quarantine, I ordered room service and I was told that it would arrive in 30 minutes. After 1 hour, it still didnt arrive and when I called again, I was told that they would leave it outside the door. I probed when, was told 5 minutes. I had to wait another 20 minutes for it to arrive. How could this be a 5 star service?

reviews.review_title: It’s very good location and very convenient and clean ”
reviews.review_comment: Very close by everything , all shopping mall
Friendly staff good internet speed
Nice hotel , clean comfortable bed great location .Swimming pool and sauna really nice . Only downside is no bar which i didn’t expect after a long flight you can’t get a cold beer .
the hotel service is the poorest i have seen too busy not enough staff and generally at best a 2 star hotel
Very nice service at all, no bad image

I stayed here only one night as the Covid policy to stay first night after arriving in Bangkok. Polite staffs, big room, clean, kitchen with big refrigerator but no tea spoon (I used big spoon instead), no hair dryer. (Not big deal as I had my own). Anyway I was happy to stay here and recommend…
Nice room with a wonderful view! The staff was super nice and helpful. Didn't get full points because of cleanliness.

Picked this hotel based on location and reviews. Unfortunately for me they really missed the mark with some things that would have been avoided through some basic and simple communication. Have a 7 day stay here on the tail end of my trip that I will probably cancel and move to another hotel nearby.

reviews.review_title: Best in the price with services”
reviews.review_comment: Nice to have it again
Arrived around mid-night so check-in was smooth and the PCR test was super quick. Results arrived before 9am next morning.

Grande Centre Point was my hotel on arrival in Bangkok. Everything was smooth from my midnight airport pickup to the check-in process. The room was spacious and clean. Pool was nice and very impressed with how good the breakfast was. I read the reviews prior to booking and they did not disappoint. Wonderful staff working here and will return.

The hotel was great. I enjoyed my one-day stay and was thinking to extend my stay. The staffs were friendly and provided great services. If you had to do RT-PCR test before roaming around Thailand, the staff was excellent. I would also recommend Pad Thai if you cared to try authentic Thai food, recommended to ask the room service to add a little chilli flake. It was excellent. I couldn't describe how tasty it was.
Grande Centre Point was right in the center of shopping hub in Bangkok. It was close to malls and the metro station which helped me to go to all the attractions with least amount of money!

The test and go process was incredibly straight forward. Hotel was great! Told us as soon as we got our results back and we could head out. Staff helped with any questions and gave us an upgrade on our room. Absolutely loved my stay here and would reconvened to anyone who wants a luxury hotel with down to earth staff.

Only bad thing is they didn’t have pad krapow moo when I asked they said no and they literally have every ingredient on menu to make it but they wouldn’t haha and the check out was a little long there is 4 computers and only 3 staff working very hard and very fast they did amazing but the manager needs to step in and hire a new person or schedule a new person or step in and man a computer when the line wait gets over 5-10 minutes. Because a lot of the wait was not so smart guests asking dumb questions and making the staff baby them into understanding the rules or what’s needed just like any other customer service job. That’s all the staff is amazing the room is clean and nice the water is super hot the bed is 7/10 comfy American standard. Thai standard it’s like sleeping on a cloud. The chef is good the food I ordered was amazing and it’s location is just borderline perfect because it’s easy to get to and leave in a taxi it’s not right on the busy street it’s down a side street
I have no complains. One of the most efficient SHA+ hotel though check in and out experience was pretty poor due to long waiting time.
This is a very big and clean hotel. Staff is very friendly.
Byłam w hotelu w ramach pakietu Test&go. Czysto, pięknie i dobre jedzenie
very good for everythink Thank you.
Have had a very comfortable stay at the Grand Centre Point , ratchadamri. Everythibg is so perfect ! Kids club, swimming pool, gym , restaurant, room , staffs ! Will defoes return!
they should out more staffs during busiest check in and out time

reviews.review_title: Easy and no hassle Test and go”
reviews.review_comment: Best stay ever for my test and go. Spend almost 24 hours in the room. Room service was affordable, grab food and the staff send it up. Fantastic
Great location, great service and fantastic food

Tue mandatory arranged pick from airport was late even though my flight arrived on time . Check in was busy (2300hrs) and this resulted in some disappointment when I wanted room service / the hotel offers a much reduced menu and when I eventually got through to room service my requested items were out of stock due to busy demand ! Hmm Shows lack of planning in my view . Food was Ok but very small portions. The arranged Covid test was efficient and professional with results given within 10 hrs . On my check out at noon the following day the queues at reception were a joke , people waiting and getting frustrated , no segregation for check out vs check in quests which was again poor planning as they should anticipate the demand and apportion resources according . As a result I was not given my Covid results or ATK and had to return later to the hotel to ask for the same - appear staffing is an issue al though premises are generally very good . Overall there is room for improvement.
Everything were fine except the transportation have some hiccup as we were left waiting at the airport for 2 hrs waiting for our ride and we end up to share taxi with other ppl.

When arrived at BKK airport, after all the passport stamping everything, Went out to wait for the transport to the hotel however the staff told me that my name wasn't inside the list and asked me to wait. I waited 2hrs and went to talk to them and they drive me to Grande Centre Point Hotel. On the next day, I was waiting for my PCR result and waited til I have to call the counter and they inform me that they not sure of my result. I have to check with the nurse which i got to know her inside the plane during the flight to BKK and she informed me that my result was negative. Luckily I added her in my facebook. I think all this can be better arranging and not let customer wait and wait. Waste of time.
Nice place. Good facilities. Room was very good for the price.
There’s a problem with the internet in my room and no one would respond to my phone no matter how many times I called. When I went down to complain, they let me wait for over 40 mins
Did not follow up guest enquiry
Brilliant service for quarantine Room had no hot water but otherwise all good.

I stayed here for the first night quarantine requirement for the test and go program. The staff were all helpful and friendly, and I was given a free room upgrade to a one bedroom suite. The room is spacious and cozy. No breakfast buffet but they do offer you different cuisines, and there are free coffee in the lobby. It is within walking distance from Central World. Overall I had a really good experience.
Really great staff at Front desk
Hotel could go for renovations. Decor seems a little outdated. But room is quite spacious.

Great place to start your trip in Thailand. Hotel is really nice, rooms are spacious. Location doesn't matter so much, if you are on test &go. But even though I liked the location. 10 minutes by walk to the Superrich exchange. :-)

The room had everything that I could need, even a washing machine with dryer functionality, a bath tub and shower, etc. The double bed was unfortunately two single beds pushed against each other, creating a solid uncomfortable rift in the center. The hotel phone's reception answered my call exactly once out of 9 or 10 attempts throughout the day. Going downstairs it was clear to see that the facilities are severely understaffed. The few available staff are, however, very professional and helpful. Just sad to see that such a large hotel with many active guests won't even employ more than 2 active lobby staff (1 courtier and 1 reception staff). It's so sad that these large businesses don't employ more people. All about the profit I guess.

This hotel is in a premium location surrounded by high-end hotels. The rooms are spacious and well equipped but it seems to be under-staffed. Room make-up is not done everyday and calls to the reception may not be picked up at all. It is fairly far from local residences so street food is hard to find except for a couple of hours in the morning
Be more clear to your service!
I stayed in the hotel for about 16 days. Very good value for money. Hotel is in a good central location. Easy walk to the BTS train stops.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Hotel Exceptional Clean & Lovely Staff”
reviews.review_comment: If you are looking for a SHA Hotel for your one night quarantine stay I would highly recommend this hotel, from the pick up at the airport through to final departure from the hotel after clearing PCR Test everything was spot on, great location, quarantine food delivered to room was amazing, rooms spacious and high standard
Staff were very friendly and prompt. Rooms were clean and comfortable.
Enjoyed my stay at Grande Centre Point hotel. 5 min walk to BTS station. Rooms large, good facilities, staff friendly, would Definitely stay again.
Unprofessional !

Don't ever book with Agoda ..not helpful at all..I had a problem with Thailand pass can check in on time ..they try to took yr money away without trying helpful ..they just said to u can't contract the property for god sake..R u joking? Never ever recommend to friends or family
All the staffs are nice and helpful, got upgraded for the very nice, cozy and big room. Located nearby BTS just few steps walking easy to get around.
Great

reviews.review_title: nice choice to test and go sha+”
reviews.review_comment: Its nice service to test and go program
Very clean!
Great service, very nice room and nice view. Overall I'm very satisfied. However, too long queue both check in and check out.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, though location a little iffy”
reviews.review_comment: This hotel is very nice, and the staff are really good. Unfortunately the location leaves a little to be desired. You can walk to CentralWorld but it will take about 10 minutes, as well as any other form of transportation. Taxi need to be hailed as the hotel is on a side street.
The hotel room is big but room feels dusty, bedroom flooring is uneven.

My second time here. The staff are friendly and courteous. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Rooms are soundproof and well equipped. The gym was vast and the pool and spa facilities were a wonderful touch. The location was great (a 10-minute walk to the BTS). For the money you are paying, this hotel is excellent.
overall great hotel but the staff knowledge is limited and cant give accurate advice where to take ART test and Test & Go - first time rejected ours by error.

They tracked down a diabetes sensor that I left under my pillow (!) and had it waiting for me when I returned several days later. On the second stay, staff got a friend and I to the airport on a very tight schedule after our Covid tests came back negative
toplocatie, top hotel
Very helpful staff and proper facilities. The room we got had a shady linoleum glued over the old carpet, that was a big low for the room. All the rest nice.

reviews.review_title: The value for the money paid is well above average.”
reviews.review_comment: The staff here corrected a booking error I made without a second thought and accommodated me with an up-grade I did not specifically request. The room and the service has been exceptional and pleasant. The wifi, water, and facility have all been flawless. I will mention that due to covid their food service is limited to room service only but I have found many local places if I wanted to sit and have a meal outside of my room. The SHA+ test and go process was seamless upon check in and results were ready by morning as they stated. (Negative and I was off and on my way). I am glad I booked a few extra days here before heading north for my longer stay as being in the big city for a few days is always nice. No question that I would come back here again. It was a wonderful experience.
Cold breakfast Dirty room

hotels.name: Siri Sathorn Bangkok by UHG (SHA Plus+)
hotels.address: 27 Soi Saladaeng 1, Silom Rd., Bangrak, Sathorn, Bangkok, Thailand, 10500

reviews.review_comment: We stayed for one night (test & go). This place used to be a nice boutique hotel in a quiet and convenient location. It was sad to see how it has not been maintained. It needs a thorough clean and total refurbishment. +ve: staff, location and comfortable bed -ve: musty corridor & room, very dirty & torn carpet, mould in bedroom and bathroom, holes in towels, noisy air-conditioning and generally poor cleanliness/standard of maintenance. Rarely do reviews but this hotel was very different to what we expected (wished we’d read other reviews before booking).

Used to stay here many times before covid. We took now 3 rooms and all of them had major problems as well as being dirty including dirty towels. The hotel was understaffed and half of them were not friendly at all and no one cared about any issue we had with the rooms. Even when asked for a second towel thwy said they only supply one per person and hung up the phone

Hotel is located in the heart of the city. Staff is very courteous. The only thing I would request the hotel to work on is the AC which seems to be set at a temperature which is not user selectable even though the thermostat is present in the room. Otherwise would recommend it.
Had quite a unpleasant experience for my test and go package. Hopefully it’s just me
No complaints at all. Near perfect

1. Convenience Hotel is located within walking distance 8 to 10 mins to Salaedang BTS and Silom Metro. 2. Easy access to food Walking around, there’s many eateries to choose from and Silom Central Mall just next to BTS for more cafe restaurants. 3. Limite Service Am speculating that the housekeeping is contracted out as they are not in uniform. Everyday, I will have to call either for a bath towel or hand towel or cotton bud. It takes half an hour to receive them, the front desk staff are friendly but just too busy. 4. Lastly…Bring your own coffee and tea, they do not provide but there’s kettle and 2cups but 1 spoon only. Finally, Overall for the price I paid for, no complains, the room is not sound proof but spacious. Manage your expectations.

One bell man gave me a wrong information. It is really important for me because I needed to go to the immigration which is close to the hotel. I planed for this for many years to come to take care of my stuff. This bell man said the immigration office closed for the last 3 years. But it is not true. I wasted my time and my money. I hate that this bell man!!
I was waiting to get my room for an hour, very slowly. I think they need to employee more staffs in reception.
Everything went smoothly with nice staff.
all good

Room: in need of a refurbishment and repaint, no English speaking tv channels, not enough teabags, milk ect for two people, stains on bedding. Bathroom: mouldy and dirty, 1 towel was ridiculous for 2 adults and was grey. Evening Check in Reception: unfriendly and unhelpful. No information about Covid rules, or breakfast details or that we were unable to order any food or drinks from Room Service. Considering we came straight from the airport and a delayed flight we arrived thirsty and hungry and insufficient coffee/tea making facilities and no food to be ordered. SHA facilities: we were not advised when our results arrived, we were not given any details of any procedures to follow, we did not receive our 5 day test kit. This hotel is not a 4 star hotel or a suitable SHA hotel in our opinion and we won’t be returning or recommending to others.

We were very disappointed with our stay. The room was run down, they never came to clean the room and the communication prior to the arrival was really poor. The restaurant is average but they were kind. Location is good.

reviews.review_title: Good Value for Money but don't expect too much”
reviews.review_comment: The property is a bit tired and the facilities are lets say, just not quite what one is hoping for. The staff were excellent, the gym is good size and okay but not fantastic, but value for money is okay. the breakfast was a bit sparse by Bangkok standards. Make sure you set your expectations for the price. Rooms are good size.
Everything went smoothly, transfer to hospital (PCR), to hotel, results and accommodation - all is fine

Airport pickup was quick. Test was easy on way to hotel. Room was clean large an comfortable. Only complaint they didn’t notify when results were in. No answer at front desk on phone. I found out when I went to front desk and asked. Wasted a few hours quarantined. Bell man was awesome!

We've arrived and told to wait for 2 hours because they were overbooked and room was not ready. When we checked in, the room was not clean. There were a few dirts on the carpet and we could smell cigarette despite prohibitted. Not to mention the cups and glasses were dusty. Luckily we booked for only one night.
There is no AIRPORT Pickup, i have waited 2 hour at the airport and no arrangement from the hotel has been done to pick me up. Airport stuff sent me to the hotel instead.
For our SHA stay, convenient, we bought a package and they sorted out the rest! Lovely stay in our deluxe suite, nice food and convenient where it is. Thank you!

Old hotel, not mantained, smelly, old towels, dirty rooms. They picked us up late from airport. They gave us worse room than we booked. They did not clean our room. Breakfast is ok, but not much choice.

Had the test & go and everything i needed was just wihtin a distance. their staff are supernice, their spa provided an awesome massage, good food, nice room with a tub. there's a restaurant just opposite, and a 7/11 nearby. awesome stay.

Arrived at hotel around 4.30pm and room was not ready yet. There were about at least 8 other travellers waiting for their rooms in a small lobby. I was then given a room that wasnt the one i booked, changed to a new room subsequently after i called the front desk. The room itself is pretty worn and amenities are dated as well. Our hot water doesnt work and even though the technician came to fix it for us, it failed again after 10mins so we just gave up. I switched to a different hotel once i received my negative PCR test result. Overall if you are just looking for a 1 night stay to fulfil the SHA requirement then they do a very good job in that regard. The pick up and PCR was done smoothly although i wish we didnt have to wait till 4.30pm to check in.

reviews.review_title: Just like what people said in comments”
reviews.review_comment: I booked with them for Test and go and have been communicating with the staff about the pick up from Airport. Turn out the representative left before I arrive and said that the staff did not inform them the time so they left. When I arrive nobody help me with my luggage and the check in staff told me there will be breakfast at 8am in front of my door. Next day nothing is there until I check out the staff forget to give me ATK set and I have to remind them. The room is nice and big but not so prepared I'm quite dissapointed.

reviews.review_title: Staff is great, rooms are big.”
reviews.review_comment: Overall great! I would come back.
Bought Test & Go package but didn’t received my ATK kits, just PCR test only
Was definatley not Satisfied with my first Room "Junior Suite" very dirty and i hate carpeted flooring in Hotel Rooms, then got a downgrade for the same price :-( !!! which was much better

It was quite a challenge at the beginning from the time after the booking until the last 2 days prior to departure, I was not getting the confirmation or reply from the hotel for the required airport transfer by the Thai Royal Government. Luckily, Agoda was very responsive and assisted us by calling the hotel to confirm our airport transfer arrangement. For that I give Agoda 5 stars

While the hotel is in an excellent and quiet location - close to certain embassy's, Lumpini Park, public transportation and an array of street food and extremely fine restaurants - it is showing its age. Rooms are adequate but furniture and fittings are weathered/deteriorating. Room service amenities are of a questionable standard. Service/assistance could be improved.
Very poor service and middle aged management. The dont have slippers, tissues, staff quantity is not adequate. Test and go package, the didnot give us ATK test kit. Which was there responsibilities.
Wonderful Location and very friendly stuff
Staff very friendly and helpful, room a little dated needs tlc… paid for covid test and for one night only
