I had to stay the whole time in my room, even tho they had my test results way earlier.
Booked this hotel as my SHA+, the staff was really friendly and understanding. 7/11 and restaurants in a walkable distance.

Only one staff is working at the dest. I don't blaim on her. I don't know if it's just the day I checked in, but I don't want to waste my time waiting. I couldn't ask the desk because the desk looks buzy always.
The hotel did not look after me. The phone of reception did not work, also not from outside. No food, no drink all day. In the end no sorry.
Luxury and clean room & clean premises

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel near everything . Quiet area not on main busy street ”
reviews.review_comment: Staff was nice and didn't make the check-in and check-out a hassle. They have en eco green option if you don't need your sheets washed daily you get free fruit plate or coffee. Enjoyed free fruits cut up for breakfast daily. Nice staff and close to many places if you like walking like i do. Also seemed safe for any travelers who might otherwise be wary.
Good hotel to stay with lovely people
Staff were friendly enough, but hotel is in very poor condition. The mold and smell of mold was so bad in my bedroom that I had to sleep on the sofa.

Especially, front desk staff is very friendly and helpful. And their room is very clean and very comfortable ..I thought it was standard level in Bangkok.(late on I understand they are very very professional and too different to another hotels) Their service and quality are excellent. I strongly recommend to stay this hotel
I have stayed here before and I’ll stay here again. No complaints except a bit busy but what do you expect for a good value hotel in nice area of town.
2nd time back here and won’t be the last. Fair price in a lovely area. The only draw was it was very busy this time. At the same time good to see business is picking up. They deserve it!

Location was great and quite. Walking distance to Canadian embassy. The room smelled horrible and the bathroom was full of black mold. Bed was comfortable. We had a junior suite, great views but was just old and not kept clean. I personally wouldn't stay again even at the discounted price.
Changes advertised flexibility; after purchasing, they were not

As we arrived to Thailand during Covid restriction, we were required to one day quarantine. We had to paid to hotel for transportation before we arrived. However we stuck and waited at the airport of 2 and a half hours for a car to take us to the hotel. Imagine 10 hours flight with 7 years old son who was tried and hungry. Then we arrived at the hotel and the room was ready, my son fell sleep on the couch waited. I had enough I asked the receptionist for explanation for all the delays, they just said they were busy. When we got to our room, the room so old and smell stuff
Very conveniently located within walking distance of two transit lines. Big rooms with comfortable bed and nice bathroom. Very nice pool and good gym. Overall, great place and value for money.

The hotel cannot manage the room for guest, most of the booking in confirmed to guest but the room is never enough, every guest is waiting for the room for 2-5 hours, some have to go to other hotel in the group. It very bad

Bangkok empty of tourist not help to keep a big structure at the top of efficenty. I start from this assumption to valuet 3 days in this hotel. Bad esperience for not responding to my many mail for clarification about test&go function..and a non Perfect clean of the structure are 2 points of failure.

reviews.review_title: Would not make a second visit”
reviews.review_comment: For the price I paid and the service I received, would not return to this hotel

They were left in the foyer for over 1 hour with other patrons waiting for rooms and considering the covid problem i was not at all impressed. Then when getting to the room itself there was pubic hair in the shower and when we asked them to clean it. They promised they would and never came back.

I stayed there while waiting for the result of the arrival PCR test. So the price is not cheap. Surrounded by many buildings. Air does not circulate well because of no window. Only 2 large towels which are not so new. The bath foot towel has small insects. However, the staff is friendly and helpful. The sofa and chair are also not so clean. Can improve.
The best hotel near sliam area

Room is big. But house keeping is very very slow. There is no house keeping number. We have stayed 5 nights in premium suite. Most of the day I have to go to the front desk to say please clean my room. Even they comes to my room for cleaning at 5pm. But most of the day they told us, they have no towel or room amenity is unavailable. After cleaning room looks little bit dirty. Breakfast is same regularly. No variety. Front desk stuff is very polite and helpful. This is a non smoking hotel. But there is no update in website. If you want to smoke, you will have to go outside the hotel. Location is excellent. Bts and mrt is very near to the hotel. Taxi is available anytime. I think only for the location, you should not stay in the hotel.

The overall of services and hospitality is gorgeous. The restaurant has beautiful decoration and staff will helpful for breakfast. Room was spacious and well lighted. The only issue wifi keep cutting off.

Very dirty. Room and hallway. They also request customer to pay deposit $70 on top of the rental payment that you have already paid when you stay here. Carpet is very dirty and smell bad. Seem like they have never vacuum or

Cons -Internet speed is ridiculous, almost all the time under 5 Mbps!!! For quarantine, where you are stuck in the room for many days, not suitable at all. -The room smells musty. Pros -Staffs are very nice and very helpful.

reviews.review_title: Simply a fantastic hotel with WONDERFUL staff... 🙏😘”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel offers very nice, spacious suites/rooms at a really good price. Clean, modern, upscale amenities including flat screen smart TV. Top pool & fitness center. Our room has a small kitchen with large fridge & microwave. Rooms are very clean and meticulously cleaned daily. The in-house WiFi is very fast with no connection issues. The hotel is extremely central yet very quiet. The overall hotel service is great. The helpfulness of the staff at this hotel is second to none. You can tell that there is a well-coordinated team working here under an internationally experienced management. I have been traveling, living and working in Asia for over 35 years. When our two credit cards suddenly stopped working for technical reasons, the hotel director Khun Ice - who, by the way, speaks fluent German and English in addition to Thai - offered to take us to our bank to find a solution. The next day Khun Ice went with us to the bank (!) and invested over 3 hours of his valuable time in our problem. Just one day later, Khun Ice called us in our room and asked us to come to the hotel restaurant, where a bank employee handed us two new cards. Problem solved. Without Khun Ice we would have been helpless. I have never experienced such helpfulness in over 35 years. Again, dear Khun Ice, from the bottom of my heart many, many thanks 🙏🙏🙏 for your help! For us, the hotel and its staff is the very first choice. Thank you 🙏 for such a wonderful time. We will definitely come again! 😘😘😘

The staff is really helpful and handles a lot of misunderstandings from oversea travelers very well. I mean, worlds are colliding as it is a first for anyone of us travelers under these times to be exposed to a foreign country’s set of rules. Just as the rules at home, the local rules here are floating, too. Take it easy and let it happen. I mean lean back relax, let the staff, the driver etc. take the lead and in most of the cases you won’t be disappointed. In general, as many steps of data processing etc. are very creatively executed with free available social media apps, it seems a little bit chaotic here, but it works out beautifully at the end. The people are all doing a great job to make the “test and go scheme” work. To be honest, I have seen worse at a Narita airport arrival last month in Japan. Moreover, the PCR test results to be forwarded to the hotel are on time. If you arrive in the evening just check with receptionist next morning before you go to breakfast and get a big smile back. The hotel is renovated. I do not know if all rooms are renovated, but my room was very ok! Apart from the notorious complainers, I could not find anything annoying at all. I had a great stay here! Ah … and you have seven eleven store close to the hotel.

We only stayed here for a night as we had this test-and-go program. It surprised us that we only had 2 free bottles of water for the whole day and half and we had to pay extra if we wanted any. Considering that should be included in the program and what we paid, we felt a bit robbed considering we could not get out of the room during that time. The windows in the room cannot be opened so if this is important for you, do not chose this hotel. We felt trapped at some point in the room.

reviews.review_title: Great place in a great location ”
reviews.review_comment: Very nice hotel tucked away from a busy part of Bangkok with spacious rooms, comfortable bed and nice swimming pool.

The staff is pretty good and generally knows and remembers their guests. It'd be great if newer staff learned this practice. Also, when there's a queue to talk to reception, it'd be great if they wouldn't let people constantly cut in line when others are waiting patiently for their turn.

It's a good location, close to both the BTS and the MRT. The staff is generally nice and helpful. However, the room could've been a bit cleaner. There was a musty smell in the room and later that night I had stepped on some glass in the kitchen. The wifi is fairly good, however the rooms don't keep sound at all.

Good - Flexible checkout times - Big pool - Nice gym - Location, close to the BTS and MTR, across the street from the commons - Big room Could be improved - Laundry machines won’t be repaired, even if you ask why - Room key always needs to be fixed every day or two - Room service only replaces trash & towels, washes dishes and fixes the bed sheets - Slow Internet - Slow customer service responses, unless you call directly or go to the desk
Perfect hotel, with all the facilities you need.
This is a good value and in a good location, not far from the train. It is an older hotel but is more spacious than many newer hotels. Please come and check it out.
Great location just 5 minutes walk from Silom. One of the only hotels that has a separate bedroom area away from the door to the room.

reviews.review_title: Unorganized staffs, nice location and room ”
reviews.review_comment: - Staffs are friendly but always busy. - Never pickup a call or answer any emails. - No instruction what to do with quarantine. Comparing to other hotels they could organize better. - My stay includes Breakfast at room as quarantine program - but in reality no breakfast received. - Airport pickup was not well aligned with car provider -my name is not in the list to be picked up. I need to wait 30 min. + nice location + nice room I recommend you to take this hotel if you would not have a change in your stay for example no date change or no entry Thailand program change then staff contact would not be necessary.
Perfect for a solo traveler. Good breakfast. Near many nightlife hotspots and many great eateries.

Room was amazing, much bigger than we thought we’d get. Staff weren’t very helpful for the covid process, we didn’t get given the day 5 tests or told about results for our PCRS. They received them the same day but didn’t tell us until 9am the next day eventhough we asked. Barely answered the phone for room service etc which we thought was oddd considering we were in quarantine until the results came back! If you know what you’re doing then it’s a great place to stay but as two young travellers experiencing our first time away by ourselves and in 3 years, it wasn’t the best start.

I booked this hotel because it was 75%off and agonda rated this hotel for four stars. However, this hotel room was not clean at all. The bathroom was so dirty and full of black mold. It so disgusting. Also, there is not enough pressure water and hot water. I booked deluxe room suit and the was very old. The only good thing about this hotel is the cafeteria. So if you looking for a good place to rest after the long flight, this hotel is definitely not for you. Spend little more money and find a good cleaner hotel to stay.
Man for the dollar you get the most for your money a awesome view and a huge room with all the amenities . It’s so worth it

I have been staying at this hotel on regular basis. No acknowledgement, the word “Cannot “ is the only word you will ever hear if you have requested something. Even though Agoda website there are smoking rooms and the hotel is smoking free hotel. When the booking confirmation says 2 guests , You will find one key card, 1 toothbrush and one bathrobe . The rooms are big and good value for the money.l but they are very poorly cleaned and it is full of dust, moldy water marks and the policy of the complimentary water is just horrible. They won’t give you extra of nothing. Never. I will never going back. Across the street new property same rates and way more nice staff. This time was the last straw.

Super efficient staff and organization re Covid related information as well as incredible value for money. Only suggestion would be to review food availability, especially for travelers who may not have sms services available to create accounts on the recommended delivery apps.

reviews.review_title: I like this hotel it is same my second home ”
reviews.review_comment: It is worth with you money for stay here ❤️

Lack of communication about airport collection & covid swabbing prior to arrival. Only got a response after 4 emails, numerous messages through Agoda, messages on FB etc... Eventually all sorted 12 hours before flight from UK. But did not instill confidence. Room dirty but otherwise ok. Food appalling, pre packaged & inedible! Only stayed one night for test & go, would not recommend! 😡

We got to the hotel via Test & Go program. The pickup at the airport and testing went smooth. At the hotel check-in we first were offered a room that hadn’t been cleaned at all, it looked exactly like the previous guests had just left. This issue was resolved quickly after talking to the front desk staff and they apologized, but it didn’t seem like something rare. The new room had been cleaned but the standard of cleanliness is rather low, no western standard. I wasn’t sure if the sheets had been changed at all. We had to call the front desk and ask for our test results, otherwise they would have called - the results had been laying around for a while. Breakfast was a joke. We left one day early. At checkout, we had to ask for the already payed ATK Test and if we hadn’t asked for it, we also wouldn’t have gotten the printed PCR test results that apparently we will need for upload in the Morchana app. I would recommend choosing a different place to stay. Side not: We’re a 27 years old couple from Germany.

reviews.review_title: Comment Strong point and Weak point ”
reviews.review_comment: Strong point following : 1. Good breakfast 2. Good location Weak point 1. Room not clean 2. Take time for checking 3. Staff not service mind
I WAS HERE before , it was very nice but the latest visit, it's disappoint

Hotel was clean, staff were helpful, buffet breakfast was great. I had a room that opened out to an outdoor porch which was wonderful. Location is a 10-15 mins walk away to the MRT/BTS, which is fine cos there are many street stalls along the way, especially in the morning!

reviews.review_title: Good value but communication should be improved”
reviews.review_comment: Great location and the discounted price provides good value, but the hotel is repeatedly unjoinable/non-responsive pre-check-in. This is very annoying in a period of time where the hotel is responsible for your PCR testing/airport pickup, which in turn makes or breaks your ThailandPass. They don't respond through the booking site, they don 't answer emails and they rarely pick up the phone. Other than that, the hotel is okay, amenities are good etc.

First off avoid room 510 at all costs!! It’s filthy! I’m talking mold!! But once I was done waiting for my pcr results I switched rooms and it was a lot cleaner with a better view! My other complaint is it took a little over 16 hours to get my test results and when I called down to the front desk the lady hung up and when I called back 15 minutes later because i thought maybe it was disconnected, she answered saying she was busy checking in other people and will call me back in 10 minutes with the results. I waited another hour for her return before calling down again, and this time a much friendlier guy answered and looked up my results right there and told me I was free to go! I did have a wonderful massage there and breakfast was good! Overall I would not book here again or recommend since everyone I talked to that didn’t stay at this hotel Day 1 about how long it took to receive their test results said 4-5hours and were given the test results and uploaded to the app. (Every hotel I’ve stayed at since has had to call and verify my results due to this mishap).
Good location. Quiet comfortable tourist hotel.

I booked the hotel under test & go program. Since a hotel pick up was mandatory I tried to reach the hotel on several platforms - email, calling, messenger, line..they didn't respond to any of it. I reached to Agoda customer service and then only got response that the hotel will reply only one day before. But WHY CAUSE THE CUSTOMER THR UNNECESSARY ANXIETY by not replying to any of their msg. Specially in a time where getting into Thailand requires several documents. Anyway upon reaching the hotel, the receptionist lady was extremely rude. We had to wait almost 2hrs for the room. And in room even though I booked for 2 people QUARANTINE there were no amenities at all. They only kept one small water bottle. For quarantine meals the menu was not kept in room..had to call the operator several times to get it.. for dinner when we wanted to order food..none of the hotel lines were answering. I card reception, operator, room service but no one answered. What were they expecting the guest in quarantine to eat? Toilet water? To put it short DONT BOOK THIS HOTEL .. there are so many better hotels at lower price.
I love the breakfast. Tasty and good variation

Good location. Bit annoying was, that I had to pay for a PCR test and airport transport, although I didn't use either and had given notice several days in advance. No goodwill, no compromise.Manager Rudy just referred me to agoda customer service, which is a chatbot. :(

When we first arrived in Bangkok the airport pick up, covid test and check in was super smooth. Everything after that was a disaster. Firstly we went to our room opened the door to find it was already filled with people, which isn’t good as we were supposed to be in quarantine when we landed. We were given another room which was lovely but the bathroom was covered in mould. After 7pm room service ended so you had to order food via the grab app and the staff would bring it up as you couldn’t leave the room. The food was delivered but all hotel phones we rung e.g the front desk were turned off and we had to get in touch via the spa. The following day no one told us that our PCR results were available so we had to go outside and ask the cleaner to get in touch with the front desk as the phones in our room still didn’t work. The room was nice but I wouldn’t stay there regarding covid testing, we were also guaranteed water but we were only given two small bottles between two of us in 24 hours.
Incredible view! A nice place for one night.

reviews.review_title: Great choice for test and go”
reviews.review_comment: Stuff was very helpful. You can order room service while waiting for pcr results. Breakfast is great too. Totally recommend!

I booked this hotel for my test-and-go and I probably couldn't choose a worse place. Prior to arrival I haven't received any information and nobody was answering any of my messages, where I was asking about the pick up at the airport. And not only they didn't give me any information or directions, they also didn't organise the actual pick up. In the hotel, nobody informs you about the covid test result, you have to call them. Unfortunately it was impossible to reach reception using the phone in the room, so I had to go down to ask, even thought I technically wasn't allowed to leave the room. Also, my Thailand Pass registration was slowed down because of them. As for the room, it was spacious, but it has definitely seen better times.
Staff is verry friendly and helpfull

Siri Sathorn Bangkok by UHG is honestly one a good place to stay in. The rooms we got are okay. Beds are comfy. Cleanliness is good. Daily make up room is consistent. However, there are few things that we need to point out: 1. Communication. There should be someone who will be assigned to receive calls/emails for clients concerns. I know that we are still in a pandemic and you receive a lot of calls and emails. But as for the clients perspective, it is important that you are prompt to respond, give updates and be pro-active. Prior our stay, we really have a hard time of reaching out to you and on our end, its kind of frustrating. As a client, we need assurance and everything. 2. Staff. We forgot to get the names of all of your Staff but we would like to commend the guy who is very accommodating from the day we arrived and all throughout our stay. We also want to commend the lady staff assigned at around 9pm onwards. She is really accommodating. However, we would like to point out this lady assigned at around afternoon (time is around between 3pm to 8pm). She is not accommodating as others. She doesn't have any eagerness to give us anything. All she do is that this and that and its final. I remember we really need our RT-PCR result the soonest since we are flying back in our country the next early morning, she even told us that the result will just come out the following day. So what we do since she is not helpful at all, we just go to the hospital itself at midnight and follow up our result on ourselves. That's frustrating. 3. Checking-Out. We don't have much problem on this. 4. Breakfast. Food in the buffet is good. 5. Wifi/Internet. Not stable. Not recommended if you're working remotely or if you have meetings.

Not worth for the money. No dinner and bad breakfast. Front desk did not answer the phone promptly or not at all. Did not reply email when I had questions. I was not sure if the room was clean properly. Their was the ruble bands left by the other customers on the coffee table.

reviews.review_title: Stay was alright but the pre-trip preparations were a nightmare”
reviews.review_comment: Tried calling the hotel 3-4 days in a row but no avail and no one was picking up. Sent them email, messaged them on Facebook and even called Agoda but no one could get through and I was genuinely worried that my Thai pass wouldnt get approved. They eventually emailed me 2-3 days before my flight to confirm the details but in a Covid world, that was way too late.
What a surprise ,being upgraded to Studio Executive Suite. Although there's only one lady at reservation counter, everything went well. Clean and comfortable. Excellent hotel. Recommend to everyone.
The photos of the hotel are old and it is not newly renovated. Partly worn out. The room was not so fresh and wifi did not worked so well. We will not come here again.

Nice hotel for Test and Go, met at the hotel everything great but don't rely on the hotel answering any emails regarding your booking, no confirmation of any matters, plus 18 hours before flight they ask for information that was already provided which I had been asking for confirmation of. Once collected from airport though, everything was good, recommended.
you can not telephone, they do nt take it,difficult to get in touch
Good quality but lot of guests
Breakfast and room were nice

I had a feeling this hotel is NOT interested in any repeat customers. I booked two nights for Test & Go: Quick pick up at the airport and PCR test along the way. It went down hill upon arrival at the hotel Grumpy receptionist. NO SECURITY FUTURES WHATSOEVER. ANYONE CAN WALK INTO THE HOTL AND RIDE THE ELEVSTERS TO ANY FLOOR WITHOUT ANY RESTRICTIONS. INCLUDING THE QUARANTINE FLOOR I WAS IN Around three pm I was in my room. Only one meal arrived the next morning. I swear, you can buy much better food at 7-11 store or street food stand for 50-70 baht. Thank God I had some snacks 2 bottles of water. 2 packets of instant coffee. NO TEA. and the old hot water kittle lid is broken. Unfortunately, huge mistake, I had additional 24 days booking at the same hotel. so It was hard to find a new booking in such short time. So I had to suck it up and move on. A follow up review after check out
Staffs are not friendly or even show smiley faces.. I feel as not welcoming as it should.. staffs need to be trained, otherwise nobody wants to stay here again

hotels.name: Bangkok Cha-Da Hotel (SHA Plus+)
hotels.address: 188 Ratchadapisek Road, Huay Kwang, Ratchada, Bangkok, Thailand, 10310

reviews.review_comment: For a sha ++ hotel i would have expected all to be super clean. I was wrong.

The hotel itself is not bad. We booked for the test and go package including the 3 meals. The food provided was bad and cold. It is unbelievable that being in thailand, with good food everywhere they serve a really bad food. We didnt wait for the 3rd meal as we already got our certificate

The craziest and the most strict test and go hotel that offer jail time in exchange for our money. Despite a medical emergency and for a eye surgery, my son was not let out even well after the next day until the Covid results came. We did PCR and arrived and it shouldn't be this strict. And the hotel is the most boring and dead-looking hotel i have ever stayed in my whole life.

Is this a military camp was the feeling I had from the moment of arrival under the TEST-N-GO package and until my negative PCR test result (at which point I dove away out of desperation). In almost a lifeless zone in Bangkok 2 ex-military style guys receive you in disposable gowns and will validate the passport and health document to send you off to the designated room. Food is pre-packed and ready and delivered from time to time without a hitch. Having arrived at 11pm at night i was told to turnup at reception at 7am for the covid test which if i do, the result will be delivered at 4pm the next day. Results came negative and i ran to the exit door because the palace is like a haunted dead hotel and nobody besides you can be spotted. so yeah, very much like the jail time at the hotel because the 2 guards can spot the very few people that enter and exit. I would never book this hotel even if it is test-n-go.
Bad hotel, bad food, and bad people to attent us.
Pretty on point with the service no negative comment
The quarantine test & go pa Kate was well organised and efficient. I got my PCR test back within 7 hours. Reasonable food. Near MRT station. Well worth considering
Not so clean and under renovation

reviews.review_title: Very Old Hotel, not in the city town where all the happening is.. Avoid”
reviews.review_comment: Not convinent, nothing much around, old hotel..
Hotel is passable. I had exactly same food given for lunch and dinner which was below average. Room was clean and peaceful with all basic needs included. I wouldn’t stay again here.
SHA+ hotel. Pcr test took very long. Not drive through. Room very simple.
Tốt

I was with the SHA+ program and the experience is not good. They picked me up in the airport but in the hotel everything is old. The bed is too hard, awfull pillows. The food they gave me was all cold. They gave me the dinner at 5pm, and of course cold. I will not recomend this hotel.
Good overall, lack of breakfast though. Food service was good when we arrived, accommodate vegetarian
Nice staffs very helpful. The room has a nice size for a superior room size, the bed is comfortable. The food while staying for a quarantine are nice. I would recommend this hotel for anyone.
Book as a Test & Go Package, PCR is done at the hotel and results out the next day. Recommended place for Test & Go!!
PCR done in the hotel itself, airport pick up very comfortable and only downside is the meals provided we cannot choose.

It’s value for money and the service is prompt and the PCR certificate is professionally done. Walking distance from the MRT and a night market. My only complain is the internet speed. Not usable at times.

- room looked ok, no problem there - was quarantine stay with 3 meals per day (compulsory), these meals several times were forgotten to deliver and all the times the meals were already completely cold ("nice" when there is fluid egg+potatoes+cooked chicken+soup, totally cold) - one time I complained that the meal was forgotten, they delivered directly after that , to my surprise it was cold again (they just served the stuff they cooked couple hours ago and had still laying around,..wtf) - I wouldnt go there ever again as I find that kind of "service" very bad . latest after complain it should be fixed, but its not, this shows me they dont care. also its unnecessary as the food would not taste too bad if they would take care and serve it when its still hot, but so they throw everyday a lot of meals in the trash as most dont eat any of it - what a waste

I came to Thailand under the " test and go " scheme. The scheme is rather tedious but generally the processes were well organized. The RT-PCR test done at the Cha Da hotel was quick and without much hassle and I received my results promptly the next morning. If the hotel can improve by serving hot food would be great.
Staff are unfriendly, unhelpful and service is very bad.
Service staff are very unfriendly and unhelpful. Food is of poor quality

stayed there for 2 nights because of mandatory corona quarantine. The hotel was massively under construction. The rooms had seriously dirty windows. The toilett was smelly. Even the strong perfume in the room could not distract completely. Food was bad. What can I say. The staff did their job without any friendlieness. Only the poor dude at the entrance in covid protection suit was friendly and motivated. I mean, we are all suffering from the situation. Also, I have been travelling in asia a lot. But, still, this hotel was not worth the money even considering all the circumstances. Lets hope they will do better when the pamdemic is over.

we've been to Cha Da for the Test&Go 1rst day. We had to wait over an hour for the Airport pick up,. Arriving at the hotel, the staff was not really friendly . They seemed annoyed and almost didn't talk to us. I would not recommend this hotel.
Very good
there’s renovation to some part of hotel. it’s average..not exactly worth the amount paid but yeah it’s pandemic and it’s part of the business.

Be aware of because of COVID there is NO pool, NO bar, NO restaurant, NO gym, NO buffet, NO chairs in your room / in this hotel. You get low budget food 3 times a day to your room. Don't know how those people get this Hotel 4 stars. At least the personal is kind, but please be aware of the points I wrote above.

Due to the Covid Test&Go restrictions in the beginning of Feb, we stayed twice for one night at this hotel. The hotel is currently under reconstruction, which is why everything is a bit improvised currently. The hotel staff barely speaks English, when checking in, they treated us as if we were definitely infected, we couldn't ask any questions, were given one meal at 5pm and then breakfast (similar meal to the day before, cold, dry, likely prepared the night before). For the second night, we got some food from a nearby restaurant and a 7 eleven around the corner. The room itself is ok, clean, the beds are confortable, the bathroom is fine, however there is only one hook for all towels, the aircon doesn't get rid of the humidity from the bathroom/showers we took. They are using one of the two bedside tables to deposit the meals in front of the door. For our first night, the hotel staff was very quick in sending our booking confirmation and quarantine documents.. For the second night however, they replied a day before our flight and not until we had some local friends call them, knowing that we had to apply for our Thailand-Pass still. The organization of this hotel a bit messy. It's an option for the Test&Go program, but prepare before you enter the hotel. If you arrive at the hotel in the late afternoon, you'll get your results at 11am (sometimes before)
It was an old hotel with basic facilities but not much more to offer. Single beds were too small for me to sleep in

Don’t choose for quarantine, it’s hell in here. Staffs are unprofessional, untrained. Room dirty, coffee mug full of dust, room ambience is ok. But services and staffs are really downhill. They forgot my dinner and when I received, it’s ice cold ห่วยมาก พนักงานฟร้อนท์ผู้ชายพูดจาแย่ มีคลิปเสียง

reviews.review_title: Look better on pictures than in real”
reviews.review_comment: Avoid for this price

Nice and spacious rooms with furnishings which are quite new. Food provided is of a good quality and worth the money. The floors are however, strangely sticky; not sure why that is lol but overall its a decent value hotel at the price. Recommended

Was an enjoyable stay very accommodating for our needs during quarantine, the staff was very friendly and happy to answer any questions we had to the best of their abilities, if we wanted food delivered in they were happy for us to do so

Did quarintee here 7 nights. Disorganised unhepfull with arely any english, half hotel is going through renovations so your staying at a building site. Worst food iv ever had in Thailand, but compulsiry as part of the quariteen pakage, little plastic trays or cold rice, fried eggs and hotdogs almost every morning only twice was it served above room temperature. It was so bad you coukdnt even give it to the porters for free, they would rather go buy their own food.
Hotel is super dirty, lots of roaches are dead on the floor in the room, too noisy from construction, food could be better.

that certification seems to apply to most unfriendly hotels in thailand. seriously, every modest hostel has more service-orientation and customer care availsble that this so called 4 star place. from a hotel of that category i do have expectations in terms of service, friendliness. communication. i‘m glad i have this experience behind me. under current circumstances i would not come to thailand again. period.

A vast improvement on stay 5 days earlier, but improvement still required. Many 5 star hotels have full facilities and can come in a lot cheaper. Sadly buiding works offered no price reduction. Staff were very cooperative and helpful in any issues I raised

rooms not as good as pictures , stay here during my test & go quarantine. They did not have a good overview over when the test should be carried out as I go different times when to test. The rooms have a pretty low standard , the staff have a hard time to speak english. My room was not cleaned at all for 5 days during the test & go. Even when I told them that I would leave and return on day number 5 they just placed breakfast , lunch and dinners outside the room. Will not recommend this hotel , unless you are not very picky.
Food was awful, so dificult to solve any problem with the reception personal, many people but doing nothing

The pictures do not match the real thing. Expensive stay. Food was not tasty and lunch / dinner were the exact same. Service was not good - we had to call down for results of test as they did not call us when the results came in. Would not go back.

Whilst I appreciate things are hard during the pandemic I feel certain areas need to be addressed. There was no tea in the room only coffee, fortunately I carry my own tea. Asking for milk was not met, resulting in me buying milk from local shop. Thought the room could have been cleaner. I will be staying at this hotel on Sunday for my day 5 covid test . I do hope to see improvements by then.
Bag of shit

The 1st.night was okay got a nice room with a table and a sofa,so we could sit and have our dinner and breakfast,dinner was served at 17hrs,and we had go for our PCR test at same time ,when got back to our room,the food was Cold,and dry,Breakfast was also very cold,you had no choice but had to eat what you got., Our 2nd.night stay when we came back to do our 2nd.PCR test,the room was bit smaller and no table or chairs to sit and have your dinner and your breakfast,sit on the floor or on the bed, we booked a Superior room for both nights,we did not get a superior room for 2nd.night,and for the hot drinks we only got coffee 3 in one,no tea,for 2nd night we asked them for coffee just coffee not the 3 in one And the hotel was under renovation. So I can’t recommend this hotel.
Horrible hotel staff

We are staying here for the 2nd day now, and all we can say is : this is SCAM. We feel like we've paid for low class prison. Employees don't speak English, there is no bar and no room service, despite all these things appeared to be included. If you try to talk to reception- good luck! They are extra rude and unhelpful. Getting them on the phone is a jackpot. They couldn't even provide us a lighter. 4 star hotel has no matches or lighter for guest mostly comming by an airplane. As of 4th of Feb, the pool is closed as well. If we knew, we would never purchase this package.

We stayed for a week at this hotel, and the most positive thing to say is, that we got one bottle of water each every day. The food was awful, the service lacking, absolutely dirty hotelroom. Will never return. There are many hotels in Bangkok. Be sure to pick another one.
The bed it really hard to sleep and room not really Clean need to do a better job on the room and the food
Best price but worst food ever.

Don’t book this place. Arrived there for 1 day quarantine. Checked us in without testing and into dirty room which was previously used by someone else and caught covid there and in the evening they done test and when they found out we have covid they were so rude toward us start Charing us for even food we ordered from outside. Don’t book place

reviews.review_title: I feel sad for this hotel. ”
reviews.review_comment: I traveled to different countries many years, lived many different types of hotels.What ever large or small, felt most of staffs are friendly. But for this hotel, I will say I felt upside. We don't talk about facilities, only for service. Due to COV-19, many hotels face hard time, we understand. But this hotel have never answer your customer' emails. We booked Test and Go Package on November, 2021, will check in on January 2022. Sent few emails to the hotel, ask some questions, include Airport transfer service, or pick up time, they Never answer me. As a customer, you don't know your service details you paid advanced, never answer your questions, what's your felling?
The hotel was very old and outdated... Lifts where broken, food quality was very poor. Not a place I would ever book again.
Cleaning and Good staff
Stayed many years ago and this time was still clean. Reasonable price and service for test & go Quarantine!

reviews.review_title: You can get better than this. ”
reviews.review_comment: Its fair price for AQ option but if you can increase your budget little more, you will much better than this. Location is good. Food is super lower hotel standard. Portion is little. Taste is super bad. Room likes an old apartment. Smell is very bad. You have to pay more for room service to bring delivery food up to your room per time. Only that good is location.
old room and facilities, do not have enough amenities. The staffs were very confused.

We booked this hotel for our 1 night test & go quarantine as we landed in Bangkok on Christmas Day. So we spent a little bit more on a nice looking hotel as it seems nice in the photos. We arrived outside the hotel and thought they’d brought us to the wrong place, covid had clearly had a lot of play in the run down state of the hotel. We were put on the 14th floor with the rest of the quarantine guests, the pcr test on arrival was very efficient though and results were given by 6am the next morning by phoning down to reception. The food that we was given was stone Cold and we had to phone reception 5 times before we were brought some food, also we were given bath mats for towels. Please avoid this hotel unless you really have to stay here, we were deceived but didn’t have much choice as it was a last minute booking.
Value for money, except meal portion a little small & cold.

reviews.review_title: Great service and very very clean”
reviews.review_comment: Loved it. The staff, room was exceptionally clean
They dont give Feedback to requests send out via mail.
Test and go 식사포함 예약했는데 bob안줌 Many the love

I booked it as my quarantine hotel. However, due to my flight issues, I had been asked them to change the date for check in for me. No matter they can change it for me or not, they had never responded me. I sent them messages every week, but they had never sent me anything back. It was terrible.

Excellent service staffม friendlyม welcome and helpfull with everything. But the room is not so clean. There were two cockroaches in the room. I'm not afraid so it's not a problem. The mattress seems to be worn out. The room is very big, the view is beautiful, the air conditioner is cool, excellent.

Over charge for PCR test from SHA+ booking that paid already. The staff at Airport are unprofessional and have to wait close to 1 hrs for the transport to hotel for quarantine. Many in one van and no social distancing in van to hotel. Delay and received cold food
Well organised for the Thailand pass and go Picked up quickly at the airport and straight to the hotel. RT-PCR Tested few hours later at the hotel, had the results 12 hours later.

reviews.review_title: Mail and send messages completely ignore people and can't communicate normally”
reviews.review_comment: Mail and send messages completely ignore people and can't communicate normally

We stayed here as our quarantine hotel for 1 night. The room was dirty & run down. The room looked nothing like what was shown on the website unfortunately & the reception area was a building site. We actually left feeling extremely disappointed. Not a pleasant start to our trip.

reviews.review_title: Great deal for a test and Go”
reviews.review_comment: Great deal for the price (for me it was about 110 dollars including the test, transportation, and 3 meals. The room was ok for a fancy hotel. It had no table or chair so had to eat the delivered meals on the bed. But that was fine. Big tv with YouTube and Netflix (didn’t use it but for those that like that would be nice) The lobby was gorgeous. But the rest of the hotel (like the pool) is shut down because of the pandemic. An understandable situation but a bit disappointing as I was looking forward to a swim and nice rooftop view after my negative test result Yeah bye-bye hahahaah Arrival Ribbin Kushido hahaah

the representative at the airport was very unorganised. Waited (standing) for about half-hour before they arranged my ride. The hotel overreacted to the new deco, redecorating the hotel interior covering it with plastics as if the guest entering is a pandemic. So, you are not entering a hotel but a laboratory. The hotel room does not reflect a 4-star hotel as published, feels more than like an up-market 3-star laboratory. I forgive the mosquito I killed in my room on Level 12 with a toxic spray provided by the hotel staff but spotting a cockroach in my bathroom is not acceptable. The food provided by the hotel is COLD. this is not acceptable.
Very basic is you choose this hotel for SHA+. The pick up at airport not well coordinated, waited for an hour. The food wise is really simple packed food, don't think is really worth the amount paid.

reviews.review_title: I would not choose it for regular stay only quarantine”
reviews.review_comment: We choose this hotel only for the quarantine reason. We arrived at 8 Pm and they told us they will do the test at 9 am in the morning. The results came at 6pm so whole day wasted. They gave us dinner and then 3 days next day. Unfortunately we couldnt choose and the food was not really tasty. The staff doesnt speak english. Only someone who looked like manager and even then it was really bad to communicate. The matress was pretty hard but we didnt mind. It was good they gave us lot of water. Its hard to say if i would choose this hotel again. Definitly not for regular visit but due to this quarantine rules you have to choose some …

Hotel staff don’t speak English Really old and run down room shower room was okish. If you are doing the 1night isolation the food it’s disgusting I advise you to order food from outside the hotel to your room

booked up but never show driver almost 2hrs than, receptionist never knows. finally got the room and meal was soso. asking double bed, but got twin bed for put together. no chair, no holder for towel, no hair dryer etc.. 6pm can get the swip covid test report. than can get check-out. (was very happy for that can go to other hotel)

They are good service for test and go treveller Kind staff is very helpful and good services Also good location is Bangkok mrt station And taxi service all service is clear and fast Im recommend to test and go trip
Lovely and clean. Good airy room. Helpful staff but choice of food would be good.
Close to convenient places and transporation
Breakfast was excellent. Rooms large and comfortable. Location was good for the airport and shopping malls nearby. Staff ensured we had two adjoining rooms and a baby cot. Would recommend.
easy access to many places because the MRT station is just nearby.

reviews.review_title: A midrange hotel in the right price range with a city view”
reviews.review_comment: Room is spacious but the room facilities are obviously dated. Location is ok since its 7-8 min walk to the nearest station as per google maps. night markets and malls 15 min away. Breakfast is ok, not very asian, not very western, a little of both. Food quality can be improved. Staff are really helpful since they can converse in English and are very responsive to requests and questions. It was a nice stay overall. Clean room, peaceful sleep, good bed, thick black-out curtains, good air conditioning system, complete basic room amenities (hot shower, fridge, kettle, tv, working desk, toiletries). I personally like that they skipped the small bottled soaps and shampoo and used refillable containers instead.

Nothing fancy. Good breakfast. Good size room. Good location but Asked for double bed got 2 single that moves apart. The bathroom needs upgrade ,however fully functional. TV : Small and all Thai channels and reception bad
Great hotel , nice rooms , good breakfast selection, right across the street from BIDC
Hotel is good value & location is good, staff are nice & helpful, breakfast is average but all in all I would stay here again.
I checkin once a Month for Business Trip. Front Office DM recognize me. Room is clean although needs upgrading.
Goid

The hotel facilities are quite old and the lights are dim. The bath tub and water tap had rust stains. The base of faucet of washbasin was loose, with water leak. The TV is small and old, and without international channels. The ice compartment of the refrigerator was loose and has formed ice. Staffs without smiles. ‌Check out time took too long, approximately 10 minutes.
Staff of breakfast not helpfull and kind. Quality of food was not good. I went to many hotels in Thailand but this I never saw in other hotels. And not enough tables for a such big hotel.
the room are super old and don't offer much facilities. rooms are spacious tho. walking distance to supermarket.
This hotel facility not so good. only near MRT station

reviews.review_title: All hotel mattresses are old and extremely hard”
reviews.review_comment: This hotel must spend some money to replace ALL of its mattresses.. Your back, your butt, and both sides of your hips will be severely painful after you get up from the night or sometimes just from an afternoon nap. The bathroom has a lot of mold around the tub and the bathtub curtain. The maids need to clean them better everyday.. The bedroom area was kept clean after each daily service, which was a great point. No more bed bugs were detected at all during this visit.
Variety choices for breakfast

reviews.review_title: Value for money with good location”
reviews.review_comment: The breakfast was better than before, walking distance to MRT station and reasonable price.
Not really for Relax, a little bit noisy
We were there 2 nights and it was so noisy that u couldn’t sleep. Poor sound proof n hear people walking n dragging furnitures

reviews.review_title: Great value for money and good location.”
reviews.review_comment: Located a few minute walk from the MRT station and about 60 baht taxi ride to terminal 21. Big clean room with bath and shower. Decent size swimming pool on the roof (15m). Gym is tiny though. Let me check in early at 6am and arranged a taxi to koh chang pier when I left for just 3,000 baht. Good buffet breakfast too. overall, great value for money. Booked through Agoda for $40/night.

reviews.review_title: Second time at this hotel and service was poor this time”
reviews.review_comment: Second time at this hotel. I would say first stay was much better. Staff are not friendly and helpful this time. If they would, i might have stay longer. Moved to another hotel after 2nights. Only the breakfast is great.
Great breakfast buffet, not fancy but very clean rooms. Good food available 24 hours at the first floor restaurant

reviews.review_title: An excellent breakfast and right across from the Bangkok International Dental Clinic”
reviews.review_comment: We booked the Bangkok Cha-da to be near the BIDC (Bangkok International Dental Clinic). There are many other dental clinics there, but BIDC was the first internationally accredited one in Thailand and we got great service there two years ago. The Cha-da is almost directly across the street, just a hop up the overpass and you're there. It's also not far from the subway (MRT). Additionally, it''s near the Thai Cultural Center and numerous other interesting places. It has a nice rooftop pool, however, it's not as well cared for as it could be and is actually too cold to enjoy without some discomfort. The rooms are nice, clean and well appointed even if a tad small. The included breakfast though is definitely a stand-out, better than 95% of hotel breakfasts. At $45 a room, overall it's worth the money. DRC
Conveniently located next to MRT station. Rooms need and showers need to be upgraded.
I only stayed at the hotel 1 night and arrived quite late and left early morning. Breakfast was very nice and with a big selection. If I have activities in this area of Bangkok, I would book again.

reviews.review_title: Have stayed here several times. Good value for the money. Very good breakfast buffet included.”
reviews.review_comment: Staff always helpful
Goog Location and nice room

hotels.name: Citrus Sukhumvit 13 Nana Bangkok by Compass Hospitality (SHA Extra Plus)
hotels.address: 22 Sukhumvit Soi 13, Sukhumvit, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110

reviews.review_comment: It’s a good enough hotel and it’s among the cheapest for the day 1 quarantine. But you get what you pay for! Staff were super friendly and I have nothing against them. Pick up from airport and covid testing was seamless. However when I arrived to the room the bedsheets were a bit dirty. The walls of the room as very thin so you can hear everything happening in the corridor. The rooms had this annoying door bell which the staff would use to get your attention when they left the meals outside the door since you are supposed to have as little contact as possible. The food was okay but breakfast was served at 6:30am in the morning! I was so jet lagged that I couldn’t even eat at this time but they also wouldn’t let me sleep properly. I’m a light sleeper which doesn’t help but when I didn’t answer the doorbell for lunch (at 11am) they rang multiple times and woke me up. I wish they served meals later or wouldn’t ring the bell. The food was okay although a bit spicy and no dietary requirements were asked beforehand so I had to phone reception to find out if the food contained gluten / pork as I can’t eat either. Having said that everything else was clean, air con was great, wifi was great, staff were great. I wouldn’t stay here again but I don’t regret doing it for the hotel quarantine

reviews.review_title: Good and practical SHA Extra + Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: If you need a good and practical SHA extra Plus hotel for your test&go package, then look no further.
Very Nice people who work there
Great for Thai Pass. Smooth pick up and testing. Rapid turnaround of results. Clean spacious room.

Booked here for other clients before but was now there for myself 10 days ago . The organization is perfect the thaipass confirmation and everything was smooth and rather quickly. room was ather big and clean . Food was fine but of course due to corona rules all is packed liek 7 / 11 plastic and deposited in frn tof your door. i got my negative result after 8 hours and could have a stroll in sukhumvit the same evening. can recommend this one
Cheap, nice and clean. Perfect location for us. And had parking. So positive surprised.
Basic simple accommodations. Friendly staff.

I used this as the SHA, which is ok just for that. But the toilet was making a huge racket and I found it hard to sleep even after a 14 hr flight. The room was tiny and the staff was ok. Wifi instructions were not listed and i had to have staff come to my roomb to assist
No pool sadly

Can't change reservation and can't get any sort of refund if your flight gets delayed or canceled. During Covid times, that's one step away from simply scamming people. It's not like they are full and they can't change your booking. It's just apparently their policy to prey on travelers and refuse any kind of modification. Basically, if you have a problem and arrive a few hours or a day late, tough luck, they will run away with your money and you won't get your room. My story : flight got delayed, wanted to have a room the next day instead, they refused and slammed me with a "no refund, no modification" email and then stopped replying whatsoever. Terrible place preying on people having trouble because of Covid.

Everything look worn off once I stepped into the room. Bed look horrible with strains and sunken. Fridge stinks and not cold at all. Floor was sticky Lights not in good condition. Rooms look dim . I was in quarantined for a day. Immediately I checked out after my result came back negative. At least the front counter staff and manager are courteous.
great value for a quarantine stay. Comfortable bed and incredibly friendly staff. Meals delivered promptly and test results communicated well.

Exceptional Staff Willing to go the extra mile to make your stay comfortable. I Liked my room 711, clean well maintained and had everything I needed, Will recommend purchasing and keeping some plug convertors for international travellers. Also would recommend keeping something like an HDMI cable in the room so folks can connect laptop to tv instead of depending on the local programming.
This hotel needs renovation, nowhere close to the photos shown on Agoda.

Affordable and easy access to public transportations but the rooms are poorly maintained.

reviews.review_title: Friendly but not worth the price”
reviews.review_comment: I stayed there for my one day quarantine, staff friendly and helpful, but for a Sha++ the room was equipped poorly (one towel, no bathroom rug) and the food was pretty bad.
staff were friendly room was clean nice room

The 2nd time I've used this hotel as part of the Test and Go program. Everything very well coordinated from airport pickup and enroute PCR to getting result within 8 hours and food between times. For the price I paid around 4000thb very happy.
Very comfortable hotel, test and go process made easy by helpful staff. Very nice rooms and rooftop pool, would stay here again

Did my 24 hour isolation here. Didn't see much outside of my hotel room, but the room itself was great. Fast Wifi and food delivery was good. Staff did a good job. No complaints for my short, limited stay.

reviews.review_title: Good hotel for the Thailand Pass and covid testing”
reviews.review_comment: Good communication from the hotel from the time that I made the booking. Everything at the airport went smoothly and the airport transfer and covid test were efficient and did not take very much time. All the staff at the hotel were friendly, very helpful and polite. The room and the bathroom were very clean and the concierge offered to go to the local convenience store for me, whilst I had to stay in the room, awaiting the clearance from the covid testing result. In summary a good hotel to choose for the first night and Thailand Pass covid testing, after arriving in Bangkok from an international flight. I would also stay at the hotel again if visiting Bangkok and not requiring the first night airport transfer and testing package provided the rate was competitive with the other local hotels.
Located in a very good place of Bangkok where one can reach a lot of shopping facilities easily. Staffs are extremely friendly and are always at service. Recommend totally.

reviews.review_title: Everything well organized as SHA Extra Plus”
reviews.review_comment: From the picking up at the airport to my check out, everything went smoothly. Staff was very friendly and feel comfortable. Thank you for good arrangement for your hotel.

Citrus 13 is an exceptionally run hotel. Every staff member I encountered - reception, concierge, and housekeeping - were very kind and very helpful. The hotel itself is getting a bit old, but it’s clean and reasonably well maintained, especially at this price point. I had stayed here several times before COVID. The room I was in (800b per night) had a very comfy bed, decent sized TV (a few western channels), desk area, wardrobe with safe box, mini fridge (not working), and coffee station. Window, but no real view. Wifi connection was solid - each room has its own router. Swimming pool looked like it was just being brought back on line. Food at the hotel is good quality and good sized portions. Unfortunately though, the restaurant is no longer open for buffet breakfast, which I had enjoyed in past years. Meals are brought to the room, with a 20 to 30 minute delivery time.
Nice meals during my whole quarantine.

I have stayed here before and consider this to be a good value hotel which provides the SHA Extra+ package in a highly efficient way. The staff are excellent and helpful. I look forward to visiting again.
Booked this hotel for my first day SHA Extra Plus as I arrived from Singapore. Staff was friendly and much willing to assist.
A very pleasant stay close to many amenities and staff was very polite and helpful. Customer service was the best i have seen. I will definetley use again

Do not let the Citrus brand mislead you as there is nothing really international about it save for the friendly staff. Rooms are old, lights faulty, furniture jaded, doors were squeaky and slam hard when closing. If you need a decent price and mediocre facilities, this will work for you.
Average room, food should be better, refund not given for shorter stay

reviews.review_comment: This was our first time staying in this hotel. The hotel located near BTS station and big shopping centers. The room is big and clean equipped with all needed facilities. Swimming pool is great and big. Staffs are helpful and kindness. The breakfast is ok. Will come back again.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, great location next to MBK”
reviews.review_comment: Love almost everything about this hotel except the Internet. If you want to do any work and need more GB, you will need to purchase extra GB of Internet each day. It can be up to $10/day. Otherwise, it would be a real 5 star hotel. Breakfast is great with variety of buffet items. Staff are excellent and very helpful. I will be here another day but so far, it's an excellent hotel to stay while away from home.

The suite is really lovely, very comfortable. If you need complete darkness to sleep (as I do) this isn't a great room. There's a huge sloping window, fitted with a 'blackout' blind it just doesn't keep the sun out, so by 6:30am, the sun is lighting up the room. Very clean, although with the 'nee normal', the rooms are now only cleaned every 2 days on our 4th day I had to ask for cleaning, fresh towels and bed linen changing 3 times before anyone came at 17:15. We paid a very low price for this room, but the issues would have been there even if we had paid the full price. The Club Lounge is closed, but you can go to 'Lobby bar and tea room' instead. It's ok. But nowhere near as pleasant as the Club Lounge was. We were given tepid chicken nuggets with floppy fries with our drinks on our first evening. Not up to standard at all, but the staff are wonderful, always helpful and very pleasant. I'm sure that when things calm down with the virus, the PP will be up there with the best once again. Overall, they're doing a great job.

reviews.review_title: City Hotel concept with 4 star services ”
reviews.review_comment: Good hotel, great gym, clean, small breakfast buffet options. Busy atmosphere great for anyone love shopping. Somehow if you want a quiet atmosphere, choose some where else.

The whole family loved the hotel. Rooms nice, staff courteous and helpful and facilities great. Hotel carried out oir fitst PCR Test for test and go upon arrival. We espicially enjoued the olympic sized swiming pool.

I did my PCR test just outside the hotel. Housekeeping didn't cleaned the room on my second day stay due to Covid 19 pandemic. The breakfast are not so good prior to covid 19. The receptionists are friendly.

The quality of your stay will depend on whether you are in one of the lovely renovated room - which are now stunning. It is a huge hotel with a huge range of facilities. Some areas are clearly tired and also need renovating. Breakfast was good but very busy and not enough staff to keep clearing the tables. The fact it is attached to MBK is a huge bonus. The pool and gym are is fantastic!! We had a lovely week there and were sad to leave.
The staff was very attentive. The rooms were gorgeous and well appointed. It was located in a great location - close to the sights we wanted to see.
ive stayed ar many 5 stars that dont deserve the stars. thia hotel deserves 10 stars. best gym ive ever seen in any hotel ever. amazing stay
