Overall my experience was a 5 stars with this hotel. All staffs were very friendly and the hotel room was super clean. they even have its own water dispenser in the room so you don't have to buy your own water from outside. The gym was impressive. I would recommend this hotel to my friends and families if they want to visit Bangkok. Was a pleasant stay.
Upgrade to a higher level room. and the best view

Pathumwan Princess lacks a little charm but does offer 4-star quality in an excellent location. Adjoining MBK shopping centre and right in the centre of Bangkok, Pathumwan Princess also has one of the nicest pools I've come across in Asia.

Staff brilliant super helpful and the facilities are second to none. Ask for a high floor with views into the city they are amazing and won't disappoint. I used the gym and pool area and both were superb the gym been the best I've ever seen in a hotel. You also have direct access to MBK which is handy.
Mbk center from the lobby Clean
The hotel has undergone renovation and the room is well furnished and the layout in the room is thoughtfully planned. We love the service and the accessibility of the hotel.
Check in time is 3PM but i got a room on 6PM. Breakfast there are only a few of menus,I request a toothbrush but staff didn't bring it to me.
Great hotel. Will be back.

Efficient airport pick-up with nice car. Quick and efficient PCR Covid testing with next day result. I was informed there was a hospital service taking place at the hotel (patients using the hotel) but was completely unaware of it during my visit. Pathumwan Princess perhaps doesn't have a lot of character, but it delivers 4-star quality and the pool is one of the best in Asia.
Hotel is in a great location, the staff are all very friendly, room service was good, lovely food for breakfast, pool area is great and our room was more than big enough - would definitely stay again
Staff are amazing and very helpful. I have visit this hotel everytime i am back in Bangkok.
good staff good room
Thank goodness we wrapped up this trip pre-covid...

I don't normally leave reviews, but this hotel helped me every step of the way with my booking during the pandemic. I booked as an anniversary surprise and when I told my other half where we were going, she called the hotel and had them add a dinner table in our room and set up flowers and decorations - all on the morning we were set to arrive! They were super nice and even kept a straight face when we checked in. We ordered dinner from their restaurant and were very pleased. The next morning, they delivered breakfast straight to our room and it was huge! This was a little staycation for us so it was really nice to have MBK Center literally attached to the hotel to take a little stroll. The mall was mostly closed due to partial lockdown, but it was really cool to be able to take the elevator from your room practically down to the mall entrance. I will definitely be back because it was surely a romantic view from the room as well.
5 star
Quality, location, price, breakfast, free amenities. Wow!!!
Good location. Tidy but cleanliness need to improve.

First impress is helpful and professional way of staff, Receptionist & Bell Team very courteous. Got upgrade room to corner !! Very appreciated! Location was superb. Value of Money. Highly recommended.
best gym have ever seen on hotels
Good staying
everything best！
The staff are very friendly and helpful, hotel is nice and clean. Breakfast is excellent. Everything was perfect!
Good location good service
A very nice hotel. Easy to go to MBK For a quick shopping. There is not much around here. Perhaps do to shout down.

reviews.review_title: Under the Uniform is Unwelcomed, Ungood and Unstructured”
reviews.review_comment: Not worthy of 4 star Even if the 2-3 star hotel could do better than this hotel.

reviews.review_title: Stay during New Year and CNY”
reviews.review_comment: My wife and I stay 2 nights on New Year Eve, as well as CNY eve to 1st day of CNY. I came back again on CNY because of the pleasant stay on New Year Eve 2020. Due to the Pandemic, the price is good, for the 2 stays, we opt for the Horizontal Suite, and Executive Suite respectively to enjoy the big room, even with a discount rate, Pathumwan Princess maintain a very high standard. Their staffs are very well trained and speak good English. We are vegetarian, and for breakfast, they able to customize our food. The room is clean and well maintain. The shower though pressure is relatively weak, but the temperature of the water is easy to control. Pathumwan Princess has the best Sport facility, probably they are operate separately but allow Hotel guest to use the facilities. The minus point being non-Hotel guests are sharing the same lift who went to the 8 floor where the sport facilities and pool are. The pool side is one of the best I have encounter for many Hotel I stay in Bangkok. Overall, I will return, and this Hotel is highly recommended.

reviews.review_title: You could pay less by getting the service you want”
reviews.review_comment: Dear Customer Service, We are newbie in thailand, after isolation, we'd like to reserve your hotel as the checkpoint for us to find new condo to stay. At the very first, i suppose your hotel is famous and has good credit hotel in BKK, thus i ask for the naive help to your staff for receiving my parcels during my stay. Via FB message, i thought it was the common way to send my request. While the first parcel your staff declines to receive, after i inquire AGAIN, they finally receive my parcel. Another 2 parcels, your staff asks me about the tracking number, i am so naive that to believe your staff woild take care, that quoted dialogue from your staff, "Now, We have got only 1 parcel sir , May I have your reference parcel ID after that I will check from kerry for you." I reply it is sent by flash express.  Your staff seemed to be very much busy, until i found 2 parcels were missing, your staff stated to try to fix it. Until i checked out, there are still one parcel lost.  I found that your hotel got problem on showing calling numer corrrectly (Which the wrong siuation is still ongoing), that is the reason the courier could not contact the front desk very well. And your staff, wants to rectify me that it was my main problem. Now once, even if i check out, your staff still insists that i am wrong. I am not asking your staff or your hotel to compensate my lost, but for the future if you could make it correct, might decrease the problem for sure.  As a guest, i feel insulted by telling your hotel the right thing. What if i am the technician of your hotel,it would still insult me my finding? - For the period without air conditioning. Your staff and related workers are trying to fix the supposed circumstances very hard, i admiire your hard work.  Also, your thoughtful idea to let guests live in other hotel, is very good measure. However, your staff changes the wording 4-5 times for the fixing time.  If we still stay the arranged hotel, in my opinion, n

The hotel was super clean and the new renovation style was very impressive. The room was spacious and the hotel is right behind MBK mall. The mall is just few minutes walk to get to and if you need access to BTS it is just a 5 to 8 minute walk to get there. I love the place and it is my 2nd time coming back. I will definitely come back again in the future.
GREAT
great

reviews.review_title: Best location ang the best world class and luxurious facilities. ”
reviews.review_comment: My partner and I stay this hotel for 1 night during Countdown New year. For me this is the perfect hotel to stay in Bangkok in the city center of Metropolitan of Bangkok with shopping mall connects in this hotel which is the MBK mall. Transportation very accessible which is the BTS. Facilities are so amazing Luxuries Fitness gym with sauna and library room. It Has a place for running and sports area like table tennis basket ball court badminton even the boxing ring it has. Swimming pool are so relaxing. Room are so clean and wide and breathtaking view and the large bath it has so luxurious. I love to recommend this hotel to everyone. Thanks for the friendly staff at lobby during our stay they are so accommodating and check in so smooth and no hastle.
nil
Deluxe classic King Room, nice rooms for great price. Photo shows bathtub in this type of room but in reality, there is none, only rain shower.

My room was not ready - they insisted on a v poor room which was not what I paid for - they wasted my half day making me pack all my stuff n shift - the room they allotted the door broke down - so spent time repairing room - they kept insisting we will give you free stuff as compensation - which is not what I would want to be hassled with in the first place They take 3000 Bhatt as security deposite- this is not mentioned any where when I did my booking When I said I am calling agora up they got scared and moved into action for giving me room which I paid for

close to Siam and Sukhumvit malls with plenty of transport links to other parts of the city hotel is newly renovated and the club lounge offerings are convenient [we were upgraded] we particularly liked the convenience of the filtered water itap n the room we've stayed here before and would come again

reviews.review_title: Nice location with the greatest service !”
reviews.review_comment: According to the government, campaign to promote "Raw Teaw Duay Gan" or Travel Together, the facilities in this hotel are superb. Variety of International food, Japanese, Korean, China, Italian, etc. Moreover, you can get more benefits from the spa and Bangkok largrest outdoor fitness here.

reviews.review_title: Free Upgrade to Superior Room with Better Room Facilities”
reviews.review_comment: Love the fantastic location and view. Mins walk to BTS and Shopping Mall directly below. Enjoyed the complimentary free cake
Love the fantastic location and view. Mins walk to BTS and Shopping Mall directly below

The hotel is in the same building with the shopping mall, near the university, and Siam Square where you can find many stores for shopping and many restaurants for dinning, big swimming pool for working out

reviews.review_title: Sad to see hotel so empty ”
reviews.review_comment: I‘ve been to this hotel many many time in different occasions and different time of the year. I like this hotel, because of it prime location, hotel facilities , services and of course a direct access to MBK Mall. This visit after Covid Epidemic was nothing to compare. I‘ve never seen once Pratumwan Princess was empty. I hope the situation will get better and the hotel will survive.
1. Great Location (close to bts sky train) 2. Nice staff (Good service with smile) 3. Wonderful room (They upgrade my room , didnt expect before)

We've booked Pathumwan several times in the past for friends and family visiting from abroad and they always had great feedback. It was great to stay this time and we couldn't be happier for the room that had for our family. Staff were lovely
great location
Good,

reviews.review_title: Located in the heart of Bangkok”
reviews.review_comment: No such a fantastic hotel like this. The shopping mall is only downstairs, near sky train, the hotel connect to many places
Very high standard of service and facilities

Awesome facilities, staff and location - the Pathumwan princess is in a prime area that is close to MBK, Discovery Center, Siam Paragon and all other shopping destinations. The hotel is highly under utilized as the COVID pandemic has diminished the travelers to the city. Take advantage of the pricing as the hotel is worthy of 5 stars.

I have been a few times in Bangkok in different hotels.In general are all good,but this one it is got the best location,and the best gym.Rooms and staff nice too.Only one thing,breakfast could be improved in terms of quality.Next time I will come back to Pathumwan.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely beautiful, staff so helpful , superb”
reviews.review_comment: Lovely place this is the 3rd time we have been here and can't fault it ! Excellent

reviews.review_title: Excellent hotel have stayed multiple times”
reviews.review_comment: Couldn’t recommend the hotel more, close to everything, good breakfast, friendly helpful staff, great pool and gym. We will be back again I’m sure!
hotel located in MBK shopping centre best place for shopping in bangkok nice hotel modern all mod cons yes very nice

reviews.review_title: Reasonable price, good service, great for elderly ”
reviews.review_comment: The location is great. It's near the National Stadium Station, you could go to Siam easily. It connected with MBK center. There are food court, and lots of souvenir for travallers. Also, you could have massage in "Let's Spa", but please ask in advance if you need a female therapist for woman.

The hotel’s location is good as it’s linked to MBK and a short walk away to BTS. Originally booked a superior room, but was offered a free “upgrade” to a deluxe room. However, my room went one with bathtub to a newly renovated with only showers. Hotel has nice ideals like environmental friendly features like in room filtered water dispenser and auto power off features when no one is detected to be in room. However, that also means that the dehumidifier feature in the bathroom doesn’t work. So bathroom will have to be aired for around 15 minutes every time I stepped out. Not a bad hotel, but not sure if it’s worth 5 stars. The best thing about this hotel is the commercial gym in the hotel, which can cater to most fitness buffs.
Comfortable, spacious

reviews.review_title: Perfect location for shopping and sightseeing.”
reviews.review_comment: We loved this hotel but there were just a couple of things that made its 5* rating dubious. Firstly, the pool tiles and jacuzzi drains were covered in green slimey mould. The pool area is fabulous in all respects but this mould needs to be cleaned up, it’s very off putting. Also, for some reason the hostess at breakfast seemed to get very annoyed if we didn’t sit where she wanted to put us, the almost empty breakfast area was spacious and we preferred to sit where the American breakfast is served rather that the Asian Side which smelled of strange flavours that we didn’t like. We also saw a cockroach on the breadboard and breadbasket which they quickly got rid of. Most of the staff were lovely but this young lady made us feel very uncomfortable. We visit many 5* resorts so know what the standard is. When I was ill one morning and asked if I could have a plain bread roll and a banana bought up to my room, it seemed too much trouble even though I’d paid for bed and breakfast.

reviews.review_title: Great location with a fantastic gym and pool for a relaxing holidays”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel staff are great, I love the gym and the friendliness of the hotel staff.

The hotel was great and was in an excellent location (right outside the National Stadium BTS stop). It is also connnected to the MBK shopping centre, so if you love to shop then there loads to do here. We got all of our souvenirs from the MBK. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. We also had breakfast (buffet system) which had a lot of options. Very pleased with our stay and would stay again

reviews.review_title: Great staff and superb location + the view ”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed on 25 floor with a view of the city uber cool! The room was clean and pleasant to the eye but there was some smell each time i got back to the room (that was unpleasant). The staff is SUPER nice and assistive. Do use the outside staff to call a cab as they will help u get the beat price for sure.
Reception people would be better if they smile Location is good where connected to one of most famous malls in bangkok

Total value for money due to recent fresh refurb and proximity to mall and places to eat. Pool could be bigger - definitely not like a resort - but offset by various other health offerings such as gym etc. Worth the money paid.

In summary this is our 9th stay at this hotel, which is a powerful statement in itself. The renovated rooms are a notch above being very comfortable. My congratulations to the hotel taking a step to reduce plastic by installing water filters in the rooms. We had a small incident with an equipment failure this time, the hotel response and resolution was nothing short of outstanding. Our appreciation to Mr A and Ms. Munched B. for their support. It times like this that make a difference!

We just love this hotel 2nd time we stayed there. The rooms are clean, the bed and pillows are fantastic. Breakfast is just amazing and the pool is lovely. Very convenient as it is close to MBK as well as the BTS. I love this hotel!
Conveniently located, connected to MBK shopping mall n BTS National Stadium Station. Very clean n recently renovated. Top staff n services. Highly recommended hotel to stay in Bangkok
The check in taking a lot of time.

reviews.review_title: Very friendly staff and cozy hotel room after renovation ”
reviews.review_comment: Firstly I was served by Mr. A upon check in. He full filled my requests with friendly service.
Great holiday accommodation

reviews.review_title: We did not get the room booked”
reviews.review_comment: We booked just renovated room (Grand Deluxe Corner) and we got ”better” room as there were no room awailable even we had booked it. We got a bigger room but it was old and smellt like a mold. Not pleased with our stay.
Best location! This is my fourth time coming here n never once dissappoint me at all..easy to find halal food in mbk..n easy to get to bts especially those travelling with young kids like us..
Great location with nice friendly staff and good amenities
GREAT HOTEL, GREAT LOCATION, GREAT FOOD, GREAT STAFF - WHAT MORE DO YOU WANT !

The hotel has well-trained staff, with most being able to speak fluent English. While the service could be improved (i.e to explain why only 1 room card was given before being questioned since it is due to lack of cards and informing us to check in at 3pm but not having the room ready at 4.20pm or putting 2 single beds together and calling it a king sized bed), the staff are sincere and polite all the time. The location was great as it is linked to MBK, Siam Centre, Siam Paragon and BTS station. It is very convenient if you are taking ARL from airport. The gym is however opened to locals and they bring their own locks, making it impossible for the hotel guests to use the locker that was allocated. Overall, it was clean and comfortable and the breakfast spread is amazing and value for money.
Enjoyed staying here however pl have more halal food during breakfast
Great location where is linked to the MBK mall and National Stadium BTS station. Room is spacious and bed is comfy. Staff are friendly. Highly recommended!!
Staff are very kind and helpful. Great location of the hotel too

reviews.review_title: Fantastic locatiom. Repeated guest for several yrs. Awesome executive plus suite room. ”
reviews.review_comment: Fantastic locatiom. Repeated guest for several yrs. Awesome executive plus suite room. Very polite hotel staff. Keep up the standard!
Super convenient , a huge 7-11 store beside the hotel main entrance .

Checking in was a breeze. Staff was friendly. There are two suggestions to make the hotel more senior friendly though. Firstly, the bath tub height and the towel rack heights are placed too high and it's certainly not conducive for Asians for the obvious reason. I am 1.6 ft tall by the way. In addition, there are no grab bars to make getting in and out of the bath tub easier. Hence it is prone to slips and falls especially for older folks. Hope the hotel can consider this aspect seriously. Secondly, guests can only use the steps up and down from the lobby to the breakfast area it seems. I hope the hotel can improvise this area so that it can be wheel-chair friendly and for some older folks who may have problem climbing up and down the steps. This hotel excels in cleanliness and location. But regrettably I will not be staying here in future if the facilities are not improvised to be more senior-friendly. I would, however, recommend to younger friends and relatives.
The staff had kindly given me the corner horizon suite with excellent view.

reviews.review_title: excellent location with great Staff attitude!”
reviews.review_comment: the hotel location is hard to beat! adjoining MBK centre and national stadium skytrain station, walking distance to Siam discovery and Siam paragon as well as central world for the more adventurous , it is definitely highly convenient! we took the horizon suite and at 77sq metres it was superb. the executive lounge is so -so and outdated with a weird entrance meant for service staff. bear in mind that Bangkok has horrendous traffic in pathumwan ( the downtown of BKK) and the most convenient and fastest way to get around is the skytrain.

Great location, next to MBK, access to Skytrain and walkway making it so much easier to get around Bangkok. Swimming pool , sauna and shower room excellent. Breakfast was very good with staff going out of their way to please. All staff in the hotel were polite and extremely helpful. Would happily choose to stay here again.
Love the suite room with club lounge access. Really enjoyed the spacious executive suite. Location is fantastic
Good hotel in a great location.

reviews.review_title: Very spacious & comfortable hotel, ❤️ everything from bed to breakfast ”
reviews.review_comment: So clean, spacious & generous in everything. Well trained & conversed hotel staffs at Hotel reception, house cleaning and lobby. Location is superb too linking to MBK. Highly recommended. Shall come back again to stay when visiting Bangkok 👏👍
good

The swimming pool and gym are amazing. It locates 10mins walk from Siam BTS location and all the major shopping malls. The service has room for improvement since we had already paid for three people, but the hotel only prepared everything in two sets, except the beds. Other than that, everything was excellent.
The room seems a bit dusty!

hotels.address: 2, Sukhumvit Soi 19 (Wattana), Sukhumvit Road, Klongtoey Nua, Wattana, Sukhumvit, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110

reviews.review_comment: Hotel fixing something ewery night! Sou noicy! Service is katastrof!

My 3 year old got food poisoning while we were waiting for our covid test results. The room looked like a college dormitory. Beds were hard. Shower was basic. This is not a 5 star hotel… I will not be staying here again

reviews.review_title: front desk service terrible, I adequate, slack and passive.”
reviews.review_comment: check in test n go. they didn't inform me the dinner arrangement, I need to find out by myself. they didn't inform me about the PCR test result, also I need to call them late morning to find out I was negative. even at check out time they didn't tell me to upload the negative score in the mochana app. overall this hotel was poor.

First person to check in with hotel rep at the hotel but was the last one to leave the airport- waited 40 minutes for the car when the ride itself to hotel only took 20 minutes. Breakfast was cold when delivered to the room

Location is very good. Staffs are all professional and friendly. Was there for test And go package, not sure because it’s dedicated level , it’s a bit dated in terms of room condition. But it’s minor, still good value.

This hotel is placed in very good location as it's close to BTS Asoke station and MRT Sukhumvit station. And the hotel connect to the shopping mall called "Terminal 21" Room: quite old but still function well.

reviews.review_title: Good location, kind hotel staff, room service foods are delicious”
reviews.review_comment: Very nice hotel and nice city view, only one bad thing was that pick up service was so bad. I should wait for driver coming for 1 hour at airport. They forget register my arrival to airport staff. Other things for guests are complete good !!
Test and go package Staff is really nice the process was done quick. definitely recommend this place

Staff were great, very helpful. We ordered foods from Food Panda a few times while waiting for the PCR test results, hotel staff delivered them to the room for us. Good location. Spacious room (we were in the suite).

PCR tests are now done at the hotel. Fliggt arrived at 830, I arrived at the hotel around 10am, had the test around 1030 and got the result around 2030. Staff was great, room has everything I needed included lots of toiletry kits which was super helpful until my bag arrived later in the day. Overall was a seemless process, well organized and a great option for test- and-go. Hotel is in one of the best locations in the city but my room was super quiet.
good
It's just right there. You can take the train to the airport or anywhere from this hotel with ease.

As this is my first trip out after 2 years and 1st covid period travels, I made the mistake of booking 6 days worth of stay without the test and go package. Despite booking at extra 1st night with the same hotel, I could not get a refund for my mistake. Which was disappointing. Other than that experience, I like the hotel and location.

Just a bit of wait at the airport for transport, which I think it is not the hotel's fault, after which trip to hotel, PCR swap at the hotel and quick results within 12 hours. All in, good experience.
I had great experience, lovely view and very helpful staff!

reviews.review_title: All perfect but some time when many customers you might wait for service ”
reviews.review_comment: I would like to be back here again.thank you🙏

In the middle of everything. Staff are friendly and helpful during my first night quarantine. Amazing swimming pool and gym. The only thing that needs an improvement is lighting in the hotel room especially the bathroom.
Honestly, amazing staff, very efficient. Room service was there within minutes of ordering! Amazing facilities and super polite staff. Would highly recommend this hotel. I will personally be back!
The toilet smells for 12 hours on first day of check in. The tile floor looks clean but dirty at the corners. Not really worth the money.
Clean and good location

Great hospitality, staffs are very friendly and helpful. Great location, located the same as Terminal 21 Shopping centre. Easy to get to Both Airport. Worth the price. Our room is absolutely beautiful. Big, clean, comfortable
Great value 5-star hotel in the Sukhumvit area. Facilities do close early and room service was very minimal, but it's attached to a mall.
Second stay here as quarantine hotel. Worse experience second time.

An all round excellent property. Well run, good facilities, although bit more gym equipment would always be appreciated, excellent staff, food service was restricted by Covid but good and fair price. Very nice pool.

We book a day of test n go continue with 5days of premium deluxe room, both are actually same room type , but book in separate platforms, we asked the staff to arrange the same room throughout the stay, but we found out our card and wifi were not working on the. Second day, we went back to changed the card and the restaurant told us that we have to pay for our breakfast, we went down to the lobby and settled the third time, on the second night we went out for a massage, came bk and found out our room door wide open, not sure it’s because we didn’t closed it tight enough or the door is just not secure. But location is good , just next to Asok bts and metro station.
XXXXX

Did a one night Test and Go (put into in a suite), food was good. Then another 9 days, booked superior room upgraded to Premium. Room has a washer/dryer, and a full sized fridge with ice maker - very handy. Room very clean and comfortable. Staff friendly and willing to assist.

Pretty good Hotel but I was there for overnight Covid quarantine. Agoda was slow in confirming my second night which was not the hotels fault but made for minor annoyance. Breakfast was great but if you like a cold beer or wine with dinner be warned that no alcohol at all is served here which is why I’d be disinclined to stay again. Otherwise it’s just fine for the price
One of the best in downtown BKK

The Grande Centre Pount Terminal 21 is awesome. It’s right in the middle of entertainment, and nightlife. It’s 20 meters from a super mall! Your right there. Staff is super friendly and curtious. I highly recommend
Ok hotel rooms are sparse but if only for 1 night it’s ok. Room service food was average

A lovely experience. I picked a late flight so I could have a pcr test and be well rested the next day. The whole process was a well oiled slick machine handled by first class staff. The Pcr test was comleted onsite too which saved time after a long flight. My result came back at 8.30am just in time for me to pick my car up at 9am. The room was well appointed and had views over the Asoke interaction and swimming pool. I didn't get to use the facilities but was impressed enough to know this will be my first choice on return to Bangkok.

Good size suite with kitchenette and great view. Best location. Reasonable room menu. $167 night included airport transfer and a test. I paid 2000 baht extra when taking a test to have the result within 3 hrs. I couldn’t believe such a great deal. Booked it through Agoda.
The test and go was very efficient had test within 15 mins of getting to hotel and had results within 8 hours hopefully the Thai pass will end but would choose this hotel if had to do it again
I have booked so many time and I will book again 9⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Term 21 attached to hotel. Transit with in 20 meters

reviews.review_title: Good Location and Safe Choice of Stay ”
reviews.review_comment: Can't get too wrong with this place, panoramic window room with great view

reviews.review_title: Test and Go was great with this hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Really happy with the quality and the service of this hotel. Staff was very helpful. They allow you to receive food orders and 7-11 orders. Highly recommended.

You can’t beat the location with both a BTS and MRT station just outside your door. Since it’s essentially attached to the Terminal 21 mall, you have the added convenience of almost anything you would need practically in the same building. This is especially useful in the heat - you don’t even have to go outside to go grab a bite to eat or grab some essentials. The views are excellent, too. Rooms are not perfect, but the refrigerator and microwave came in handy and complimentary beverages and snacks are a welcome perk. This was my first time in Bangkok and I’m not sure there was a better option for location, amenities, and overall quality.
Very quick transfer from arrival to hotel, with friendly and helpful staff on check-in
Did my 1 day quarantine at this hotel and it was absolutely exceptional. Plan on returning minus the quarantine

Overall a nice place - the room was beautiful, the location is great, and everything was clean. The service was awful to say the least. The promised airport transfer never happened and was an absolute mess, the staff was rude to my partner on several occasions and also made promises they did not keep. They are also unreachable most of the time. They didn't answer any emails leading up to the stay, didn't pick up the phone upon arrival for the airport transfer, didn't pick up the phone when calling from the room on several occasions at different times of the day, and even Agoda had trouble reaching them when there was an issue with the booking details.

Stayed 1 night as part of the quarantine process to enter Thailand. Pickup from airport was seamless and the hotel were quick to checkin and give a PCR test. Lovely big room and pool area. Arrived the hotel by 7.00pm and was free to leave quarantine by 7am next morning.

reviews.review_title: It is Ok, but it could do better. ”
reviews.review_comment: It is a great hotel, good location. But just not it. A lot of small annoying happened during my one day stay. Like at check in, had to move to different room, pay double foor food, etc. Again small things but adding up not a great experience just ok.

Stayed at Grande Centre Point Hotel for “test n go”. Everything went very smoothly. Pick up from the airport was 10/10. Got to check in and take the covid test immediately which I appreciated after 36 hours of travelling. The room was beautiful with complementary cold beverages🙏🏼 Got results from the covid test way before scheduled time. Staff was friendly, helpful and professional. Highly recommended and I will definitely choose this hotel again.

Hotel is very clean and staff is helpful even with all the guests requests happening all the time. Location is best as it’s right next to BTS & MRT. Terminal 21 Mall is connected to hotel. I had deluxe room 2920 good view of city. Only drawbacks there is washer but it takes long time to dry clothing, not much street food to choose from on this soi, but there is a abundance of food around just not very authentic. But still even with these little items it was a 5 star experience. I have stayed here about 6 times since they first opened and were supposed to be part condo complex.
good

reviews.review_title: Great Spot, Nice hotel, pool is awesome!”
reviews.review_comment: pool is great, smoking area on the pool level is nice, you don't have to sit somewhere and be a pariah smoking - you can smoke cigars and order a coffee or a tea with a nice ambience. pool is spectacular, great depth of water and feel, luxurious. rooms have no carpet, feels a tad like a hospital but very nice none the less, HUGE windows just feel nice, i didnt even close the window to sleep, view was great
Everything was perfect. Only downside was that they never answered calls from the room (for room service or information) But the room was very big and clean

reviews.review_title: Great tesy and go hotel in a great location”
reviews.review_comment: Great location and facilties, easy access to the mall and sky train station. Hotel is in good condition and clean. Efficient check in/ PCR process, results within 6 hours
Position cannot be beaten, Mrt, Bts, Shopping, Entertainment, +++. Only improvement could be Test and go breakfast, only 1 coffee supplied for 2 guests.
Very good. Much better than I usually use. Will use again .
Convenient location. Staff are helpful. Room and facilities are clean and great. Price a little high side but worth it.
Ideal location with BTS, MRT and a shopping mall.
Very clean and very friendly helpful staff. Very good value for money. PCR Testing Service was very efficient
Nice hotel. Easy access to everything
Great hotel I be coming back very nice
Handy to everything

reviews.review_title: Clean. My room was more like an aprtell”
reviews.review_comment: My room was a corner room which looked like a mini apartment. It had a double view so gorgeous overlooking soi22. The bed was clean and the room was nice. The room service was fast but salmon was dry and old. The eggs for breakfast were good and hot.
there are cheaper places to stay for test n go,very confusing finding our driver at airport .. however place was very nice

I was there on SHA Extra +. From airport to hotel, to check in, doing the PCR to checking into room, the entire process was seamless. The suite room was awesome and the staff are attentive to all requests.

Landed in BKK at 8am, by 9.30am we had arrived from the airport, had our pcr tests and were settled in the room. Clean, modern rooms with great staff. Only let down was the food menu in the room is different to the food offered for test and go visitors, which has a small choice of 4 meals, this has to be viewed via a QR code found on the TV main screen or by using the line app. Results arrived at 7pm with a phone call to the room which allowed us to leave the room.

For the Day 1 stay it is indeed value for money and the testing is within the hotel itself. Location is indeed superb right at the door step of a BTS and MRT station. The negative part is you must 'remind' the hotel to update the result else the Morchana apps will not change to green.
Too short stay to give good review but ok for the money

Continental breakfast for travellers arriving on the Test & Go program , was the worst I have ever had, with cold untoasted bread, a croissant , bun, cereals with milk and coffee. Hotel could not be bothered to make proper toasts.
I realy like my stay here, everything was amazing! But, when i leave the hotel. I find out if been charged 2 rooms , at the same time. And now i contacted them about this. I dont here back from them.
Nice and great service rendered during my stay in the hotel. Staff was prompt and professional from Check-in counters to concierge service! The 1st day PCR test process was seamless as well.
To everywhere
Checkin and PCR test very efficient. Put into a very comfortable corner suite. Dinner and breakfast very tasty.

reviews.review_title: Best hotel for everything which location is super Awesome!”

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend if you take test and go scheme !!”
reviews.review_comment: Paying a little more but you are getting a lot more back. First big thing is your time. The pool was great, very relaxing and clean. The location though cannot be beat. Right at terminal 21- entrance right from hotel to the mall. Same with the BTS, connects you right to the Asok stop. The gym is well kept and the pool is amazing. It has tennis courts, a small practice golf course and outdoor gym for you to use. Food is also readily available as the mall is located on the hotel.
Location is the best. Right at shopping, food court, BTS, and MRT. The shopping isn't the greatest but you are a short ride away from all the other places.

The rooms aren’t showing signs of wear and tear. The fitness centre is better than most and is always Air-conditioned. The pool area is next to it and provides a nice back drop. Then there are a lot of eating options close by and the sky train station is just outside

reviews.review_title: The Best Test and Go Option in Bangkok”
reviews.review_comment: I have arrived in Thailand three times with Test and Go and Grande Center Point Terminal 21 is the most efficient, organized, and beautiful hotel I have stayed with. Very easy and well worth the price.

Stayed here for 1 night for Thailand pass. Room big and immaculate albeit a bit monochromatic. Right downtown by BTS for those who need it. In terms of Thailand Pass- picked up right up at the airport. PCR only took 10 hours to come back.
The hotel is close to both the underground and the Skytrain. Easy to get around Bangkok from this hotel.
It was very smooth through the Test and Go scheme.
helpfull staff and feeling safe to stay .

Easy communication, fast responses, efficient process from Airport, PCR Test, to Accommodation. Used my agoda booking confirmation for ThaiPass, 12am Pick up at Airport, Tested at Hotel, Results next morning. Flawless experience!

reviews.review_title: Hotel Staff Does Not Enforce Masks”
reviews.review_comment: Though the location of the Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 is great, the check-in process was very unorganized. I was on time for check-in. But the room was not ready and the front desk told me it would be several hours late. This was extremely frustrating since I was traveling and needed to have a work conference call. The rooms need to cleaned, accounted and assigned on time. If not, there should be back up plans for travelers, especially ones that may need to work, are tired, or need to shower. The staff also did not enforce other guests to wear masks. This was very scary. I stayed over a week and saw many guests walking around in the lobby, gym, pool, hallways and elevators without wearing masks. I neither saw nor heard any staff member ask these guests to put on masks. Guests were sneezing and coughing without wearing masks, yet the hotel staff didn't do anything. The staff also wasn't very observant.

Well, can't blame Novotel, bad governance by the authorities on urban planning. However, such inconvenience will affect my decision to stay at Novotel again. Next time in BKK, I will choose a hotel besides BTS or MRT. Those who don't mind such inconvenience, Novotel is a nice hotel to stay.

reviews.review_title: Might be okay outside of SHA+ charade”
reviews.review_comment: Might be okay outside of SHA+ scheme. But I have to review as I found it. Positive… Staff were lovely and friendly. Negatives… Check in was in a grubby hot garage outside the lobby. The room had a wipe clean plastic lino obviously laid on top of a normal carpet. Quarantine food was substandard… served with a mixer drink! Not enough drinking water provided for someone under quarantine. Luckily I got my negative result before 9PM so was able to ‘escape’ the room! As I say may well be delightful under normal circumstances.

For starters, I only booked this room for one day per the Test and Go scheme. The room looked as if it were a rent by the hour type of room. Wi-fi………nonexistent. It would connect then instantly disconnect. I had to use data roaming in order to get a signal. My RT-PCR test was taken the night of my arrival and the results were given to the hotel staff in the early morning hours , however, I was never notified they received the results. An hour prior to checkout, I called the front office to inquire about my test results. I was told they’d check with the hospital and get back to me. Over an hour later, no word from the front desk. I went to lobby to speak with the front desk about the test results and was given the results that showed the hotel had received the results over six prior to me calling the front desk. I fault myself for being cheap by trying to save a few bucks on the whole Test and Go scheme. Be advised!!! Avoid this place if you can!!

Stayed as arrival shn one day package in BKK . Location is good .staff is good . Room facilities are good. Just little disappointed with meal options . Meal come together as shn package are just so so . Breakfast for shn package is not hotel breakfast ,just set meal with no option to choose .

Chose this hotel for Test and go one day stay. Paid 150 USD for the package incl airport shared transfer and PCR test. The hotel never answered my emails. The room looks cheap, with dated furniture, ugly view, pvc cover on the floor. Food offered was miserably cheap. When checked in asked the receptionist how will I know my pcr test redult, the answer was We will call you. They didn't call me. I tried to reach the reception 3 times between 8-10 AM the next morning, only after my 4th call they informed they will chack and call me back. The result was negative, and the test paper was ready the previous night before 11 pm. Very disorganized system.

Picked me up at ap, run through a drive inn hospital for PCR test, then checked in at the parking garage and got to the room. They bring food and knock on the door. You can call for extra food or some beers as well on your expense to make quarantine waiting easier. They called me when result was there after 8h already and let me go. Very professional and well organized. I will do this next time again.
Stayed for the stop and go due to covid travel restriction. The staff hands down made our short stay very welcoming. No task to big or all and very helpful as you can expect whilst in Thailand

reviews.review_title: 1 day quarantine package worked very well”

reviews.review_title: A budget hotel that serves its job”

Also if I recall correctly the ASQ guests are all on the fourth floor, so the window view is a bit boring for ASQ guests. That said, the room looked nice and clean and the hotel staff were nice and helpful. Also you can't expect perfection if you pick a cheaper ASQ. I would give the overall rating a 4 out of 5 stars.
During my Covid stay, the meals were good, the room was good and the staff were good. Everyone worked well together and there were no hold-ups or dramas.
For €100 and some euros for a hlliday Inn test and go quarantine hotel l expected more. Tired room, road noise etc. The hotel only gave my result after l asked them to check.
Great service from staff who went out of their way to help. These people were just so helpful and considerate, I didn't want to leave.
To stay in your room during 24 hours waiting result pcr test was not a pleasure.the food was not good. The room was in poor condition. We were happy not to stay 7 days.

hotels.name: Novotel Bangkok Ploenchit Sukhumvit Hotel (SHA Certified)

reviews.review_comment: Great location and excellent staff... the rooms are perfectly comfortable and functional and the staff are very helpful.

reviews.review_title: A 4 star hotel that deserves more”
reviews.review_comment: A 4 star hotel that deserves more. It is located in a quiet and clean area, not far from Arab Street, as well as the commercial malls area, close to many restaurants, shops and various cafes. Very close to the metro station. Reception and the most wonderful of the hotel's friendly staff. Quick procedures for receiving and handing over rooms. Nice spacious clean rooms with great furniture and decor. Very comfortable big bed. A spacious bathroom, complete with everything a guest needs, as well as a bidet. Tried the breakfast a few times and it was excellent. I recommend this hotel for visitors to Bangkok. Excellent price for quality and service. Thank you to all the employees we have contacted with for their kind treatment.
good service
Most front desk staff do not wear mask
Working front desk Staff most don’t wear mask

We booked this hotel from Bangkok airport in our emergency evacuation back to Australia. We were met at our taxi at the door and whisked inside and into our room within minutes. The staff were authentically friendly, helpful and highly attentive. It was a haven after the chaos of Phuket going into lockdown. Everything was perfect, with a great breakfast, fab room, and the staff even organised to have our pre-ordered custom suit delivered to the hotel in 45 minutes - we had surrendered this issue in the chaos as low priority to organise postage back to Australia later. Thank you to the staff for your kindness and professionalism. I’ll be back to spend more time in the temples of Bangkok using this as my base.
The access card may access to every floor of the hotel which is not security tight The house keeping is not that efficient Most of the staff do not wear a mask
House keeping Slightly not effective
Handy location if you want to use the train/metro
Hotel is next to BTS station. Very convenient if you want to travel via train. But not near any shopping malls. Hotel is comfortable with nice modern amenities.
This hotel is well located near amenities and BTS. I get the convenience to Siam Square without the crowd! It is quiet but very safe.
The hotel location just right in front of SkyTrain make it convenient to access. The guest room is also neat, clean and spacious...

Nice and clean hotel with helpful and friendly staff. It is next to the BTS station and the only con is that there is only stairs if you are bringing a luggage and taking public transportation from the airport.
Good service Good location Good Food thxs for all gentle kind of you all

reviews.review_title: Modern hotel next to BTS station”
reviews.review_comment: Modern, clean and spacious room and bathroonm, good room service, right next to BTS station. Slight delay in check-in, but all good afterwards. Good gym on premise free for guests. Would stay here again.
Surrounding not much shopping area if needs take bts or walk to around 15mins to town area shopping area
Good value for money and location is perfect. Room is good size and clean.

Pro: Excellent location, easy to find, right next to BTS. Staff was very helpful, room was clean and quiet. Con: Mattress was too soft, food choice of buffet breakfast was limited Overall, it’s a very nice hotel

Pros: -good location Ploenchit BTS just within 100m of the hotel, walking distance to Lumphini park, Erawan Shine, Central world & etc -clean room & helpful staff Cons:- -Not much facility to enjoy in the hotel (good for stay & explore Bangkok but not for those who like to stay in the hotel for too long)

location very near Ploenchit station. all hotel staff were very friendly.

the location is right next to BTS station. Very convenience on transportation. Room is great. strongly recommended.

reviews.review_title: Modern and spacious room with friendly and helpful staff”
reviews.review_comment: We travelled with a baby and was staying in a junior suite. The room is modern and cosy. The staff were friendly and helpful. Breakfast at the executive lounge on level 29 was great, with both views and food. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely be staying there again on our next trip to Bangkok.

reviews.review_title: This hotel is in a fantastic location we stayed in the executive room and it is well worth the price”
reviews.review_comment: As I said we were in the executive room but when I asked the hotel if we could get a late check out for the room they said no well we got there at 2.30 and they said you room is not ready as someone has booked a late check out and I am thinking why did I have to book a room for the night. Ok it was a cheaper room as we would not be there for breakfast and they did give us a room when we got there but not the room I had paid for and they didn’t make us change rooms but that’s convenient for them as they don’t have to make up both rooms was not happy with this

The only plus to premium level rooms is private check in. However, pointless if the hotel isn’t busy. Check in time 2pm. We got a smoking level room.... no thanks. Our official check in time was after 5:30pm. No true apologies or anything you’d expect from and 4 to 5 star hotel for the inconvenience. Very limited hours for appetizer and cocktail. Basic well brands and below average hot snacks. Many times the bottles were empty, no drink glasses available, forks gone......and so on. The staff was sweet and wonderful, so most likely a senior management issue. I suggest a Marriott brand for a true exec club experience. Breakfast was pretty good. I might return for the right price . That rate would be $80 max

reviews.review_title: Great stay, excellent location, will return! ”
reviews.review_comment: The best thing about this place truly is the location. It's a stone's throw away from the BTS station, and there's a 7-eleven, Starbucks, McD's just within 3 mins walking distance. The service was great, rooms were spacious - very good usage of space. Beds were super comfy - they even had a pillow menu where you get to choose which pillows you'd like to use during your stay, and believe me, we tried quite a few because pillow comfort is something very important to us. The breakfast had a good variety and decent - the only thing is that you do need to go pretty early as it can get pretty packed during peak hours (between 9am & 10am), but there are signs informin you of this too. All in all, we had a very enjoyable stay and are already planning our next visit.
Short walk to BTS station, and just 1-2 stops from the center. It is close to some shopping centers with good resteraunts. The bar is also good, every night with live band.

Was travelling with kids and parents and we all enjoyed the stay.. the location is just next to the train which is very convenient.. we had breaks at the club floor which is relaxing but food selection is limited. Our room was huge! As we were upgraded, and kids enjoyed hide and seek in the room. Thank you.
Need more treadmills in the gym
Cant go wrong with this hotel.,..perfect location and extremely comfortable rooms

We are surprised that they make an effort to prepare a Birthday 🎂 for my MIL without us requesting it. Thumb up 👍🏻. The only con is there is no elevator from BTS on the side of the Hotel. It is quite tiring for my in-laws to climb down the steps from the BTS.

hotels.name: BS Residence Suvarnabhumi (SHA Plus+)
hotels.address: 836/2 Ladkrabang Rd., Ladkrabang,, Suvarnabhumi Airport, Bangkok, Thailand, 10520

reviews.review_comment: Staff was helpful throughout my stay, nice and clean room, very near to the airport.
Very good value
New building Food is Room service only

The shuttle took an hour to pick us up from the airport. Took almost another hour to check us in. The rooms were not very clean. Urine stains on the toilet. Booked room service, took almost two hours, the food was not edible at all. I ordered fish and chips, there was no fish there, just panko crumb thing deep fried, the fries were dry and cold. Everything about this stay was subpar and I can't imagine how they got the SHA+ with the way they clean their rooms. Positive: close to airport.
Clean tidy hotel and close to the airport. As I was travelling under the test and go program it suited me well. Good price and transfer from airport and back.

In well over 10 visits, we always gave 5* reviews; now the score downgrades to 2. With the addition of the new building, BS Grand, the front desk service and condition of the old Premier Wing is very poor. The lobby of the new hotel is beautiful, however, only one receptionist was on duty when the shuttle bus arrived from the airport. With 5 people in front of us, we waited well over 45 min to check-in. Adding vaccination apps to phones and taking pictures slowed the check-in process down. Since we arrived from a nearby city by car, we did not need Thai Pass procedures. In the past, there were 2 people on duty when a shuttle bus arrived. The pools and Premier Restaurant are closed. The view from our Premier room was the old pool filled with green slime. We went into the new pool. A staff member chased us out; the pool was closed because they are a Test & Go hotel. There was no sign saying the pool was closed. The hallways of the Premier Wing were un-swept with debris strewn about. Empty plastic crates blocked easy access to the lift. Dishes with congealed food by a neighbouring room were left outside the door for several hours. The floor of the lift was very dirty. To order dinner, we were told to order at reception and it would be brought to tables outside the lobby. Over half an hour later, still no food. The kitchen did not receive our order. We left to find a meal nearby. Although we had planned plenty of time for a meal and shower before leaving for the airport, that time was cut short. We then had to rush. The only plus side of our stay was that the Superior Room was the same cleanliness and comfort as before. As regular Suvarnabhumi travellers, we will be finding another airport hotel. It is so sad to see that an SHA++ upgrade resulted in a downgrade of service.

The hotel is located very close to the airport which makes it a good choice for the 1st day test hotel. But.... there is a phone I your room that you need to use to contact the lobby by dialing 0. The don't like picking up the phone and actually just hang up as quick as they can. Which made me decide to call and call and call again until they do pickup. That made them turn off the phone instead of picking up. I was in the need of medical assistance but got fully ignored by the people at yhe lobby. Whe I confronted the staff about this they just laughed and said, did not want to phone.... Exceptionally bad staff!

reviews.review_title: We liked but BS has some problems”
reviews.review_comment: They are going through some renovations and hopefully be much better. Here are some of our problems we had with our stay for two nights. Placed a wake-up call the evening of for 4 AM which never happened, also requested a shuttle at 4:30 which never happened. When you buy you room it says free breakfast on all rooms which when we arrived never got. So like I said, we like this hotel since it is close to the airport. We have stayed at all but enjoy this place, but they need to pay attention to customers needs. "GOOD LUCK!"

Even if we didn’t have the SHA+ requirements, we would stay here if our flight was early morning or late at night. It’s close to the airport and it’s clean. The staff— superb! Our SHA Extra Plus *hotel experience was great, too. (The entire entry process is another story 🤣.) Great value for the money.

Pre arrival communication from the hotel regarding airport pickups and other issues, was excellent.Good location for the airport and ideal for the Test and Go programme. Didn’t really use the facilities as I was only there one night. Unfortunately tested positive for Covid on my arrival but staff were very helpful and kept me informed of procedures. Room service again good. Definitely ok for a one night stop and the Test & Go programme.
great not far from airport very frindly staff alway willing to help ill go again sure

reviews.review_title: Great place to stay in Bangkok”
reviews.review_comment: We have stayed at the BS Residence for a number of years now and booked again to go through Test and Go process. Always a great welcome from the staff, clean rooms and the room service meal was great. Really convenient for the airport and close to local shops and market as well as the Sky Train to get into the city. I marked the facilities a 4 only because there was no pool to use as they can’t at the moment due to c19. The new extension had better Wi-Fi and tv facilities than the older section of the hotel. Have booked for return transit stay.

I then asked them to book me a taxi and I was told to wait in the lounge. 25 minutes later I asked what happening and they had forgot to book the taxi. Very disappointing.
This hotel was very clean throughout, everything was brand new and the COVID test

Pick up from the airport seemed disorganized. Upon arrival, there was a pool of water coming from under the refrigerator, 2 very hot bottles of water and lots of ants (particularly around the water puddle and bathroom). The driver from airport was friendly and the location was good for a one night stopover, but I’m sure there’s definitely better options in Bangkok
Super Hotel for 1 to 3 nights. Near airport. Rooms new and clean
Room was dirty and swarming with mosquitos. One star because the bed was comfortable, and staff sent up a can of bugspray.

Very dissopnted with service we recieved. not very friendly help with the dinner or breakfast nor the staff were availbale at the desk for advice for the test results. wife and daughter had to carry their luggages downstairs Only they were intersting for that wife shouild hand back the room key card. After checking out about 11am,11.30 am had their breakfast near by restaurent.

reviews.review_title: Staff pick up at airport woeful experience”
reviews.review_comment: Reception staff at hotel were great, not included in this review. Staff based at airport were rushed and stressed, Customer service skills very poor. Transfer vehicle driver rude and dismissive of passengers welfare. Nine people in the van, aircon not working temperature in van was 30C, Driver reused to allow windows to be opened despite stifling heat. My wife was very ill from the heat in the vehicle. Hotel itself was acceptable for cost. They need to lift their game with transfers. The trip was no a good experience.
All good except Hairdryer broke

reviews.review_title: Possibly the worst quarantine experience imaginable”
reviews.review_comment: 1.) Air con didn't work. It's 31 celsius in Bangkok with 80% humidity. 2.) No way to contact reception - the phones don't allow you to contact reception. So no way to get the air con fixed. No way to get food or water. 3.) I had to ring a friend to ring another friend to ring reception just so I could get the air con fixed and get some food delivered. 4.) Not enough drinking water and no way to contact reception to order more. Just ridiculous. There are other quarantine hotels that only cost slightly more, try one of those.

reviews.review_title: It did what it needed to…”
reviews.review_comment: Very efficient service for the one night PCR stay in Bangkok -and staff very helpful and pleasant. Room was big and very clean. Tea, coffee, water provided. BUT it was the worst nights sleep due to the noise from nearby buildings and work sites and kitchens etc …. And I found out in the morning that the door to my room didn’t actually lock when you left it so I went for food with my suitcase still inside - and anyone could have nipped in and taken it! I only needed a stopover for the PCR test process and this was fine. Would absolutely not recommend longer than a nights stay here.

reviews.review_title: Get em in, get em out.”
reviews.review_comment: First of all it took over 2 hours just to get to the hotel. It was very disorganized. Once at the hotel they didn't really help with questions. Just told us to download an app. Didn't really explain how to use it. Once inside the room it was very spacious and clean. Great water pressure.

It's a budget hotel with new renovations. Clean and comfy room. However, I'm not so happy with the arrangement in the airport. When I arrived airport, the staff told me they do not have car to fetch me to their hotel, I have to get a Taxi (deductible from paid booking, at own cost if over the budget). The staff did not mention earlier before my travel date so I can decide what to do. The PCR test isn't taken in hotel but in hospital instead. The entire arrangement isn't convenient enough. No meals will be given, only 2 bottle of drinking water provided during my stay, no drinking water for second day. Waited PCR test result for so long, even ridiculous, the staff called me and asked me whether when I would like to checkout, then I have to tell them where is my PCR result, only then they gave me the result. What the? I've been waiting for so long. I can't even go out to get food or drinks due to the fact I'm under quarantine.
Do everything you need.
Nice location very close to the airport so convenient for a night stay (Covid test) Nice staff.
It's good
The wifi did not work in my room

How this hotel manages to keep its SHA rating I have no clue . I opened my room to find 1000's insects and i'm not joking. the room hadnt been cleaned , walls stained etc. Whilst I was there there was also 4 other couples shuffling around trying to change rooms . The front desk area was clean but as soon as you venture to the rooms its disgusting . sorry but people need to see this .

The hotel is 15 minutes away from the airport which is very convenient. The transfer and covid testing was quick and easy. The room was clean and big. The hotel lacks a restaurant and they are still organizing their infrastructure so that could improve soon because getting food wasn't so easy.

Terribly noisy due to ongoing building. Unfinished. Pool dirty. Room full of sand. Low water pressure in shower. No breakfast even when it should be included. Short on staff. Can’t get through to reception on phone. Not a place I will come back to.
Good place does what it said it would Would recommend
I stayed here under the Test & Go. Staff were very good, delivering food etc to my room. They arranged transport to my onward destination
Super clean!! Nearly the Airport, great staff

reviews.review_title: Great for late night arrivals Transiting”
reviews.review_comment: Nearby Airport. Great for late night arrivals who wish to transit next morning. Staff great, Taxi Service great. Only issue is nothing nearby

The room we get was not cleaned. Nobody has been in the room since the last guests. Not what you will expect in a SHA Plus+ hotel. Also the driver who picked us up in the airport drived the wan same a rally car to a race.
Nop

We get a room for one day self-isolation, arriving at hotel until night nothing for lunch and dinner no one of the staff ask for and we can t go out anywhere. We had to call to ask for food and pay extra. Before it we call for info … especially for food one staff said it will have food in the package but in final nothing and no one care us during stay
The Last room was full of garbage outside

reviews.review_title: Pool was Green and not open”
reviews.review_comment: And i call for menu to roomservice and after 4 hours still no menu

Did my Quarantine here ( 2 nights only ). Place is very, very new. Still had plastic on electrical switches. No soap or shampoo provided on both days I stayed. Probably will improve in time once everything is finished off & gardens established.

Grand BS Residence is a great place for a short staycation. The amenities are new and room is clean and spacious. Just hopped on a local bus transport will bring you to the Latkrabang light sky-train station.
Very nice and the staff were very friendly and helpful, very clean hotel would stay there again.
good as expected

Staffs all were very friendly and nice willing to help. I lost the key for my luggage and they helped cut the lock for me. The hotel is newly renovated so there are some part that still under construction. Overall for the convenience of being close to the airport it was good for the price.
Great

I used BS residence as my Day 1 quarantine in Bangkok. The staff was nice enough and the residence in itself is Ok. However, there is nothing in the room to even help you order food or anything else. Not ideal when you’re in quarantine. But my main issue was afterwards, I could not update my day 5 status and the other place told me BS residence had not checked me out of their system. Even though they gave me the release form and All. I would use again but probably wouldn’t be my first choice

reviews.review_title: Test and Go package was not a good choice here.”
reviews.review_comment: Customer could not contact the staff to order the food since check in til check out. (Press 0 for operator service > No one pick up / Call directly to hotel number > Busy Line and No one pick up)
I Just stayed 1 night for quarantine... But it was quite good room condition. Room is clean and new. everything is quite satisfied.. If you need to stay near airport, It's good location.

This hotel is NOT RECOMMENDED AND AND NOT FRIENDLY PLEASE DONT OR DO NOT BOOK THIS RUBISH HOTEL FIND OTHER OPPOSITION AND AVOID EVEN TRAVEL TO THAILAND .This people are running big fake things do not go to THAILAND EVER!

Still under construction, you could hear noice from within the building, traveller next door, construction during daytime and surroundings. Location is close and convenience. Swimming pool look terrible. Good concept but under maintenance and normal standard. I will seek different place for next trip.
I experienced relax atmosphere and excellent services hotel. It is so good for a couple to stay.
Chaotic at reception.

Used as day 1 quarantine hotel. Lots of things wrong i.e no food available on arrival after a 12 hour flight. Rats running around pool area, pool out of use and like a building site. They called me at 4.30 in the morning to advise that our PCR test had arrived back negative so I went online and booked flights to Koh Samui for 9.05. Went to reception to book out and collect our certificates to be told there had been a mistake and our PCR results were not expected until around 10 a.m. The staff were awful and refused to help me contact Bangkok Airways to change our flight which cost an additional £100. They were useless, would not recommend!
This hotel is rated 3 stars and indeed It is. Basic facilities in the room and very basic … in the common area in front of the reception.

I stayed in the new BS Grand building. Room very quiet and clean with good layout. Pool not open yet. Only 10 minutes from Suvarnabhumi with free shuttle service. A great place to stay if you are transiting but nothing much to see and do nearby.
I like hotel

reviews.review_title: Stay if you can adjust with cheap services”
reviews.review_comment: Door safety - bad Reception service- ok Food service- ok Room service-ok Cheap rate-60% Market nearby - within 1km Food rate- not so cheap.better visit the market store Suggestions on stay - stay if you wanna save money or else go to better place.

Had to refuse to pay 2 for food because lady forget to say I pay on ticket. Owner then insult me and another guy try to stop me leaving hotel. Also nice to hear soi dogs fighting at night in rubbish dump that was my view from balcony

Having spent almost a year in Thailand and having travelled here at least 30+ times in the last 10 years I have stayed in quite a few hotels from very basic to 5 star. Almost every single hotel regardless of star rating has been staffed with friendly staff, not unusual in a country known as the land of smiles I am not sure why but most of the staff at BS residence were unfriendly and impolite There were a couple of exceptions but these seemed to be more junior staff not trained to develop a disdain for the customers Very surprising and very disappointing

reviews.review_title: Great for a layover near BKK airport”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed for one night for the Thailand Pass scheme. Well organized, helpful staff. Clean, modern rooms. Rather big balcony was a big plus. Has a nice pool which unfortunately was closed due to Covid restrictions. Free shuttle to the airport. Enjoyed the short stay and will stay there again in the future.
Hotel was ok for one night stay...close to airport...
Make sure pool available . It is beautiful but could not swim in it. The main reason I booked there.

This is a budget hotel close to the airport in Bangkok. We were quarantining on the 'Test and Go' programme, so after being tested on arrival, we had to stay in our hotel room until we received the test results, 11 hours later. The hotel struggled to deal with Room Service orders, as we were not allowed to leave the room. It took almost 3 hours to get some food and drink, although when it arrived it was very good. After we got our negative test results we were able to have a walk around the local area that has some markets and shops. The hotel provided us with a free mini-bus transfer back to the airport for our domestic flight to Koh Samui the next morning.
Best price and really quick and efficient
great
nice
great
Wifi never worked and staff was uncaring and deceitful about it. Decrepit, smelly room with clogged shower and mosquitoes. Noisy environment. Don't go here. Don't dare do it.

The hotel is not much to write home about but it is near the airport. Very efficient staff. Organising of PCR test process was great. Everything went smoothly from my arrival at 8pm to the transfer to the hospital for the PCR test that night. They have got their act together. Comfy bed.

Very good hotel staff very friendly and very helpful would recommend this hotel to anyone that is coming to Thailand. Free airport transfer there and back.good food as well. If I have to transit through Bangkok I would stay there every time. You would not be disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Traveling to Thailand around Covid Time”
reviews.review_comment: The room was not what I saw on the picture! It's worse than I thought. Totally not clean. I needed to wipe down everything in the room. We booked cause it's only one night for just waiting for the covid result. Our flight arrived around 1am. We gotta wait for the transportation for about hour or two. We stoped to testing site around 3am. I needed to contact hospital, asked for the result and called the receptionist to tell them. When the hospital staff said that they already sent the result to the hotel.

reviews.review_title: You get what you pay for”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel is very close to the airport with a free shuttle. Hotel room was clean but hallways were filthy. Place is overall very loud, there’s a nightclub next door that goes till 1-1:30. Hotel employees - meh.
ATK test not supplied (but paid for) as part of test and go
Would be alot nicer if the hotel wasnt under construction. Stayed for just 1 night for the test n go program.

I booked 2 days here to undergo the PCR mandatory test. The following day I woke and went to reception to ask for breakfast and was told to sit outside and someone will come and take my order. Having sat there for 40mins I decided to ask again at the reception to be told either to go back to my room and order from the phone or go to the market for breakfast! The following day I headed for the Airport having received my PCR Result via the App. When I arrived at the Airport they told me I needed the paper copy provided by the Hotel which they hadn`t given me. The Airport staff kindly called the Hotel and asked them to forward a copy to them. Totally unacceptable incompetence by the Hotel Staff who advertise the fact they take care of all your needs during this confusing COVID regulations.
غير قابل للسكن ، وسخ وقذر جدا ما انصح احد يسكن ، نمل ، فيران ، Not for humane ، very dirty ,there are a lot of mouses ,
Good new hotel with nice stuff. When pool is up running it will be great.
Room is average 3 star hotel, not a beautiful place for pleasure travel but the COVID quarantine package is convenient at a fair price and the service is good.

stayed here previously and enjoyed my stay,, this time not so much,, Booked 4 days and i left after day 1... hotel and pool not great after covid,,, i hope they sort it as its an ok hotel near the airport

The hotel was too dirty. Nothing provided, no service. It feels like abandoned place. Everything was ruined extremely so much dirty. Seemed some buildings are cleaner but when I ask about better ones they answered these buildings are for foreigners. But I am a foreigner too and I paid more that 7000 baht just for one day. What’s the meaning?
Easy check in, nice and helpful front desk, clean room.

reviews.review_title: I would not recommend this hotel”
reviews.review_comment: The female staff at the reception was very unhelpful and made me feel bad. I was not satisfied with all the responses.

hotels.name: iCheck inn Residence soi 2 (SHA Extra Plus)
hotels.address: 71 Monaco Building, Sukhumvit 2, Klongtoey, Sukhumvit, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110

reviews.review_comment: Just ok

Airport pick up and Covid requirements all spot on. Rook clean & well equipped but NO Coffee or any thing else in room, when inquired told have 2 bottles water in room..& is free machine in level 2 but I can not leave room to get . Free Tuk Tuk to Soy4 not running ...bad luck there ?

Spacious room, very clear (I've got it at building's angle), good matress, little kitchen, couch, desk. Everything you need for a good price. Close to BTS and nightlife attraction (if you like). It's a bathroom and not a shower. Good value
Booked here as my teat and go day one hotel. The staff was amicable and helpful when I had questions about Thailand Pass.
I stayed here about 8 days . Great location Out class service, daily basis cleaning of Rooms , Deluxe room was out standing , very cooperative staff , with good speaking fluent in English .

reviews.review_title: Not what all I had hoped for”
reviews.review_comment: Was forced to stay because of Thai Pass. The cost was atrocious because of that. There was very helpful communication and check-in during a confusing time. Helpful and friendly staff. Place is dated, but the room was very clean. Sadly no hot water for a good shower, much less a bath, which I would have enjoyed. No coffee/tea available. Some noise through the walls, but overall an ok stay.
Great hotel . No pool but price reflects that . Spotlessly clean . Great staff . Near everything but far enough away to be quiet

I was honestly shocked to see the building and our room: how can it be qualified as 5 star hotel? I have rarely seen that much dust under the bed, and everything is pretty old and small. The only dissapointement we had in Thailand with its usually high quality hotellery.

reviews.review_title: Location is woeth every pennny alone!”
reviews.review_comment: I have lived in BKK 15 years so I know all about locations and this place is Bang On. Quiet as it is tucked away at the end of Sukhumvit Soi 2, but a short walk to cross over in to the nightlife of Sukhumvit Soi 4. The man who checked us in and who we sa3w every day is one of the most friendly and smiley hotel receptionists i have ever met, seriously! Great size room, beds were fantastic. TV was a bit off though, not so many western channels but who cares; the rest was first class!
Great value and great staff.
Good place value for money
A great location and price.
very good
Location is bit inside from main road. Ambience is really nice for travel with young kids/ couple/ group.
Great staff... I rarely comment on lack of English ability, but if that is important to you, the manager is fluent, and a helpful, nice guy. Thanks for the free room upgrade.
soaking in the tub is nice. Nice patio area, where smoking is ok, but definitley not in your room. A ways down the soi, but a safe, pleasant walk.
All good! Would recommend to any friend or business associate, and would be an excllent choice if travelling for local work.
Very well furnished room and very clean ...: great value at current rates

สะอาดค่ะ ถึงจะอยู่ในซอยลึกนิดนึง เดินได้ไม่เหนื่อย ไม่เดินก็มีรถของโรงแรมส่งค่ะ เงียบไม่วุ่นวาย เดินไป BTS นานา ก็ได้ค่ะ ไม่เดินก็วิน 40บ.
