Also can walk to BTS NaNa can walk to 7-11, have food have bike taxis so yeah have fun with your trip!
Nice clean room and good service. And not so expensive.

reviews.review_title: Quiet, clean, good parking, good location”
reviews.review_comment: Tidy rooms, nice staff, good parking. 200m up a dead-end soi 2 parallel to soi 4 and Nana Plaza. Cut through to soi 4 is 80m from hotel. Far enough away to have no bar noise. 10 min walk to Nana BTS train station. Careful when booking, several hotels similar name.

Hotel a bit far from the Sukhumvit road and shuttle car should provide Mon to Sun . Hotel located with good location and can walk to Sky train . I was impressed with cleanliness .I recommend this hotel .
The room is clean and nice. Comfort for stay and travel in the city.
in the heart of bangkok easy to in and out lots bar and restaurant around

Upon check-in i was greeted by an extremely friendly manager, who took care of passport ids, agoda booking checks, and briefed me on the dos and donts regarding hotel policy, i suggest if you are a smoker then ask for a balcony room as the hotel has a strict policy on smoking , and fair enough ! i had booked a standard room but had a problem with the air-con , i was immediately upgraded to a "superior room " really nice, more like a studio apartment than a hotel room . .The rooms are immaculate, largely due to the cleaning staff, who quietly go about their business ensuring the guests can totally relax ! special mention for the breakfast , outstanding , highly recommend the cooked breakfast as each item was cooked perfectly , even got a welcome smiley face egg first morning , so i guess , as long as the eggs are smiling , an enjoyable stay is guaranteed ,The reception staff speak english well , and are happy to pass on any issues you may have , thank you for a memorable stay !
Not a good choice
Clean, comfortable,and good service
Everything more good?
Nice rooms. Modern Amenities. They also have a free shuttle which drops you to near by Main road.
Great value overall. I do like the free shuttle rides to the sukumvit.

reviews.review_title: Great Value for the money, nice room, and friendly staff”
reviews.review_comment: Good location close to embassies, shops but far enough away from the noisy bars . Nice clean room - which was reasonably modern - no problem recommending and staying again. Some people complain about the walk to end of soi where it’s positioned but I enjoy the walk - builds a good thirst
It was very good every time I stay there

reviews.review_title: Room was very good and I was really surprised. The bed was great ”
reviews.review_comment: I would stay there again
Initially offered room was dirty. When we showed our interest to cancel the booking we have been offered other specious cleaner room. Never chose such a hotel in future.
This is a great hotel, and this is the second time I have stayed here Clean, nice staff and great location

reviews.review_title: Hotel has a pest problem. Had to leave at midnight without accommodation without any compensation”
reviews.review_comment: We booked this hotel for one night stay after spending previous night in train from Surat Thani to Bangkok. So we checked in early, quickly left our luggage in our hotelroom and took off to enjoy the last day of our vacation exploring Bangkok. We returned back later in the evening to get some sleep before our 11hr flight next morning. As we turned on the lights we saw the first cockroaches. They are very rare in our home country so we scanned through our luggage to avoid carrying them back to our home. During operation we killed about 10 of them around the room. Luckily there was none found from our luggage. At this point my wife was sure that she wouldn't sleep in this hotel. We went to reception to inform staff about the issue. I told him that we are not going to sleep with cockroaches and asked for refund. He told that Agoda -bookings are non-refundable and insisted us to try another room. He was not serious about their pest issue, he just tried to convince that those are common e
Great Location,value for money,close to everything.Neat and tidy spacious rooms

reviews.review_title: This is my to go hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Nice spacious quiet rooms. Clean and comfortable. There are 2 laundry machines available for free. There is a free Tuk Tuk that goes to Sukhumvit. This hotel is in very quiet Soi 2 and very close to the crazy fun of Soi 4. The rooms have a bathtub not a toilet shower! Very affordable.
Loved my first stay here, ended up extending it for a few more days. Rooms are big, it is quiet at night (no loud honking cars/tuktuk). You can use their washer for laundry (free).
Excellent location and hotel was ideal for what was required.

reviews.review_title: i had good time in this hotel”
reviews.review_comment: i had no issue with this hotel only 5 mnts to the shops and nana plaza. even it wasn't expansive. hotel has shuttle service to the train station.
Excellent hotel well worth the money paid to Agoda.very good size rooms with good wifi and rainfall showers and massive bed.

The hotel is a lil far from the main road but they have tuktuk service that is very helpful. Check in was smooth and housekeeping staff is so good in cleaning and providing towels/water everyday. Would stay here again and would recommend this hotel to friends.

reviews.review_title: Good size rooms with small kitchen”
reviews.review_comment: + They had tuktuk service to main street + Quiet location at city center Breakfast wasn’t buffet style, but was otherwise ok. - Doors were like paper - Air-con is blowing directly to bed
Great location to various pubs, restaurants and train stations for real easy traveling around Bangkok. Staff very helpful and manages hotel well. Will definitely stay at this hotel again.

After payment, I found that date of checkin was wrong. Immediately called Agoda. They contacted property. But property did not agreed for date change. Then Agoda cancelled the booking & refunded full amount. Great service from Agoda
Nice to stay if you like sleep quite. Short walk to Soi4

So i asked they hotel if they can arrange a tour for me from the hotel to the Damnoen Saduak floating market and back. they arranged the tour for me for around 1200 bhat to and from the hotel. the driver showed up on time and we were on the way. everything was good until when reached there, actually the driver took me to the scam floating market side. and they asked me to pay 2500 bhat for the boat tour. what i read about this boat tour was that it was literally 15-20 bhat tour. the driver was part of the scam. i said i do not want to take the tour then the driver bargained for me to bring the price down to 1500 bhat but i was still not convinced but pissed and told the driver i do not want the tour anymore and take me back to the hotel. it ruined my whole 1 day. its the hotel responsibility what kind of companies they have their contacts with for the hotel guests or may they are part of the scam too. i enjoyed the stay but the last day totally changed my perception about the hotel.
Wifi is poor. I kept extending my stay, but the longer I stayed the poorer the service by the cleaning staff.
This place would be better if the Wifi was not so poor.

Located at bottom end of sukhumvit soi 2. Can walk through to soi 4 via alley by ‘Mexican’ restaurant. Nice egyptian restaurant opposite with sheeshah but other foodie places at top end of the street. Room - nice big comfy bed. Aircon is good but faces opposite the bed. Bathroom has ok shower but found few roaches in the shower curtain. There is cable with usual channels but free wifi and using own device is better.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, a little far off the main road, but free shuttle.”
reviews.review_comment: Great little hotel for a few nights. A little far from public transportation, but they do offer a free ride every half hour or so. And you can call them for pickup when you are at the end of the SOI. It is a guest friendly hotel.
THIS IS VERY GOOD HOTEL

Peaceful hotel in the end of soi 2, I like staying there from time to time when I need to be alone away from noise,yet not far from attractions.u have a free shuttle here and very comfortable living room as I like to call it . Staff also is very kind and helpful
yes
Clean and comfortable
Service is good...well behaved staff...but a little bit far from main road...
Good hotel

We arrived pretty late around 1am. Front desk was very nice. The tut tut was cool although we didnt utilize it. No amenities aside from that. We left the hotel to check out the area to find a heavily Indian populace. Really odd. Later on we found out that everything closes at around 1 so our timing was to blame. Do not drink the water in the fridge, drink the fancy looking bottle on the counter which apparently is the free one. haha.

reviews.review_title: Pool, lounge and free coffee - worth to stay”
reviews.review_comment: Pros - lounge, good location, bathroom, good price Cons - not very clean (cockroaches in the room)
Just need to buy new air conditions cause it’s very old and not closing any more
They just need swimming pool to be perfect
Very comfortable bed ,large room ,near to bars and shops ,very easy to travel around from hear on the BTS train , pretty much in the centre of everything

Very clean and nicely maintained. Wooden floors. M Oven, Kettle, hair dryer free. There's enough wardrobe for a family of 4. A flat TV with basic cable. They got some English, sports, Bangladeshi and an Indian news channel. For a price you have in room Nescafe instant, Noodle, toothbrush, shaving blade, minibar with beer, Oreos and a few more things. Bathroom is nice with separate shower side. Dry side has enough space too. There's a chill out lounge with a good pool table and free coffee, some board games, big TV and workspace too. Free tuktuk to phloem chit BTS. Staff is alright.. Manager is a very pleasant person. Overall, a good experience. Will visit again.

guest should be carefull do not be charged of mini bar,because i never touched the mini bar last day when i was checking out hotel reception gave me a bill for thai bhat about 190 TB. and the hotel management is not ready to give the guest some time to stay in room in case their flight is late.

reviews.review_title: Too far from the nearest BTS station. ”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel is clean and in good condition but is far from the station and the lobby is very small.
Air conditioner not working properly. Rude night staff. Dirty laundry left in hallways.

building and room are ok, no big problems, It is near the end of small road, a long walk in the heat. Area is safe enough but very crowded and jammed in. Most rooms have a small balcony and they used to allow smoking on the balcony, now NO. Seems excessive to be on the 5th or 7th floor up and they worry about smoking outside. Have stayed here many times, but now I find as good or better rooms more convenient to the main roads. I am not fond of the owners, they seem not to care about guest and never speak to you, only the people from their homeland. Very uppidy .
Excellent hotel for the price. Clean rooms, decent location and quite. Far enough away from Soi 4, but close enough to BTS etc...
Ok for short stay.10 min walk to sukhumvit,hotel provides tuk tuk shuttle.Quiet.Ok hotel for price You pay
came twice in 2 weeks , check my other review . good value , good breakfast . tuk tuk

i came last year , got a great room with a confy bed , this year lower price with smaller room and bed less confy dont see the reason why i should pay more for a confy bed . good value breakfast , tuk tuk service to main road . good location . quiet . will comeback if need it .
Comfortable room and fast wifi i near arab road just 10mints walk

reviews.review_title: Nice sized, slightly older room near nightlife and easy transport”
reviews.review_comment: Pros: Nice sized room. Very well cleaned. Near BTS and nightlife Nicely priced Cons: Older Hotel Tuk Tuk stops for mafia taxis (obviously some backhander payment system)
Great place to stay value for money will be back again!
I like Quiet Hotel.^^

Very good and well equipped. The staff is attentive and tries to satisfy the customer. We have exceptionally been entitled to two upgrades of the room initially chosen on Agoda. The establishment is calm. His only fault is that it is a little bit far from the subway Ploen Chit BTS station. There is a free tuk-tuk shuttle. We had a very good stay here. I highly recommend this hotel.

I chose this hotel because it was near an office I had to pick something up from. Knew nothing about it, normally I stay on Soi 11 . It's in a pretty quiet street, soi 2m, no 7/11 or massage shops next door which is OK. The staff were helpful and if you wanted a tuk tuk to the top of the street then you just had to ask or give them a call to pick you up. This is not a place to impress your girlfriend at, it's all a bit spartan and the reception is very small and unimposing which I guess is OK but no problem having a guest. The room was fine but spartan. It's a place to sleep as opposed to party but it was quiet and surprisingly quiet. Breakfast was not bad, staff will cook you bacon and eggs - the bacon is some of the BEST I have had in Thailand. There is a selection of basic breakfast things, croissant and bread not great quality but OK. The one UNFORGIVABLE thing though is there was no coffee, only instant muck. Amazing. This hotel is fine as a simple and cheap option.
Good location with tuk tuk to Sukhumvit Rd. Cost effective with basic breakfast, user friendly laundry and enjoyable games room.
Very good for families

reviews.review_title: Cheap hotel with awful breakfast and limited facilities”
reviews.review_comment: iCheck Inn Sukhumvit Soi 2 is a average cheap hotel near night street. The rooms were clean, no swimming pool and very limited facilities. Room service not available after 7pm, you have to deposit 500THB for room keys in case you lose room keys they will charge 500THB. Complementary breakfast was awful with very limited food items, the lady in the kitchen couldn't able to communicate in English so we had to talk to the reception every morning. Location of the hotel was good away from busy places like pubs & night streets as we traveled with young children. They had a tuktuk (3 wheeler) which offered free ride from hotel to main road for free which was good.

reviews.review_title: Very clean in a peaceful area ”
reviews.review_comment: I stayed here for more than two weeks, nice view from my balcony, no noise at all , the hotel staff is welcoming and ready to help , i strongly recommend for those looking for calm area near nana , starbucks is just few steps mc Donald, Arabic restaurants in front of the hotel ,exit to soi 4 is 1 minute walking,

reviews.review_title: Great value in the heart of Bkk”
reviews.review_comment: A great value 3 star hotel.... super clean and good for a quiet nights sleep but close to restaurants and bars . Free tuktuk down to Sukumvit and right close then to two Bts stations less than 500 mtrs . A good basic hotel .
Situated at the end of soi 2 in quiet area nice rooms and a short walk to the sky train

Basics done right, AC and in room fridge were whisper quiet. Bed was firm but good. Some of the furniture was a bit dated, but money had being spent in the right places (the AC unit looked relatively new)
Great location and a bit cheaper than the other hotels around and it's a guest Friendly hotel
Nice budget hotel.

I have traveled so many times to THAILAND with agoda booking,always good experience. At times there are flights which are with odd timings regarding check in timings of hotels so we made special request for early check in., hotels always accommodate us but this time we arrived 8.00am... in the morning and they made us sit on their only small couch till 2.00pm....,. In the afternoon and they told us that if we want to check in before 2.00 pm ...we have to pay extra 700 baht. That was really shocking for us.I have always stayed in Grace hotel soi 3 and my arrival has always been on the same time and they have always accommodated us.

Hotel photo is deceiving it is located down a very narrow dark smelly road with Garbage everywhere along road. Room was clean but never had to pay for a bottle of water anywhere else before in all my years. No restaurant. Had to shuttle out to main road to find a place to eat.
Quite street and quite hotel, very clean I highly recommend,
Quite, clean hotel.
Nice little hotel, clean and cozy. A few minutes away from Nana plaza, but in a quiet street.
Nice clean room, bed and bathroom. Quiet on soi 2 but quick shortcut to soi 4 by walking through Lohas Suites car park alley . Handy hotel tuk to Ploenchit Centre. A nice little hotel.

reviews.review_title: VERY GOOD LOCATION FOR SOLO TRAVELLERS”
reviews.review_comment: ITS VERY CLEAN AND NICE HOTEL TO STAY. ITS NEAR TO EVERYTHING . ITS NEAR GREAT NIGHTLIFE,
As always had a decent time at the hotel , like it since it’s away from craziness of nana plaza, tuk Tuk provided , the staff especially Aunaun and Shivam are good
All pros no cons

reviews.review_title: Staff needs to be more friendly”
reviews.review_comment: Room is ok but the lady at the reception is no good.

i had a good time during my trip , it was comfortable , even though slightly far from the main road, they provide tul tuk, away from the craziness of nana plaza , the staff esp shyam and aunaun for very nice
